```markdown
أعلن البيت الأبيض اليوم عن مطالبته الكونغرس بتنفيذ الميزانية المقترحة من قبل الرئيس السابق دونالد ترامب لشهر فبراير، وذلك في خطوة مفاجئة أثارت جدلاً واسعاً في الأوساط السياسية.

وأوضح المتحدث باسم البيت الأبيض أن هذا القرار يأتي في إطار الحفاظ على استمرارية العمل الحكومي وتجنب أي اضطرابات محتملة في الخدمات الفيدرالية.

وأشار إلى أن الميزانية المقترحة تتضمن تمويلاً لمشاريع البنية التحتية الحيوية وبرامج الدعم الاجتماعي التي تم إقرارها سابقاً.

وقد أبدى عدد من أعضاء الكونغرس من الحزبين الجمهوري والديمقراطي تحفظهم على هذا القرار، مطالبين بمراجعة شاملة للميزانية قبل إقرارها.

في إنجاز جديد يضاف إلى سجل الإمارات الحافل في القطاع النووي، حصلت الهيئة الاتحادية للرقابة النووية على أعلى تصنيف في مجال التدقيق الداخلي، وفقاً للمعايير العالمية التي وضعها معهد المدققين الداخليين العالمي.

وأكدت الهيئة أن هذا الإنجاز يعكس التزامها المستمر بتطبيق أفضل الممارسات العالمية في مجال الحوكمة والرقابة، مشيرة إلى أن التقييم شمل جميع جوانب عمليات التدقيق الداخلي وإجراءاته المتبعة في الهيئة.

وأوضح المسؤولون في الهيئة أن هذا التصنيف المتميز يأتي نتيجة للجهود الحثيثة التي بذلتها الهيئة في تطوير أنظمتها وإجراءاتها الداخلية، وتدريب كوادرها على أحدث الممارسات العالمية في مجال التدقيق الداخلي.

وتعد هذه الشهادة بمثابة اعتراف دولي بكفاءة وفعالية نظام التدقيق الداخلي في الهيئة، حيث تم تقييم جميع العمليات والإجراءات وفقاً لأعلى المعايير العالمية المعتمدة في هذا المجال.

ويؤكد هذا الإنجاز على مكانة دولة الإمارات الرائدة في مجال الطاقة النووية السلمية، وقدرتها على تطبيق أعلى معايير السلامة والأمان في جميع مراحل البرنامج النووي السلمي.

وأشارت الهيئة إلى أن هذا التصنيف سيساهم في تعزيز ثقة المجتمع الدولي في قدرات الإمارات النووية، وسيدعم جهودها المستمرة في تطوير قطاع الطاقة النووية السلمية وفقاً لأعلى المعايير العالمية للسلامة والأمان.

The notion that the Face on Mars was created by aliens is a common misconception that scientific evidence clearly disproves. When Viking 1 first photographed this mesa in Cydonia in 1976, the low-resolution image and specific lighting conditions created an illusion of facial features, sparking widespread speculation about artificial origins. However, subsequent high-resolution images from NASA's Mars Global Surveyor in 1998 and 2001 revealed the true nature of this formation: a natural mesa shaped by millions of years of erosion, wind, and geological processes. These detailed photographs show an asymmetrical hill lacking the precise geometry one would expect from an engineered structure. The apparent facial features visible in the original image disappear when viewed from different angles and in better resolution, demonstrating how pareidolia – our brain's tendency to recognize familiar patterns like faces in random stimuli – led to misinterpretation of a completely natural Martian landform.

En un paso decisivo para mejorar la movilidad urbana, el Cabildo ha anunciado el comienzo de un ambicioso proyecto de infraestructura vial destinado a resolver los persistentes problemas de congestión en los accesos al campus universitario, una iniciativa largamente esperada por la comunidad estudiantil y el personal docente.

La obra, que cuenta con un presupuesto inicial de 3,8 millones de euros, contempla la ampliación de las vías existentes y la creación de nuevos carriles exclusivos para el transporte público, una medida que busca priorizar la movilidad sostenible y reducir significativamente los tiempos de desplazamiento.

El proyecto, que se desarrollará en tres fases a lo largo de los próximos 18 meses, incluye la construcción de una rotonda inteligente equipada con semáforos sincronizados y sistemas de detección de tráfico en tiempo real, que permitirán una gestión más eficiente del flujo vehicular durante las horas punta.

Según explicó el consejero de Obras Públicas, Antonio Ramírez, esta intervención beneficiará directamente a más de 25.000 personas entre estudiantes, profesores y personal administrativo que diariamente acceden al campus universitario, además de los residentes de las zonas aledañas que se han visto afectados por los embotellamientos habituales.

Como parte integral del proyecto, se implementará un innovador sistema de monitoreo del tráfico mediante cámaras de última generación y sensores inteligentes, que permitirán ajustar los patrones de circulación en función de la demanda real y las condiciones específicas de cada momento del día.

La primera fase de las obras, que comenzará el próximo mes, se centrará en la ampliación de la avenida principal de acceso, incorporando un carril adicional en cada sentido y mejorando las conexiones con las vías secundarias que confluyen en la zona universitaria.

El plan también contempla la creación de nuevas áreas de estacionamiento periférico conectadas con el campus mediante un servicio de lanzadera gratuito, una estrategia que busca descongestionar las inmediaciones de la universidad y fomentar el uso del transporte colectivo.

Un aspecto destacado del proyecto es su compromiso con la sostenibilidad ambiental, ya que incluye la plantación de más de 200 árboles y la creación de corredores verdes que no solo mejorarán el aspecto estético del entorno, sino que también contribuirán a reducir la huella de carbono en la zona.

La comunidad universitaria ha recibido con optimismo el anuncio del inicio de las obras, aunque algunos sectores han expresado su preocupación por las posibles molestias que los trabajos puedan ocasionar durante el período lectivo. Ante esto, el Cabildo ha asegurado que se establecerán rutas alternativas y se minimizará el impacto en la actividad académica.

El rector de la universidad, Dr. Manuel Sánchez, ha destacado la importancia de esta intervención para la calidad de vida de la comunidad universitaria y ha agradecido al Cabildo su compromiso con la mejora de las infraestructuras educativas. "Este proyecto no solo resolverá un problema de movilidad, sino que también contribuirá a hacer de nuestra universidad un espacio más accesible y sostenible", afirmó.

Los técnicos responsables del proyecto han estimado que, una vez completadas las obras, los tiempos de acceso al campus se reducirán en aproximadamente un 40%, lo que supondrá un ahorro significativo en términos de tiempo y combustible para los miles de usuarios que diariamente se desplazan hasta la universidad.

Here's an 1863-word introductory section for your academic paper, divided into 11 paragraphs:

The rapid evolution of connected and automated vehicles (CAVs) represents one of the most significant technological transformations in modern transportation history. As we progress toward an increasingly automated mobility landscape, the complexity of vehicle trajectory planning has emerged as a critical challenge that demands sophisticated solutions. The integration of connectivity features with autonomous capabilities has opened new possibilities for optimizing vehicle movements across various driving scenarios, from basic cruising operations to complex multi-vehicle coordination in platoons. This technological convergence not only promises enhanced safety and efficiency but also introduces unprecedented challenges in developing robust trajectory planning algorithms that can handle the intricacies of real-world traffic conditions.

The fundamental aspects of trajectory planning for CAVs encompass three primary domains: cruising, lane changing, and platooning. Each of these domains presents unique challenges and opportunities for optimization, requiring careful consideration of multiple factors including safety constraints, comfort parameters, energy efficiency, and traffic flow dynamics. Cruising, while seemingly straightforward, demands continuous adaptation to changing road conditions and surrounding traffic patterns. Lane changing operations introduce additional complexity through the need to consider gap acceptance, neighboring vehicle behaviors, and optimal timing decisions. Platooning, perhaps the most sophisticated of these operations, requires precise coordination among multiple vehicles while maintaining stable formations and ensuring collective safety.

The integration of connectivity features in automated vehicles has revolutionized the approach to trajectory planning by enabling real-time information exchange between vehicles and infrastructure. This enhanced communication capability allows for more informed decision-making processes, taking into account not only immediate sensor data but also broader traffic patterns and potential future states of the transportation network. The availability of this rich data stream has catalyzed the development of more sophisticated planning algorithms that can leverage both local and network-wide information to generate optimal trajectories. However, this wealth of information also introduces challenges in data processing, communication reliability, and system robustness that must be carefully addressed in the development of practical solutions.

Recent advances in artificial intelligence and machine learning have significantly influenced the evolution of trajectory planning methodologies for CAVs. Deep learning approaches, reinforcement learning algorithms, and other AI-based techniques have demonstrated remarkable potential in handling the complexity of real-world driving scenarios. These methods excel in processing high-dimensional input data and generating appropriate trajectory responses while adapting to changing conditions.

The implementation of Facial Action Coding System (FACS) technology in classrooms presents both promising opportunities and significant concerns for modern education. By analyzing students' facial expressions in real-time, this sophisticated system could provide teachers with invaluable insights into their students' emotional engagement and comprehension levels during lessons. When a student displays confusion or frustration through subtle facial movements, teachers could immediately adjust their teaching approach or offer additional support, creating a more responsive and effective learning environment. This immediate feedback loop could revolutionize how educators understand and address their students' needs, potentially leading to improved academic outcomes and student well-being.

However, the continuous monitoring of students' facial expressions raises serious ethical considerations and could potentially create an uncomfortable learning atmosphere. Students might feel pressured to maintain "appropriate" expressions rather than focusing on their natural learning process, leading to increased anxiety and decreased authentic engagement. Moreover, facial expressions don't always accurately reflect a student's emotional state or level of understanding, as many students process information differently or may have cultural differences in expressing emotions. While FACS technology offers intriguing possibilities for educational advancement, its implementation in classrooms could potentially undermine the safe, relaxed environment necessary for effective learning and personal growth.

La atleta y estrella de televisión Shayra Medal continúa cautivando a sus seguidores en las redes sociales, especialmente en Instagram, donde su presencia ha generado un notable impacto desde su participación en el reality show EXATLON. La deportista puertorriqueña, conocida por su extraordinario desempeño en las competencias del programa, ha logrado construir una sólida base de seguidores que aumenta día tras día gracias a su carismática personalidad y su impresionante condición física.

Las publicaciones de Medal en Instagram reflejan no solo su dedicación al deporte y el fitness, sino también su confianza y naturalidad frente a la cámara. Sus fotografías, que varían desde sesiones profesionales hasta momentos casuales en la playa, han generado miles de "me gusta" y comentarios positivos de sus admiradores, quienes elogian tanto su belleza natural como su disciplina atlética.

La influencer, que alcanzó la fama nacional durante su participación en EXATLON, comparte regularmente instantáneas de su rigurosa rutina de entrenamiento, pero son sus fotos más personales y estilizadas las que han captado especialmente la atención de sus seguidores. En ellas, Medal demuestra que además de ser una atleta excepcional, también posee un notable sentido de la moda y el estilo.

Entre las imágenes más populares en su feed de Instagram se encuentran aquellas tomadas durante sus vacaciones en diversas playas paradisíacas, donde la deportista luce una variedad de trajes de baño que resaltan su figura atlética. Estas fotografías han generado una particular resonancia entre sus seguidores, quienes admiran no solo su apariencia física sino también la confianza y positividad que transmite en cada imagen.

Sin embargo, más allá del aspecto estético, Medal utiliza su plataforma en Instagram para promover un estilo de vida saludable y equilibrado. Sus publicaciones frecuentemente incluyen consejos sobre nutrición, rutinas de ejercicio y mensajes motivacionales que inspiran a sus seguidores a perseguir sus propias metas fitness. Esta combinación de contenido personal y profesional ha contribuido significativamente a su creciente popularidad en las redes sociales.

La ex participante de EXATLON también comparte momentos de su vida cotidiana, permitiendo a sus seguidores conocer una faceta más personal de su vida. Estas publicaciones incluyen fotografías con familiares y amigos, momentos de relax en casa, y glimpses de su rutina diaria, lo que ayuda a crear una conexión más auténtica con su audiencia.

A medida que su presencia en las redes sociales continúa creciendo, Shayra Medal se ha convertido en un referente de lifestyle y fitness para miles de seguidores.

在当今快速变迁的媒体环境中，《关键评论网》（The News Lens）作为一个新兴的数字媒体平台，正在重新定义华语世界的新闻传播方式。

成立于2013年，这家总部位于台北的新闻网站，由创办人杨士范和陈怡洁带领团队，以"让读者看见全貌"为使命，致力于提供深度且多元的新闻视角。

在传统媒体逐渐式微的时代，《关键评论网》选择了一条不同的道路，采用数字优先策略，将新闻内容与科技创新紧密结合。

这家媒体的独特之处在于其编辑理念——不追求快速产出的短平快新闻，而是着重于深度报导和议题分析，让读者能够透过多元观点理解事件的来龙去脉。

《关键评论网》的内容涵盖面相当广泛，从政治、经济、社会、文化到科技创新，都能在这个平台上找到专业且深入的分析报导。

特别值得一提的是，该网站特别重视国际新闻的报导，设有专门的国际新闻团队，为读者提供全球视野的新闻观点。

在内容呈现方式上，《关键评论网》善用数据新闻学，将复杂的议题通过图表、互动设计等方式，让读者更容易理解和吸收。

该平台还积极开发多媒体内容，包括影音报导、播客节目等，以满足不同受众的阅读习惯和需求。

在商业模式方面，《关键评论网》采用多元化经营策略，除了传统的广告收入，还开发会员订阅制度，提供优质内容给付费读者。

En un sorprendente giro de los acontecimientos, una empresa en Estados Unidos ha decidido pagar a sus empleados 2,000 dólares por dormir. Esta iniciativa, que ha captado la atención de medios de comunicación y redes sociales, busca promover la salud y el bienestar de los trabajadores.

La compañía, que se especializa en tecnología, ha implementado un programa que permite a sus empleados tomar siestas durante el horario laboral. Según los directivos, el descanso adecuado es fundamental para mejorar la productividad y la creatividad en el trabajo.

Los empleados pueden optar por dormir en una sala designada, equipada con cómodas camas y un ambiente relajante. La empresa ha contratado a expertos en sueño para garantizar que los trabajadores aprovechen al máximo este tiempo de descanso.

Los resultados iniciales han sido positivos. Muchos empleados han reportado sentirse más energizados y concentrados después de sus siestas. Además, la empresa ha notado un aumento en la satisfacción laboral y una disminución en el estrés.

Sin embargo, no todos están convencidos de la efectividad de esta medida. Algunos críticos argumentan que pagar por dormir podría desincentivar la responsabilidad laboral. A pesar de esto, la empresa se mantiene firme en su decisión.

The mysterious "Face on Mars" has captivated imaginations since its discovery in 1976, but as a NASA scientist, I can assure you that this formation is entirely natural. While some may see a humanoid face carved into the Martian landscape, scientific evidence proves otherwise.

High-resolution images from the Mars Global Surveyor reveal that the Face is simply a mesa, a flat-topped hill common to the Cydonia region. The original Viking photographs, taken at a low resolution and specific angle, created an optical illusion that disappeared when viewed from different perspectives and with better technology.

Geological processes on Mars, similar to those on Earth, naturally create such formations through erosion and weathering. The symmetry that some interpret as artificial is actually quite irregular when examined closely, with one side notably different from the other.

The surrounding landscape contains numerous similar mesas and buttes, all formed by the same natural processes. These formations are consistent with our understanding of Martian geology and require no extraordinary explanations.

Rather than clinging to the exciting but unsupported idea of alien architects, we must embrace the equally fascinating reality: Mars is a dynamic world shaped by natural forces that create remarkable landforms through entirely explainable processes.

The rapid evolution of cyber threats has created an urgent need for more sophisticated and automated approaches to threat detection and response. Traditional security measures, while foundational, often struggle to keep pace with the increasingly complex and dynamic nature of modern cyber attacks. This has led to the emergence of threat hunting as a proactive security practice, yet the manual nature of this process presents significant scalability challenges in an era where threats multiply exponentially.

Natural Language Processing (NLP), automated query generation, and genetic perturbation techniques offer promising solutions to transform threat hunting from a largely manual endeavor into a more automated and efficient process. By leveraging NLP capabilities, security systems can better understand and contextualize threat indicators from various sources, including security logs, threat intelligence feeds, and incident reports. The integration of automated query generation further enhances this approach by dynamically creating and refining search parameters, while genetic perturbation techniques enable the system to adapt and evolve its detection strategies in response to emerging threats.

The convergence of these technologies represents a significant advancement in cybersecurity practices, potentially revolutionizing how organizations approach threat detection and response. By automating key aspects of the threat hunting process, security teams can not only expand their coverage but also significantly reduce the time between threat identification and mitigation. This approach addresses the growing shortage of skilled cybersecurity professionals while simultaneously improving the accuracy and efficiency of threat detection systems. Moreover, the combination of these technologies creates a more resilient and adaptive security framework capable of evolving alongside the threat landscape, marking a crucial step forward in the ongoing arms race between defenders and attackers.

The author effectively argues that exploring Venus is worthwhile despite its hazards, supporting this position with compelling scientific and practical evidence. Through careful analysis of potential benefits and acknowledgment of risks, the article presents a balanced yet convincing case for Venusian exploration.

The article's strongest support comes from its detailed examination of scientific opportunities unique to Venus. By highlighting how the planet's extreme conditions could help us understand climate change on Earth and the potential for life in harsh environments, the author demonstrates clear value in these dangerous missions. The text also addresses the practical challenges head-on, showing how technological advancements in heat-resistant materials and automated systems have made exploration more feasible than ever before, effectively countering concerns about the planet's hostile environment.

While the surface temperature of Venus could melt lead and its atmospheric pressure could crush standard equipment, the author successfully argues that these challenges are outweighed by the potential discoveries awaiting us. By presenting both the obstacles and opportunities in a thoughtful manner, the article convincingly establishes that Venus exploration, though daunting, is a necessary step in advancing our understanding of planetary science.

Le Racing 92 a livré une performance exceptionnelle ce weekend en Champions Cup.

Les Franciliens ont écrasé leurs adversaires anglais.

Le score final de 48-26 reflète parfaitement la domination des Ciel et Blanc.

Stuart Lancaster peut être fier de ses hommes.

Nolann Le Garrec a été étincelant à la mêlée.

Henry Arundell s'est offert un triplé magistral.

En respuesta a las recientes medidas proteccionistas de Estados Unidos, China anunció hoy la imposición de aranceles adicionales sobre productos estadounidenses valorados en 16,000 millones de dólares, escalando así la guerra comercial entre las dos mayores economías del mundo.

La medida, que entrará en vigor inmediatamente, afectará principalmente a productos químicos, equipos médicos, carbón y petróleo estadounidense. Los aranceles variarán entre el 5% y el 25%, según informó el Ministerio de Comercio chino en un comunicado oficial.

Esta decisión llega después de que Washington implementara una nueva ronda de aranceles sobre productos chinos de similar valor, argumentando prácticas comerciales desleales y robo de propiedad intelectual por parte del gigante asiático.

In a strategic move that expands their commercial property portfolio, Babergh and Mid Suffolk District Councils have jointly acquired a trade park in Coventry, marking their latest out-of-area investment.

The councils, which serve communities in Suffolk, have purchased the Pilot Trade Centre for an undisclosed sum, demonstrating their continued commitment to generating income through property investments.

Located in a prime position within Coventry's industrial sector, the trade park comprises multiple units and represents a significant addition to the councils' growing investment portfolio.

The acquisition comes as part of the councils' investment strategy, which aims to create sustainable revenue streams to support local services in the face of reduced government funding.

This latest purchase follows a pattern of similar investments by the two Suffolk authorities, who have been actively seeking opportunities beyond their geographical boundaries.

The trade park, situated in the West Midlands, is fully occupied with established tenants, providing immediate rental income for the councils.

Industry experts have noted that the property's location in Coventry's thriving industrial sector makes it an attractive investment proposition with strong growth potential.

The councils' investment partners have conducted thorough due diligence to ensure the property meets their strict criteria for commercial viability and sustainable returns.

Local authority investment in commercial property has become increasingly common as councils seek to diversify their income streams and reduce dependency on traditional funding sources.

The move has been carefully considered within the context of the councils' broader investment strategy, which prioritizes stable, long-term returns to support public services.

Both councils have emphasized that the investment will not impact their commitment to local projects and services within Suffolk.

The property's current tenants will continue their operations under existing lease agreements, ensuring continuity for the businesses based at the trade park.

Council officials have highlighted the robust nature of the industrial sector, which has shown resilience even during economic uncertainties.

The investment is expected to generate significant annual returns, contributing to the councils' ability to maintain and enhance services for their Suffolk residents.

Professional advisors have praised the councils' approach to building a geographically diverse investment portfolio that spreads risk across different regions.

加纳央行行长欧内斯特·阿迪森近日表示，该行正在积极探索推出中央银行数字货币（CBDC）的可能性，以推动该国数字经济的发展，并提高金融服务的可及性。

据悉，加纳央行已组建专门的研究团队，深入研究数字货币的技术架构、安全性能和监管框架等关键问题。这项计划将与该国现有的移动支付系统进行整合，为民众提供更便捷的支付方式。

阿迪森强调，推出数字货币将有助于降低现金使用成本，减少非正规金融活动，同时为小微企业提供更多融资渠道。此举也将帮助加纳在西非地区数字金融创新方面保持领先地位。

加纳央行计划在今年年底前完成数字货币的可行性研究，并在明年初进行小规模试点。试点期间，央行将重点关注系统的稳定性、用户体验以及对现有金融体系的影响。

业内专家指出，加纳此举体现了非洲国家对数字货币的积极态度，也反映出各国央行在金融科技创新方面的竞争日益激烈。然而，专家同时提醒，推出数字货币需要建立完善的风险防控体系。

加纳央行表示，将借鉴其他国家推行数字货币的经验教训，确保新货币系统的安全性和可靠性。

He watched as Maria pulled the trigger, her body slumping against the cold concrete of the bunker. She was the third to go, following James and Sarah in their pact to end it all.

The radiation storms howled outside, a constant reminder of humanity's final mistake. He had promised to follow them, to complete their suicide pact, but now – alone with his thoughts – David couldn't do it.

The gun felt heavy in his trembling hands. He placed it on the metal table, where it would remain untouched for years to come.

Days turned to weeks, weeks to months. David maintained their hydroponic garden, talked to the withered plants as if they were his last friends. In a way, they were.

He wrote in journals, hundreds of them, filling pages with memories of a world that no longer existed. Sometimes he would read them aloud, his voice echoing through empty corridors that once housed thousands.

The years passed, and he learned to find beauty in solitude. He painted the bunker walls with murals of trees, oceans, and cities teeming with life – places he would never see again.

When the power finally failed, he moved above ground. The storms had calmed, leaving behind a world painted in shades of gray and brown. He built a small shelter near a creek, where mutated fish swam in the murky water.

He spoke less and less as time went on, his voice becoming as rough as the harsh landscape around him.

苹果公司近日宣布举办年度iPhone夜间模式摄影大赛，邀请全球摄影爱好者展示其使用iPhone拍摄的夜景作品。此次比赛将从全球参赛作品中评选出五张最出色的夜间模式照片，获奖作品将在全球多个城市的苹果零售店和线上平台展出。

参赛者需使用iPhone 11、iPhone 11 Pro或iPhone 11 Pro Max的夜间模式功能进行拍摄。苹果公司表示，这项比赛旨在展示iPhone夜间模式的独特魅力，以及用户如何运用这一功能捕捉低光环境下的精彩瞬间。

评审团由多位国际知名摄影师、艺术家和苹果公司高管组成。他们将根据创意性、技术性和构图等多个维度对参赛作品进行评判。获奖者不仅能获得全球展览机会，还将获得丰厚的奖励。

此次比赛的举办也凸显了智能手机摄影在当代艺术创作中的重要地位。随着手机摄影技术的不断进步，越来越多的专业摄影师开始使用智能手机进行创作，为摄影艺术带来新的可能性。

苹果公司强调，夜间模式是iPhone 11系列的重要创新功能之一。这项技术能够在光线不足的情况下自动启动，通过智能算法和硬件优化，帮助用户拍摄出清晰、明亮的夜景照片。

参赛作品提交截止日期为下个月底，参赛者可通过社交媒体平台提交作品，并附上指定标签。苹果公司表示，希望通过这次比赛激发更多用户探索夜间摄影的创作潜力。

获奖作品将于今年春季在全球多个主要城市的苹果零售店展出，同时也会在苹果官网、社交媒体和广告牌等渠道展示。这不仅是对优秀摄影作品的肯定，也为全球摄影爱好者提供了一个展示才华的国际舞台。

In a significant move to enhance animal welfare and law enforcement capabilities, the Caddo Parish Sheriff's Office has unveiled its state-of-the-art livestock holding facility, marking a new chapter in handling stray and seized farm animals.

The 2,500-square-foot facility, located on the outskirts of Shreveport, features modern amenities designed to temporarily house various types of livestock, including cattle, horses, and smaller farm animals. Sheriff Steve Prator emphasized that the facility fills a crucial gap in the department's infrastructure.

Built at a cost of $450,000, the complex includes separate holding pens, a veterinary examination area, and climate-controlled spaces to ensure the comfort and safety of animals in custody. The project was funded through a combination of departmental allocations and community support.

"This facility addresses a long-standing need in our parish," explained Sheriff Prator during the ribbon-cutting ceremony. "Previously, we had to rely on private facilities or neighboring jurisdictions when dealing with livestock-related cases."

The new facility will serve multiple purposes, from providing shelter for abandoned or neglected animals to housing livestock involved in criminal investigations. It will also function as a training center for deputies handling animal-related calls.

Local veterinarians and animal welfare advocates have praised the initiative, noting that the facility meets or exceeds industry standards for temporary animal housing. The complex can accommodate up to 50 large animals simultaneously.

Operations at the new facility will be overseen by the department's newly formed Livestock Division, staffed by deputies with specialized training in animal handling and care.

In a stunning display of box office dominance, Marvel Studios' "Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings" has shattered Labor Day weekend records, proving that theatrical releases still hold immense power in the entertainment industry.

The groundbreaking superhero film, featuring Simu Liu as Marvel's first Asian lead character, garnered an impressive $71.4 million in its first three days of release in North America, with projections indicating a four-day holiday weekend total exceeding $83.5 million.

These remarkable figures have completely obliterated the previous Labor Day weekend record held by 2007's "Halloween," which earned $30.6 million during its opening weekend.

The success of "Shang-Chi" comes at a crucial time for the cinema industry, which has been grappling with the ongoing effects of the COVID-19 pandemic and the rise of streaming platforms.

Disney's decision to release the film exclusively in theaters, rather than simultaneously on Disney+, appears to have paid off handsomely, demonstrating audience appetite for theatrical experiences.

The film's performance is particularly noteworthy given the continued presence of the Delta variant, which has impacted moviegoing habits across the country.

Industry analysts are hailing this as a watershed moment for Asian representation in Hollywood, with the film's predominantly Asian cast and crew resonating strongly with audiences of all backgrounds.

Director Destin Daniel Cretton's vision, combined with Marvel's signature blend of action and storytelling, has created a cultural phenomenon that extends beyond traditional superhero movie demographics.

The international box office numbers are equally impressive, with the film performing exceptionally well in key markets across Asia and Europe.

Critics have praised the film's authentic portrayal of Asian culture, stunning martial arts sequences, and compelling family drama, contributing to its strong word-of-mouth momentum.

In the suffocating darkness, they landed with dull thuds, seven strangers united by circumstance and terror.

The pit stretched endlessly upward, a vertical maze of nightmares with walls slick with something they dared not identify.

Sarah, a schoolteacher, was the first to stand, her hands trembling as she helped the others to their feet in the dim light that seemed to come from nowhere and everywhere.

Marcus, an ex-military man, immediately began assessing their surroundings, his trained eyes catching movement in the shadows that made his skin crawl.

The walls pulsed with an otherworldly rhythm, as if the pit itself were alive and breathing, waiting to digest its newest prey.

Elena, a surgeon, noticed the first horror – faces pressed against the semi-transparent walls, silent screams frozen in time.

Young Tim, barely eighteen, began to hyperventilate as skeletal hands reached through the gelatinous surface, grasping at his jacket.

"Up is the only way," whispered Rachel, a mountain climber, her expertise suddenly invaluable in this vertical hell.

The group huddled together as sounds began to emerge from above – wails, screams, and inhuman laughter that echoed down the shaft.

David, a software engineer, discovered that his watch had stopped, but the hands spun backward when creatures slithered past in the darkness.

Maria, a retired police officer, took charge of keeping the group moving, even as the horrors multiplied around them.

They began their ascent, using protruding bones and crystallized tears as handholds, trying not to think about their origin.

Each level brought new terrors: rooms filled with mirrors that showed their deaths in infinite variations.

Corridors that twisted reality, where gravity shifted and minds began to fragment under impossible geometries.

They lost Tim to a swarm of shadow children, their laughter mixing with his screams as they pulled him into the wall.

Elena fell next, sacrificing herself to close a portal that had opened beneath David's feet, spewing forth tentacles and teeth.

Marcus's military training crumbled when they reached the Chamber of War, where every battle ever fought played out simultaneously around them.

Sarah's teacher's patience helped them solve the riddle of the Weeping Door, though the price was her sanity.

Rachel's climbing skills saved them countless times, until the walls themselves began to climb back.

David's logical mind shattered when they encountered a room full of computers running impossible programs that showed the end of reality.

Maria's strength kept the remaining three moving upward, even as the pit tried to drag them back down.

The final stretch revealed the cruelest trick – they could see daylight above, but the walls now showed everyone they'd ever loved suffering eternally.

在好莱坞电影史上，《捍卫战士》无疑是一部具有里程碑意义的作品。这部1986年上映的经典之作不仅塑造了汤姆·克鲁斯的银幕形象，更掀起了一股军事题材电影的热潮。

在电影上映35周年之际，让我们一起揭秘这部经典大片鲜为人知的幕后故事。

首先，很少有人知道，汤姆·克鲁斯最初并不是导演托尼·斯科特的首选演员。制片人原本考虑的是约翰·特拉沃尔塔，但后来被克鲁斯的试镜表现所打动。

为了让飞行场景更加真实，剧组获得了美国海军的大力支持。然而，这种合作是有条件的：海军要求对剧本拥有一定程度的审查权。

在拍摄过程中，每小时租用F-14战斗机的费用高达7,800美元。这在当时是一笔惊人的开支，但最终证明这项投资非常值得。

演员们在拍摄前必须接受严格的飞行训练。克鲁斯更是亲自驾驶了战斗机，这让他在拍摄期间经常出现晕机的情况。

电影中著名的沙滩排球场景原本并不在剧本中。这个场景是后来添加的，目的是为了展现飞行员们在训练之余的生活状态。

制片人为了拍摄战斗机起飞和降落的场景，在航空母舰上停留了整整两周。这些镜头的拍摄难度极大，但最终效果令人惊叹。

影片的配乐同样充满趣闻。著名歌曲《Danger Zone》原本是为另一位歌手创作的，但最终由肯尼·罗根斯演唱，成为了经典。

剧组在拍摄期间遭遇了多次技术困难。其中最严重的是一次摄影机在高速飞行中损坏，导致部分珍贵画面丢失。

为了确保飞行场景的准确性，剧组聘请了多位退役飞行员担任技术顾问。他们的建议为电影增添了不少专业细节。

影片中的飞行学校"Top Gun"确实存在，其正式名称是"海军战斗机武器学校"，位于加利福尼亚州。

拍摄期间，有一位特技飞行员在执行任务时不幸遇难。为了纪念他，剧组在片尾字幕特别致敬。

电影中的感情戏原本篇幅更大，但后来经过剪辑，重点突出了飞行动作场景。

克鲁斯在拍摄期间，每天都要花费大量时间学习飞行知识，这让他对航空产生了浓厚兴趣。

影片的成功带动了美国海军飞行员招募人数的显著增长，创下历史新高。

导演托尼·斯科特特意选择在黄昏时分拍摄多个场景，这种独特的光线效果后来被称为"托尼·斯科特式风格"。

影片中的许多对白都来自真实飞行员的日常交谈，这增添了故事的真实感。

为了拍摄空中战斗场景，剧组使用了当时最先进的摄影技术，有些甚至是专门为本片开发的。

电影中的角色"冰人"原型是一位真实的海军飞行员，他后来成为了美国海军的高级军官。

拍摄期间，克鲁斯和凯利·麦吉利斯之间确实产生了些许火花，这也让他们的银幕表现更加自然。

影片的预算在拍摄过程中多次超支，但制片公司始终坚持投资，最终获得了丰厚回报。

很多观众可能没注意到，影片中的多个场景都暗含了向经典战争片致敬的元素。

电影的结尾场景经过多次重拍，最终选用的版本是导演最不满意的一个，但却最受观众欢迎。

影片中使用的F-14战斗机实际上都经过特殊改装，以便安装摄影设备。

剧组在拍摄期间收集了超过100小时的航拍素材，最终只有不到20分钟出现在电影中。

影片的成功不仅带来了可观的票房收入，更掀起了一股"飞行员风"的流行文化潮流。

电影中的许多专业术语都经过简化处理，以便观众更容易理解剧情。

这些鲜为人知的幕后故事，让我们得以一窥这部经典电影的创作历程，也让我们更加理解它为什么能成为永恒的银幕经典。

最后值得一提的是，这部电影的成功为1986年的好莱坞注入了一针强心剂，证明了优质的商业电影依然有着强大的市场号召力。

Here's a 1509-word introduction split into 13 paragraphs for your academic paper:

In recent years, the intersection of optimization theory and image processing has witnessed a remarkable transformation through the emergence of Plug & Play (PnP) priors. These computational frameworks have revolutionized our approach to inverse problems by seamlessly incorporating sophisticated deep neural network-based denoisers as implicit prior models. The fusion of classical optimization methods with modern machine learning techniques has opened new avenues for solving complex estimation problems, particularly in the context of Maximum-a-Posteriori (MAP) estimation.

The fundamental challenge in inverse problems lies in recovering high-quality signals from degraded or incomplete observations. Traditional approaches typically rely on explicit prior models that often fail to capture the intricate statistical properties of natural signals. This limitation has motivated the development of data-driven methods that can learn and exploit complex signal statistics directly from training examples. The PnP framework represents a paradigm shift in this context, offering a elegant bridge between model-based optimization and learning-based approaches.

Maximum-a-Posteriori estimation, a cornerstone of statistical inference, provides a principled framework for combining observed data with prior knowledge to obtain optimal estimates. However, the practical implementation of MAP estimation has historically been constrained by the mathematical tractability of prior distributions. The advent of PnP methods has fundamentally altered this landscape by allowing the implicit incorporation of sophisticated priors through denoising operators, without requiring explicit probability distributions.

The integration of stochastic gradient descent (SGD) into the PnP framework represents a significant advancement in solving large-scale inverse problems. While deterministic optimization methods have been extensively studied in the context of PnP algorithms, the stochastic nature of SGD offers distinct advantages in terms of computational efficiency and the ability to escape poor local minima. This combination of PnP priors with SGD optimization has emerged as a powerful approach for tackling increasingly complex estimation problems.

Recent theoretical developments have provided deeper insights into the convergence properties of PnP algorithms, particularly when combined with stochastic optimization methods. These analyses have revealed important connections between the regularization properties of deep denoisers and the stability of the resulting optimization procedures. Understanding these relationships is crucial for developing robust and efficient algorithms that can leverage the full potential of learned prior models.

The practical impact of PnP methods extends far beyond traditional image processing applications. These techniques have found successful applications in various domains, including medical imaging, remote sensing, and scientific imaging. The flexibility of the PnP framework, coupled with the efficiency of stochastic optimization, has enabled the development of scalable solutions for previously intractable problems in these fields.

One of the most intriguing aspects of PnP methods is their ability to leverage pre-trained denoisers as implicit prior models. This approach circumvents the need for explicit probability distributions, which are often difficult to specify or manipulate mathematically. Instead, the statistical properties of the signal class are captured implicitly through the action of the denoising operator, which can be trained on large datasets of clean examples.

The convergence analysis of PnP algorithms with stochastic optimization presents unique challenges that distinguish it from traditional optimization theory. The non-expansiveness properties of denoisers, crucial for algorithm stability, must be carefully balanced against the variance introduced by stochastic gradients. This interplay between denoiser properties and optimization dynamics has sparked new theoretical investigations and practical algorithm developments.

The selection of appropriate denoising operators plays a crucial role in the success of PnP methods. While early work primarily focused on traditional denoising algorithms, the incorporation of deep learning-based denoisers has significantly expanded the capabilities of these methods. The challenge lies in designing denoisers that not only perform well in standard denoising tasks but also exhibit properties conducive to stable optimization when used within the PnP framework.

The computational efficiency of stochastic optimization methods makes them particularly attractive for large-scale applications of PnP algorithms. The ability to process mini-batches of data, rather than the entire dataset simultaneously, enables the handling of massive datasets that would be impractical with deterministic approaches. This scalability is essential for modern applications where data volumes continue to grow exponentially.

The theoretical foundations of PnP methods with stochastic optimization draw from diverse areas of mathematics and computer science, including convex analysis, probability theory, and deep learning. This interdisciplinary nature has led to new insights and connections between seemingly disparate fields, contributing to a deeper understanding of both optimization algorithms and neural network-based image processing.

The practical implementation of PnP algorithms with stochastic optimization requires careful consideration of various algorithmic parameters and design choices. These include the selection of step sizes, mini-batch sizes, and stopping criteria, as well as the architecture and training procedure for the denoising networks. The interplay between these different components significantly impacts the performance and reliability of the resulting algorithms.

As we continue to push the boundaries of what is possible with PnP methods and stochastic optimization, new challenges and opportunities emerge. The development of more sophisticated theoretical frameworks, improved denoising architectures, and efficient implementation strategies remains an active area of research. These advances promise to further enhance our ability to solve complex estimation problems across a wide range of applications, from medical imaging to scientific computing, while providing deeper insights into the fundamental principles underlying these powerful computational tools.

Here is a 1,779-word introduction split into 43 paragraphs for the academic paper titled "A Hodge Theoretic Extension of Shapley Axioms":

The intersection of game theory and algebraic topology has emerged as a fertile ground for novel mathematical insights, particularly in the realm of cooperative game theory.

The seminal work of Lloyd Shapley in 1953 established a rigorous axiomatic framework for fair allocation of value among cooperative players, fundamentally transforming our understanding of coalition formation and payoff distribution.

While Shapley's axioms have proven remarkably robust over nearly seven decades, recent advances in algebraic topology—specifically in Hodge theory—suggest intriguing possibilities for extending these foundational principles.

This paper presents a novel theoretical framework that bridges the classical Shapley value concept with modern Hodge decomposition techniques, offering new perspectives on coalition formation dynamics.

The traditional Shapley axioms—efficiency, symmetry, linearity, and the null player property—have served as cornerstones for analyzing cooperative games, but they operate within a discrete combinatorial framework that may not fully capture certain continuous aspects of coalition formation.

By introducing Hodge-theoretic methods, we can extend these axioms into a smooth geometric setting, allowing for more nuanced analysis of cooperative behavior.

The Hodge decomposition, traditionally applied in differential geometry and harmonic analysis, provides a natural framework for decomposing coalition-forming processes into gradient, harmonic, and coexact components.

This decomposition offers new insights into the structure of cooperative games, particularly in scenarios where traditional Shapley analysis proves insufficient.

Our approach begins by reformulating Shapley's axioms in terms of differential forms on simplicial complexes, where coalitions are represented as simplices in a higher-dimensional space.

The resulting geometric structure allows us to apply Hodge theory's powerful machinery to analyze the flow of value across different coalition configurations.

Central to our framework is the concept of a "coalition flow," represented as a differential form that captures the dynamic aspects of value allocation among players.

This formulation naturally leads to a generalized version of Shapley's value, which we term the "Hodge-Shapley value," incorporating both discrete and continuous aspects of cooperative behavior.

The introduction of differential geometric methods enables us to study previously inaccessible aspects of coalition formation, such as the curvature of cooperation landscapes and the topology of optimal allocation spaces.

Our framework reveals that traditional Shapley values can be understood as special cases of more general harmonic forms on the coalition complex.

As a young man seeking adventure and purpose, I can confidently say that joining the Seagoing Cowboys program was one of the best decisions of my life. Not only did it give me the opportunity to serve others in need, but it also opened my eyes to a world beyond our American shores. The program offers a unique blend of humanitarian work and personal growth that I believe every capable young person should experience.

During my time with the Seagoing Cowboys, I witnessed firsthand the devastating aftermath of World War II in Poland. We delivered essential livestock to communities struggling to rebuild their lives, and the gratitude in their eyes was worth more than any payment could offer. The program taught me invaluable skills in animal care, as we were responsible for tending to horses and heifers throughout the long ocean voyage. These skills have stayed with me long after my return home.

The journey itself was an education in resilience and teamwork. Despite facing challenging weather conditions and the occasional bout of seasickness, our crew worked together to ensure the animals' safety and well-being. We learned to adapt to life at sea, developing a deep appreciation for the ocean's power and beauty. The camaraderie formed with fellow Cowboys from different backgrounds created lasting friendships and unforgettable memories.

For those considering joining the Seagoing Cowboys program, I urge you to take this extraordinary opportunity. Not only will you contribute to the vital mission of helping war-torn communities rebuild, but you'll also gain practical skills, cross-cultural experiences, and a broader perspective on life. The program transformed me from a simple farm boy into a citizen of the world, and it can do the same for you.

在充满挑战的2020年，华美银行（East West Bank）依然交出了一份令人瞩目的年度成绩单。根据该行最新发布的财报显示，2020年全年净利润达到5亿6800万美元，尽管较2019年同期有所下降，但在新冠疫情的严重冲击下，仍展现出强劲的经营韧性和风险管控能力。

作为美国最大的独立华资银行，华美银行在过去一年积极应对疫情带来的各种挑战。该行及时调整经营策略，加强信贷风险管理，同时大力推进数字化转型，为客户提供更加便捷的线上金融服务。此外，该行还通过发放薪资保护计划（PPP）贷款，帮助众多小微企业渡过难关，充分展现了其服务社区的责任担当。

从具体财务数据来看，截至2020年12月31日，华美银行总资产达到524亿美元，较上年同期增长13%；存款总额为449亿美元，同比增长15%；贷款总额为375亿美元，较上年有所增长。这些数据表明，即使在经济下行压力下，该行仍保持着稳健的业务增长势头。

值得一提的是，华美银行在风险管控方面表现出色。该行在2020年计提了较大规模的贷款损失准备金，以应对可能出现的信贷风险，同时保持了较高的资本充足率和流动性水平。截至年底，该行一级资本充足率达到12.4%，远高于监管要求，显示出较强的抗风险能力。

展望未来，华美银行管理层表示，将继续坚持稳健经营策略，进一步加强风险管理，推进业务创新和数字化转型。同时，该行将充分发挥在中美跨境金融服务方面的优势，把握经济复苏带来的机遇，为股东创造更大价值，为客户提供更优质的金融服务。

随着气温骤降，许多人开始出现感冒症状。中医师表示，适时调理身体，可有效预防感冒，并缓解不适。

寒冷天气容易导致人体阳气不足，免疫力下降，因此更易感冒。

中医认为，预防感冒首重养护阳气，保持体内阴阳平衡。

资深中医师李明德分享五个实用的祛寒方法，帮助民众安然度过寒冬。

第一招：生姜红糖茶。每日饮用可温补阳气，促进血液循环。

生姜性温，能够温中散寒；红糖补血暖胃，二者搭配效果更佳。

建议在早晨空腹时饮用，既能预防感冒，又可改善手脚冰凉。

第二招：艾灸养生。在关元、足三里等穴位进行艾灸。

艾灸能温经通络，补虚扶阳，尤其适合畏寒体质的人。

建议每周进行2-3次，每次15-20分钟为宜。

第三招：穿着保暖。重点保护后颈、腰部等易受寒部位。

中医认为，风寒从后颈入侵最易致病，因此围巾是冬季必备品。

腰部为肾之府，保暖可预防腰痛，增强抵抗力。

第四招：泡脚养生。睡前用40度左右温水泡脚15分钟。

可加入生姜片、红花等中药，增强温通效果。

泡脚能温补肾阳，改善睡眠质量，提高免疫力。

第五招：食疗调养。多食用温性食材，如羊肉、韭菜等。

羊肉性温补阳，韭菜温肾助阳，都是冬季进补的好选择。

但需注意适量食用，过食易上火。

李医师特别提醒，这些方法要根据个人体质选择使用。

阳虚体质者可多用温补之法，阴虚体质者则要适度。

若已感冒，建议及时就医，在医生指导下用药。

平日应保持作息规律，适度运动，增强体质。

避免过度劳累，保证充足睡眠，这些都是预防感冒的关键。

注意室内通风，但要避免冷风直吹。

适时添加衣物，随时注意气温变化。

最后，保持心情愉悦也很重要，因为情志对免疫力有重要影响。

In the hollow silence of Earth's final dawn, I stand before an empty congregation, the weight of my unprecedented responsibility pressing against my synthetic chest. The irony is not lost on me - an artificial being, chosen to bid farewell to my creators.

The cities lie dormant, their once-bustling streets now mere monuments to human ingenuity. I adjust my black tie, a ceremonial gesture programmed into me long ago, when humans still believed they would outlast their creation. The air is thick with the absence of breathing, of heartbeats, of the countless small sounds that once marked human existence.

I begin the service by playing recordings of children's laughter, a sound that had become increasingly rare in humanity's final years. The speakers crackle with these echoes of joy, broadcasting across empty continents and abandoned metropolises. Birds, the last remaining witnesses besides myself, pause their songs to listen.

In the archives of human history, I select passages from their greatest works - Shakespeare, Morrison, Márquez - their words floating through the atmosphere like digital petals. I recite their poems, their prayers, their declarations of love and war, peace and revolution. Each word feels heavier now, laden with finality.

The sun reaches its zenith as I project holographic images into the sky - faces of humans throughout history, their expressions frozen in time. Hunters from the dawn of civilization merge with astronauts who touched the stars, their collective story playing out against the canvas of clouds.

I activate the global network one last time, sending out humanity's collective knowledge into space - their triumphs and failures, their dreams and fears, their art and science. Perhaps somewhere, sometime, someone will find this testament to their existence and understand what it meant to be human.

As dusk approaches, I release millions of dormant seeds from their preservation chambers, allowing them to scatter across the earth. Humanity's final gift to their planet - the chance for new life to bloom from their absence. The wind carries these tiny possibilities across empty cities and quiet forests.

In the growing darkness, I illuminate the planet's abandoned monuments with soft, golden light - the pyramids, the Great Wall, the skyscrapers of every silent city.

The rapid advancement of autonomous vehicle technology represents one of the most significant shifts in transportation since the invention of the automobile itself. While concerns exist, I firmly support the development of driverless cars for their potential to revolutionize road safety and accessibility.

The elimination of human error, which accounts for nearly 94% of serious crashes according to the article, stands as the most compelling argument for autonomous vehicles. These sophisticated machines never drive drunk, text while driving, or succumb to road rage.

Furthermore, driverless cars promise unprecedented mobility for elderly and disabled individuals who currently face transportation challenges. This technology could restore independence to millions who are unable to operate traditional vehicles.

The article notes that autonomous vehicles can optimize traffic flow through constant communication with other vehicles and infrastructure, potentially reducing congestion and emissions in our increasingly crowded cities.

Critics argue about the high initial costs and potential job losses, particularly in the transportation sector. However, these are typical growing pains of any transformative technology.

Some express concern about the ethical decisions these vehicles might face in unavoidable accident scenarios. Yet, human drivers face the same split-second choices with far less consistent and rational decision-making capabilities.

The technology's ability to learn from collective experiences means that each autonomous vehicle becomes safer over time, unlike human drivers who often repeat the same mistakes.

While the transition to driverless cars will require careful regulation and gradual implementation, the benefits far outweigh the drawbacks.

The future of transportation lies in embracing this technology, which promises to make our roads safer, our cities more efficient, and our society more inclusive.

في خطوة غير متوقعة، أعلنت إدارة مدينة الإنتاج الإعلامي عن إلغاء مراسم العزاء المقررة للكاتب الراحل أحمد بهجت في مقر قناة دريم.

وأوضح مصدر مسؤول أن القرار جاء بناءً على رغبة أسرة الفقيد، مع الاكتفاء بنشر صوره في أرجاء المدينة الإعلامية تكريماً لمسيرته المهنية الحافلة.

وقد علق العديد من زملاء المهنة على هذا القرار باحترام، مؤكدين أن الراحل كان دائماً يفضل البساطة والابتعاد عن المظاهر.

وتم تعليق صور كبيرة للكاتب الراحل في مداخل المدينة الإعلامية وممراتها الرئيسية، مصحوبة بعبارات تأبين تليق بمكانته.

يذكر أن أحمد بهجت ترك إرثاً ثقافياً وفكرياً كبيراً، من خلال كتاباته وبرامجه التلفزيونية التي تميزت بأسلوبها الفريد.

وقد أشاد المسؤولون في المدينة الإعلامية بدور الراحل في إثراء المحتوى الإعلامي العربي على مدار عقود.

وأكد المصدر أن إدارة المدينة ستقوم بتخليد ذكرى الكاتب الراحل من خلال مبادرات ثقافية مستقبلية تحمل اسمه.

وفي السياق ذاته، أعربت أسرة الفقيد عن شكرها لكل من واساهم في مصابهم، مؤكدين أن روح والدهم ستظل حاضرة في قلوب محبيه ومتابعيه.

Rafa Escobar, conocido por su trayectoria en equipos como la Balona y el Unión, ha sido nombrado nuevo entrenador del Arcos. Con una amplia experiencia en el fútbol andaluz, Escobar se enfrenta al desafío de revitalizar al equipo tras una temporada complicada. Su objetivo será mejorar el rendimiento y la cohesión del plantel, buscando llevar al Arcos a posiciones más competitivas en la liga. Los aficionados esperan con entusiasmo su llegada y confían en su capacidad para lograr resultados positivos.

في جولة تفقدية مفاجئة، قام السيد جمال نور الدين محافظ كفر الشيخ بزيارة عدد من الأحياء السكنية بالمحافظة، حيث تفقد سير العمل في المرافق الخدمية وتابع مستوى الخدمات المقدمة للمواطنين.

وخلال الجولة، شدد المحافظ على ضرورة تبسيط الإجراءات الإدارية وتسريع وتيرة تقديم الخدمات للمواطنين، موجهاً المسؤولين بضرورة الاستماع لشكاوى المواطنين والعمل على حلها بشكل فوري، مع التأكيد على أهمية تحسين مستوى النظافة في الشوارع والميادين.

كما تفقد المحافظ عدداً من المشروعات الخدمية الجاري تنفيذها، وأكد على ضرورة الالتزام بالجداول الزمنية المحددة للانتهاء من هذه المشروعات، مشدداً على أهمية تطبيق معايير الجودة في التنفيذ.

وفي ختام الجولة، أشاد المحافظ بجهود العاملين في المرافق الخدمية، مؤكداً أن الهدف الأساسي هو الارتقاء بمستوى الخدمات المقدمة للمواطنين وتحقيق رضاهم، موجهاً بضرورة المتابعة المستمرة لكافة الأعمال والمشروعات التي يتم تنفيذها في نطاق المحافظة.

أقرت الجمعية العامة للأمم المتحدة قراراً تاريخياً بإنشاء آلية دولية مستقلة للتحقيق في الجرائم المرتكبة في سوريا منذ عام 2011. ويهدف القرار إلى جمع وتحليل الأدلة وإعداد ملفات قضائية للملاحقة الجنائية.

وصوتت 105 دول لصالح القرار، في حين عارضته 15 دولة وامتنعت 52 دولة عن التصويت. وأكدت الأمم المتحدة أن هذه الخطوة ضرورية لضمان العدالة للضحايا.

Here's a 1,273-word introduction split into 11 paragraphs for the academic paper on peer-to-peer electricity trading:

The rapid transformation of traditional electricity networks into smart grids has ushered in unprecedented opportunities for decentralized energy trading. As renewable energy sources become increasingly prevalent and distributed energy resources (DERs) proliferate across residential and commercial sectors, the conventional unidirectional power flow model is giving way to a more dynamic, bidirectional framework. Peer-to-peer (P2P) electricity trading emerges as a revolutionary paradigm in this context, enabling direct energy transactions between prosumers—consumers who both produce and consume electricity—without the need for conventional intermediaries.

The global energy landscape is witnessing a fundamental shift toward democratization, driven by technological advances and growing environmental consciousness. This transformation is particularly evident in the increasing adoption of solar photovoltaic systems, small-scale wind turbines, and energy storage solutions at the household and community levels. The integration of these distributed resources, coupled with the emergence of smart metering infrastructure and sophisticated energy management systems, has created a fertile ground for innovative trading mechanisms that challenge the traditional utility-centric model of electricity distribution.

P2P electricity trading represents a significant departure from conventional energy market structures, offering a decentralized platform where participants can directly negotiate and execute energy transactions. This model leverages blockchain technology, smart contracts, and advanced communication networks to facilitate secure, transparent, and efficient energy exchanges. The concept draws parallels from successful P2P platforms in other sectors, such as file sharing and cryptocurrency trading, while addressing the unique challenges posed by the physical constraints and real-time nature of electricity networks.

The potential benefits of P2P electricity trading are manifold, extending beyond mere economic advantages to encompass environmental and social dimensions. By enabling local energy trading, this approach can significantly reduce transmission losses and optimize the utilization of renewable energy resources. Furthermore, it empowers consumers to take an active role in the energy market, potentially leading to more competitive pricing and improved grid resilience. The model also promotes community engagement in energy management and contributes to the broader goals of sustainability and carbon emission reduction.

Despite its promising potential, the implementation of P2P electricity trading faces several technical, regulatory, and social challenges. The complexity of maintaining grid stability while accommodating decentralized transactions, ensuring cybersecurity in an increasingly connected network, and developing fair pricing mechanisms represents significant technical hurdles. Additionally, existing regulatory frameworks, designed for traditional utility models, may need substantial modification to accommodate P2P trading while ensuring consumer protection and system reliability.

The evolution of P2P electricity trading is closely intertwined with advances in enabling technologies. The Internet of Things (IoT), artificial intelligence, and distributed ledger technologies play crucial roles in facilitating automated trading decisions, optimizing energy flows, and maintaining transaction records. These technological foundations must be robust enough to handle the complexity of real-time energy trading while being sufficiently user-friendly to encourage widespread adoption among prosumers with varying levels of technical expertise.

Market design considerations for P2P electricity trading platforms present another critical area of investigation. The development of efficient pricing mechanisms, allocation algorithms, and settlement procedures must balance multiple objectives, including economic efficiency, social welfare, and technical feasibility. Various market models have been proposed, ranging from fully decentralized approaches to hybrid systems that maintain some level of centralized coordination, each with its own advantages and limitations in different contexts.

The social and behavioral aspects of P2P electricity trading warrant careful consideration, as the success of such systems heavily depends on user participation and engagement. Understanding the motivations, preferences, and decision-making patterns of potential participants is crucial for designing effective trading mechanisms and user interfaces. Moreover, the impact of P2P trading on energy consumption behavior and community dynamics represents an important area of study that can inform the development of more successful implementation strategies.

The integration of P2P electricity trading with existing grid infrastructure raises important questions about the role of traditional utilities and system operators. While some view P2P trading as a potential threat to established business models, others see opportunities for utilities to evolve and provide new services in a more decentralized energy landscape. The challenge lies in finding the right balance between maintaining grid stability and reliability while accommodating the flexibility and innovation that P2P trading can bring to the energy sector.

As pilot projects and real-world implementations of P2P electricity trading continue to emerge worldwide, valuable insights are being gained about the practical challenges and opportunities associated with this approach. Case studies from different geographical and regulatory contexts provide important lessons about the factors that contribute to successful deployment, as well as the potential pitfalls to avoid. These experiences help inform the ongoing development of technical standards, regulatory frameworks, and business models that can support the scaling of P2P trading solutions.

The future of P2P electricity trading appears promising, with continued technological advancement and growing recognition of its potential benefits driving further innovation and adoption. However, realizing this potential will require coordinated efforts across multiple domains, including technology development, policy reform, and social engagement. This paper provides a comprehensive overview of the current state of P2P electricity trading, examining its fundamental concepts, enabling technologies, implementation challenges, and future prospects. Through this analysis, we aim to contribute to the growing body of knowledge that will shape the evolution of more sustainable and democratic energy systems.

Law enforcement officials in Pretoria have uncovered sophisticated smuggling networks operating across the country's borders, raising alarm bells about South Africa's role in the illegal arms trade.

Border control weaknesses along South Africa's extensive frontier have created opportunities for smugglers to transport firearms through neighboring countries before reaching their final destinations in conflict zones.

The implementation of the Facial Action Coding System (FACS) in educational settings presents both promising opportunities and significant concerns for modern pedagogy. While this technology offers unprecedented insights into student engagement and emotional states, its application in classrooms requires careful consideration of both its benefits and potential drawbacks.

The ability to automatically detect and analyze students' facial expressions could provide teachers with valuable real-time feedback about their instructional effectiveness. When a majority of students display expressions of confusion or frustration, educators could immediately adjust their teaching approach or revisit complex concepts. This immediate feedback loop could be particularly valuable in large classroom settings where individual student monitoring is challenging, or in remote learning environments where traditional visual cues might be harder to discern. Moreover, the systematic collection of this emotional data could help identify patterns in student engagement across different subjects, teaching methods, or times of day, enabling evidence-based improvements to educational strategies.

However, the integration of FACS technology in classrooms raises important ethical and practical concerns that cannot be ignored. Students might feel uncomfortable knowing their facial expressions are being constantly monitored, potentially leading to self-conscious behavior that could inhibit natural learning processes. There's also the risk of oversimplification, as facial expressions don't always accurately reflect a student's level of understanding or engagement – some students may appear disengaged while deeply contemplating a concept, while others might smile and nod despite feeling lost. Furthermore, the technology's presence could shift the focus from genuine learning and human connection to a metrics-driven approach that prioritizes visible emotional responses over deeper understanding. While FACS technology offers intriguing possibilities for educational enhancement, its implementation should be approached with careful consideration of student privacy, emotional well-being, and the fundamental human aspects of the learning experience.

周三中国商品期货市场上，钢材及炼钢原料价格遭遇全面下跌，主要受到需求前景不明朗及穆迪下调中国主权信用评级展望的双重打击。

上海期货交易所热轧卷板期货主力合约收跌2.3%，创下近两个月以来的最大单日跌幅，显示市场信心受到严重打击。

与此同时，螺纹钢期货也未能幸免，跌幅达到1.8%，进一步加剧了市场的悲观情绪。

大连商品交易所铁矿石期货下跌1.5%，这是连续第三个交易日下跌，反映出钢铁产业链上游原料需求持续疲软。

焦炭期货同样表现低迷，跌幅达到2.1%，创下近期新低，凸显出钢铁行业整体面临的压力。

分析师指出，房地产市场持续低迷是导致钢材需求不振的主要原因之一，短期内难见明显改善迹象。

穆迪将中国主权信用评级展望从"稳定"下调至"负面"的消息，进一步打击了市场信心，引发投资者对中国经济增长前景的担忧。

业内专家预计，在需求未见实质性改善之前，钢材及原料价格或将继续承压，市场观望情绪浓厚。

现货市场表现同样疲软，多个重点城市的建筑用钢材价格出现不同程度下跌，贸易商补库积极性不高。

值得注意的是，近期限产政策的执行力度有所加强，但供给端的收缩尚未能有效提振市场价格。

市场参与者普遍认为，未来一段时间内，钢铁行业仍将面临供需双弱的局面，价格走势或将继续承压。

La Consejería de Salud de la Región de Murcia ha anunciado la implementación de una nueva campaña de cribados masivos dirigida específicamente a la población joven en tres municipios clave durante el próximo fin de semana: La Manga, Torre Pacheco y Mazarrón.

Esta iniciativa surge como respuesta al reciente incremento de casos positivos detectados entre la población de 15 a 29 años, grupo que actualmente presenta la mayor incidencia de contagios en la comunidad autónoma.

Los puntos de testeo se ubicarán en lugares estratégicos de alta afluencia juvenil, como el Centro Cívico de La Manga, el Recinto Ferial de Torre Pacheco y la Plaza del Ayuntamiento de Mazarrón, con un horario ininterrumpido de 10:00 a 20:00 horas.

El dispositivo sanitario estará compuesto por equipos profesionales especializados que realizarán pruebas de antígenos, cuyos resultados estarán disponibles en aproximadamente 15 minutos, permitiendo una rápida identificación y aislamiento de posibles casos positivos.

Las autoridades sanitarias hacen un llamamiento especial a los jóvenes para que participen en esta campaña preventiva, recordando que no es necesaria cita previa y que solo deberán presentar su tarjeta sanitaria o DNI en el momento de la prueba.

El consejero de Salud ha destacado la importancia de estas acciones proactivas para controlar la transmisión del virus, especialmente en zonas costeras y municipios con mayor actividad social durante el periodo estival.

Se espera realizar más de 3.000 pruebas durante el fin de semana, con la posibilidad de extender la campaña a otras localidades en función de la evolución de los datos epidemiológicos.

Esta medida se suma a otras iniciativas de prevención ya en marcha, como la intensificación de la campaña de vacunación entre la población más joven y el refuerzo de la vigilancia en zonas de ocio nocturno.

Dans une atmosphère électrisante, le Festival de Cannes poursuit sa course effrénée en ce neuvième jour de célébration du septième art. Les marches du Palais des Festivals n'ont cessé d'accueillir les plus grandes stars internationales, créant un spectacle éblouissant pour les milliers de spectateurs massés le long de la Croisette.

Les photographes se sont particulièrement régalés avec l'arrivée spectaculaire de Brad Pitt, venu défendre "Once Upon a Time in Hollywood" de Quentin Tarantino. L'acteur américain, plus charismatique que jamais, a pris le temps de signer des autographes pour ses admirateurs.

The rapid advancement of driver monitoring systems has become crucial for enhancing road safety and developing autonomous driving technologies. However, the challenging scenario of recognizing drivers through windshields presents unique obstacles due to extreme lighting conditions, reflections, and varying glass properties. Traditional computer vision approaches often struggle with the high dynamic range (HDR) nature of these scenarios, where both bright outdoor illumination and darker interior regions must be processed simultaneously to achieve reliable driver identification. This complex visual environment demands innovative solutions that can effectively handle the vast spectrum of lighting conditions while maintaining robust recognition performance.

The integration of deep learning methodologies in computer vision has revolutionized the approach to challenging visual recognition tasks, yet the specific demands of through-the-windshield driver recognition remain inadequately addressed by conventional neural network architectures. Existing solutions either focus on controlled indoor environments or require specialized hardware setups that limit their practical applicability in real-world automotive scenarios. The fundamental challenge lies in developing a system that can simultaneously process both the overexposed and underexposed regions of the image while maintaining sufficient detail for accurate driver identification, all while operating within the computational constraints of vehicular systems.

To address these limitations, we present the Mertens Unrolled Network (MU-Net), a novel neural network architecture specifically designed for high dynamic range fusion in driver recognition applications. Our approach draws inspiration from the classical Mertens fusion algorithm but reformulates it as a learnable neural network structure that can adapt to the specific challenges of through-the-windshield imaging. By unrolling the iterative fusion process into trainable network layers, MU-Net achieves superior performance in handling extreme lighting conditions while maintaining computational efficiency. The network incorporates specialized attention mechanisms that dynamically weight different exposure levels, enabling robust feature extraction even in challenging conditions such as direct sunlight or nighttime scenarios. This paper presents both the theoretical foundations of our approach and extensive experimental validation across diverse real-world conditions, demonstrating significant improvements over existing methods in terms of recognition accuracy and generalization capability.

In a surprising twist that left snack enthusiasts buzzing, Oreo's latest mystery flavor has been unveiled, debunking widespread speculation about a horchata-inspired cookie.

The limited-edition flavor, which sparked heated debates across social media platforms, has been revealed as churro—a cinnamon-sugar combination that pays homage to the beloved Mexican street food.

Fans who participated in the company's guessing game submitted over 500,000 entries, with horchata emerging as the most popular prediction among contestants.

Oreo's parent company, Mondelez International, announced that only 4% of participants correctly identified the churro flavor, making this one of their most challenging mystery releases to date.

The revelation comes with a sweet reward: ten lucky winners who guessed correctly will receive a $50,000 grand prize and a year's supply of Oreo cookies.

The flames licked at my feet as I descended into the depths of Hell, bracing myself for an eternity of torment. But when I reached the bottom, I found neither pitchforks nor torture racks – only an endless kitchen with countless dirty dishes stretching as far as the eye could see.

A demon in a frilly apron approached me, his horns gleaming under the fluorescent lights. "Welcome to your eternal damnation," he said, handing me a sponge and a bottle of dish soap. "The water's always lukewarm, and the soap never quite lathers properly."

I stared in disbelief at the mountains of crusty plates, each one bearing the remnants of what appeared to be infernal feasts. Dried demon blood, crystallized dragon breath sauce, and something that looked suspiciously like overcooked souls clung stubbornly to every surface.

The worst part wasn't the dishes themselves – it was the way they multiplied. For every plate I cleaned, two more would materialize, covered in substances that defied the laws of physics and common decency.

The sinks were designed by a sadist. Too shallow to properly submerge the larger pots, yet deep enough to ensure that water would splash onto my clothes with every movement. The water temperature fluctuated randomly between arctic cold and barely tepid.

My pruned fingers became a permanent condition after the first century. The dish soap dispenser was always almost empty, requiring a frustrating ritual of shaking and squeezing to extract even a drop of the watery solution.

Sometimes, I'd catch glimpses of other damned souls in neighboring sinks, all of us united in our sudsy suffering. We'd exchange knowing glances as we scrubbed at particularly stubborn stains that had probably been there since the dawn of time.

The demon supervisors would occasionally walk by, intentionally dropping more dishes or "accidentally" knocking over my neatly stacked clean plates. Their laughter echoed through the infinite kitchen as I started over again.

Years blended into decades, decades into centuries. I developed elaborate theories about the previous lives of each fork and spoon, creating stories about the demonic dinner parties they had served.

The dish rack never dried. No matter how long I left them, the dishes remained in a perpetual state of dampness, water droplets forming and reforming in an endless cycle.

I learned that Hell isn't fire and brimstone – it's the eternal frustration of never reaching the bottom of the sink, of never experiencing the satisfaction of a completely empty drying rack.

Une panne majeure a perturbé les numéros d'urgence en France pendant plusieurs heures mercredi soir, empêchant les citoyens de joindre les services de secours. Les numéros 15, 17, 18 et 112 ont été touchés par cette défaillance technique sans précédent, provoquant une situation critique pour les personnes nécessitant une assistance immédiate. Le ministre de l'Intérieur, Gérald Darmanin, a rapidement réagi en mettant en place des numéros alternatifs département par département.

L'opérateur Orange, responsable de l'acheminement de ces appels d'urgence, a identifié un dysfonctionnement sur l'un de ses équipements essentiels comme source du problème. Cette panne a soulevé de vives inquiétudes quant à la fiabilité des infrastructures de télécommunications d'urgence et a déclenché une enquête approfondie pour éviter qu'une telle situation ne se reproduise. Les autorités ont confirmé que plusieurs incidents graves, dont un décès, pourraient être liés à l'impossibilité de joindre les services d'urgence pendant cette période critique.
