Dans un revirement inattendu qui secoue la scène politique thaïlandaise, la princesse Ubolratana, sœur du roi Maha Vajiralongkorn, a annoncé le retrait de sa candidature au poste de premier ministre. Cette décision survient moins de 24 heures après l'annonce de sa candidature qui avait déjà créé une onde de choc dans le royaume.

La princesse, qui avait renoncé à ses titres royaux en 1972 pour épouser un Américain, avait été désignée comme candidate au poste de Premier ministre par le parti Thai Raksa Chart, proche de l'ancien Premier ministre en exil Thaksin Shinawatra. Cette nomination sans précédent avait bouleversé l'échiquier politique traditionnel du pays.

Le roi Maha Vajiralongkorn lui-même est intervenu dans cette affaire, qualifiant la candidature de sa sœur d'"inappropriée" et de "contraire aux traditions royales". Dans un communiqué officiel, le palais royal a souligné que les membres de la famille royale doivent rester au-dessus de la politique, conformément à la tradition séculaire du pays.

Face à cette situation délicate, la princesse Ubolratana a exprimé sa gratitude envers ses supporters tout en respectant la position royale. Sur son compte Instagram, elle a déclaré vouloir "se conformer à la tradition royale et vivre en tant que citoyenne respectueuse des lois constitutionnelles".

Cette décision intervient dans un contexte politique déjà tendu, alors que la Thaïlande se prépare à ses premières élections depuis le coup d'État militaire de 2014. Le retrait de la princesse représente un coup dur pour l'opposition qui espérait capitaliser sur sa popularité.

Les analystes politiques soulignent que cet épisode met en lumière les complexités de la politique thaïlandaise, où la monarchie, bien que constitutionnelle, conserve une influence considérable sur les affaires de l'État. La loi de lèse-majesté, l'une des plus strictes au monde, protège la famille royale de toute critique.

Le parti Thai Raksa Chart a accepté la décision royale et s'est excusé pour avoir créé cette situation inconfortable.

The rapid advancement of machine learning technologies has ushered in a new era of distributed computing paradigms, with federated learning emerging as a pivotal framework for collaborative model training while preserving data privacy. However, the inherent challenges of non-Independent and Identically Distributed (non-IID) data distributions across local clients pose significant obstacles to achieving optimal model performance and fairness. Traditional federated learning approaches often struggle to address the systematic biases that arise from heterogeneous data distributions, leading to models that may perform inconsistently across different client populations.

In recent years, the research community has increasingly focused on developing sophisticated techniques to mitigate these biases while maintaining the privacy-preserving benefits of federated learning. Despite these efforts, existing solutions often fall short in effectively balancing the trade-off between model performance, computational efficiency, and bias reduction. The complexity of this challenge is further amplified by the diverse nature of real-world applications, where data heterogeneity is not merely a technical hurdle but a fundamental characteristic of the problem space.

Knowledge distillation, originally proposed as a model compression technique, has shown promising potential in transferring learned representations between models. However, its application in the federated learning context, particularly for addressing non-IID challenges, remains relatively unexplored. This gap in the literature presents an opportunity to leverage distillation techniques in novel ways to combat bias in federated learning systems.

Our work introduces FedDistill, a groundbreaking approach that combines the principles of knowledge distillation with local model de-biasing techniques in a federated learning framework. By carefully orchestrating the interaction between global and local models, FedDistill enables more effective knowledge transfer while actively working to reduce biases that emerge from non-IID data distributions.

The core innovation of FedDistill lies in its unique architecture that establishes a bidirectional knowledge flow between the global model and local clients. This design allows for the systematic identification and mitigation of biases at the local level while preserving the advantages of collaborative learning. Through this approach, we address one of the fundamental challenges in federated learning: maintaining model performance across heterogeneous client populations without compromising privacy or computational efficiency.

Our methodology builds upon recent advances in both federated learning and knowledge distillation, introducing novel mechanisms for bias detection and correction at the local level. By incorporating sophisticated distillation techniques, FedDistill enables more nuanced knowledge transfer that accounts for the unique characteristics of each client's data distribution while working to minimize systematic biases.

Extensive empirical evaluation demonstrates the effectiveness of FedDistill across diverse datasets and application scenarios. Our results show significant improvements in model fairness and performance compared to existing federated learning approaches, particularly in scenarios with highly skewed data distributions. These findings suggest that FedDistill represents a meaningful step forward in addressing the challenges of non-IID data in federated learning.

The practical implications of this work extend beyond theoretical contributions, offering tangible benefits for real-world applications of federated learning. From healthcare to financial services, industries dealing with sensitive data and diverse user populations can leverage FedDistill to build more robust and fair machine learning models while maintaining strict privacy requirements.

Our approach also addresses several key limitations of existing federated learning frameworks, particularly in their handling of non-IID data. By introducing a more sophisticated mechanism for knowledge transfer and bias correction, FedDistill provides a more comprehensive solution to the challenges of distributed learning in heterogeneous environments.

The theoretical foundations of FedDistill draw from multiple disciplines, including distributed computing, statistical learning theory, and fairness in machine learning. This interdisciplinary approach enables a more nuanced understanding of the interplay between data heterogeneity, model bias, and knowledge distillation in federated learning systems.

The development of FedDistill represents a significant advancement in the field of federated learning, offering new insights into the relationship between global model optimization and local bias reduction. Our findings suggest that effective bias mitigation in federated learning requires a careful balance between global knowledge sharing and local model adaptation.

This paper makes several key contributions to the field: first, we introduce a novel architecture for combining knowledge distillation with local model de-biasing in federated learning; second, we provide theoretical guarantees for the convergence and fairness properties of our approach; and third, we demonstrate through extensive experimentation the practical benefits of FedDistill in addressing non-IID challenges in real-world applications. These contributions collectively advance our understanding of how to build more robust and fair federated learning systems in the presence of heterogeneous data distributions.

In a significant development in the luxury footwear market, German sandal maker Birkenstock is reportedly in advanced negotiations with private equity firm CVC Capital Partners for a potential acquisition valued at approximately S$6.4 billion, according to sources familiar with the matter.

However, some analysts express concern about maintaining the brand's heritage and quality standards under new ownership.

In the fading light of a winter afternoon, Sarah stood at the edge of the bridge, her breath forming delicate clouds in the frigid air. The rushing water below seemed to whisper promises of peace, but something made her hesitate—a distant memory of laughter, of warmth, of better days. As her fingers slowly released their grip on the icy railing, a voice behind her shattered the silence.

Marcus hadn't planned on taking this route home, but a mysterious urge had pulled him toward the old bridge. When he saw the woman in the gray coat, something in her stance made his heart stop. He called out before he could think, his voice carrying over the wind with an urgency that surprised even him. Their eyes met, and in that moment, two broken souls recognized something familiar in each other's gaze—a shared understanding of pain, of loss, of desperate loneliness.

Over cups of steaming coffee in a nearby diner, their stories unfolded like origami creatures coming to life. Sarah spoke of her failed business, her mounting debts, and the crushing weight of disappointment that had driven her to the bridge. Marcus listened, sharing his own tale of a marriage that had crumbled, leaving him adrift in a world that suddenly felt too large and too empty. The fluorescent lights buzzed overhead as hours slipped by unnoticed, their conversation weaving a delicate web of connection.

Weeks turned into months, and their chance encounter blossomed into something neither had dared to hope for again. Sarah discovered that her business skills, combined with Marcus's marketing experience, could create something new and promising. Together, they launched a small consulting firm, turning their individual failures into shared wisdom. The bridge that had almost been an ending became a beginning, its shadow no longer looming but rather standing as a testament to the power of unexpected moments.

Five years later, they returned to that same bridge, this time hand in hand. The water still rushed below, but its song had changed—no longer a siren call of despair but a melody of renewal. Sarah squeezed Marcus's hand, remembering that winter afternoon when a stranger's voice had given her a second chance at life.

Health experts warn that the situation could worsen if preventive measures are not strictly followed. They stress the importance of early detection and prompt treatment, as diphtheria can lead to severe complications if left unchecked.

Community leaders and local officials are working together to raise awareness about the disease's symptoms and prevention methods. Educational programs are being conducted in multiple languages to ensure information reaches all ethnic communities effectively.

The outbreak serves as a stark reminder of the importance of maintaining high vaccination coverage and robust healthcare systems in rural areas.

近日，中国A股市场呈现出震荡整理态势，主要股指在关键位置徘徊。上证指数、深证成指和创业板指数均出现小幅波动，市场情绪谨慎观望。

The analysis of random vibration in engineering systems presents one of the most challenging aspects of structural dynamics, particularly when dealing with nonlinear systems subjected to stochastic excitations. As engineering structures become increasingly complex and operate under diverse loading conditions, the need for accurate and computationally efficient methods to predict their dynamic response has become paramount. Among various analytical approaches developed over the past decades, equivalent linearization has emerged as a powerful technique for approximating the response of nonlinear systems to random excitation.

The fundamental principle of equivalent linearization lies in replacing a nonlinear system with an equivalent linear one that best approximates the original system's behavior under specified criteria. This approach, first introduced by Caughey in the 1960s and later refined by numerous researchers, has proven particularly valuable in cases where direct analytical solutions are intractable or when computational resources for full numerical simulations are limited. However, the accuracy and reliability of traditional equivalent linearization methods have been subjects of ongoing debate, especially when applied to strongly nonlinear systems or those experiencing large-amplitude vibrations.

Recent advances in computational capabilities and optimization algorithms have opened new possibilities for enhancing the equivalent linearization technique. By incorporating modern optimization methods, researchers can now develop more sophisticated linearization schemes that minimize the approximation errors across broader frequency ranges and amplitude levels. These developments have led to a renewed interest in equivalent linearization as a practical tool for random vibration analysis, particularly in applications involving complex mechanical systems, aerospace structures, and civil engineering installations.

The optimization of equivalent linearization parameters represents a critical step in improving the method's accuracy and reliability. Traditional approaches often rely on minimizing mean-square errors in the equation of motion, but this single-criterion optimization may not always yield the most accurate results for all response characteristics of interest. Modern optimization techniques allow for the consideration of multiple objectives simultaneously, including frequency content matching, probability density function preservation, and peak response prediction accuracy.

The challenge of selecting appropriate optimization criteria becomes particularly significant when dealing with systems exhibiting multiple degrees of freedom or when specific response characteristics are of primary interest. For instance, in seismic analysis of structures, the accurate prediction of maximum displacement and acceleration responses may be more critical than the precise representation of the complete response time history. This necessitates the development of specialized optimization schemes that can prioritize different aspects of the system response while maintaining computational efficiency.

Advances in machine learning and artificial intelligence have also contributed to the evolution of optimized equivalent linearization methods. These techniques can help identify patterns in system behavior and adapt the linearization parameters accordingly, leading to more robust and accurate approximations. The integration of data-driven approaches with traditional analytical methods represents a promising direction for further improving the effectiveness of equivalent linearization in random vibration analysis.

The application of optimized equivalent linearization extends beyond traditional mechanical and structural systems.

Cette nouvelle orientation politique s'accompagne d'une simplification significative des procédures administratives pour l'obtention des permis d'exploration et d'exploitation. The emergence of large language models (LLMs) has revolutionized natural language processing, offering unprecedented capabilities in text generation, comprehension, and task adaptation. However, as these models become increasingly sophisticated and widely deployed, they present a complex duality that mirrors their namesake, the Roman god Janus – looking simultaneously toward breakthrough innovations and serious privacy concerns. Fine-tuning, a process that adapts pre-trained models to specific tasks or domains, has become a standard practice in deploying LLMs for real-world applications. While this technique dramatically improves model performance and specialization, it inadvertently creates new vectors for privacy breaches that have not been fully explored in current literature. The intersection of fine-tuning and privacy risks represents a critical blind spot in our understanding of LLM security, one that demands immediate attention as these models become further integrated into sensitive domains such as healthcare, financial services, and personal communications.

The privacy implications of fine-tuning LLMs extend far beyond the conventional concerns of data protection and model security. When organizations fine-tune models on proprietary or sensitive data, they potentially embed detailed information about individual users, organizational practices, and confidential information within the model's parameters. Recent research has demonstrated that these fine-tuned models can inadvertently memorize and later reproduce sensitive training data, creating what we term the "Janus Interface" – a bidirectional vulnerability where the very mechanism that enables improved performance also serves as a potential conduit for privacy breaches. This phenomenon is particularly concerning given the increasing trend of organizations deploying custom-fine-tuned models for specific applications, often without full awareness of the associated privacy risks or adequate safeguards against potential data leakage.

The technical underpinnings of this privacy vulnerability lie in the fundamental architecture of LLMs and the nature of the fine-tuning process. During fine-tuning, models adjust their parameters to optimize performance on specific tasks, but this adjustment process can create distinctive patterns that make the model more susceptible to various forms of privacy attacks. These attacks include model inversion, membership inference, and training data extraction – techniques that malicious actors can exploit to recover sensitive information from the fine-tuned model. Our analysis reveals that the risk is particularly acute in scenarios where models are fine-tuned on small, specialized datasets, as the resulting parameter adjustments can more clearly encode specific characteristics of the training data. This creates a paradoxical situation where the very specificity that makes fine-tuned models valuable for specialized applications also makes them more vulnerable to privacy breaches.

The implementation of the Facial Action Coding System (FACS) in educational settings presents both promising opportunities and significant concerns regarding student privacy and authentic learning experiences. While this technology offers unprecedented insights into student engagement and emotional states, its application in classrooms requires careful consideration of its implications for both teachers and learners.

The ability of FACS to detect subtle facial movements and interpret emotional expressions could provide teachers with valuable real-time feedback about their students' comprehension and engagement levels. When a student displays confusion through microscopic facial movements that might otherwise go unnoticed, teachers could immediately adjust their teaching approach or offer additional support. This immediate responsiveness could potentially transform traditional classroom dynamics, allowing educators to address learning gaps before they widen and ensure that no student falls behind due to unrecognized struggles with the material.

However, the continuous monitoring of students' facial expressions raises serious ethical concerns about privacy and the potential for emotional surveillance. Students might feel pressured to maintain artificial expressions of interest and engagement, leading to increased anxiety and decreased authentic participation in the learning process. The natural ebb and flow of attention and emotion during a lesson could be pathologized, creating an environment where students feel compelled to perform emotionally rather than focus on genuine learning. Furthermore, the technology might not accurately interpret the facial expressions of students from diverse cultural backgrounds, who may express emotions differently based on their cultural norms and experiences.

While FACS technology holds potential for enhancing educational experiences, its implementation should be approached with caution and clear limitations. Rather than continuous monitoring, the system might be more appropriately used for specific research purposes or limited assessment periods, with explicit consent from students and parents. The focus should remain on supporting student learning rather than enforcing emotional conformity. Teachers should be trained to use this technology as one of many tools for understanding student engagement, not as a definitive measure of learning or attention.

The screen flickers with her smile, just as warm as it was in real life. Mom looks radiant today, her digital avatar perfectly capturing the gentle creases around her eyes when she laughs at my jokes.

I clutch the overdue bills in my trembling hands, trying to maintain composure as we chat about her virtual garden. The digital flowers never wilt, unlike my dwindling bank account.

The notification pops up again – "Payment Due in 48 Hours." I dismiss it quickly, hoping she didn't notice. LifeStream's premium consciousness hosting isn't cheap, but it's all I have left of her.

Three months ago, I sold my car. Two weeks ago, I moved to a smaller apartment. Yesterday, I started selling my furniture piece by piece on marketplace apps.

"Honey, are you eating well?" she asks, and I lie through my teeth. The instant noodles in my cupboard tell a different story, but I can't let her worry.

The guilt gnaws at me – she chose this digital afterlife believing I could afford it. "It'll be like I never left," she had said from her hospital bed, as we signed the transfer papers.

My credit score plummets with each late payment, but I keep buying time. One more month of conversations, one more month of her wisdom, one more month of pretending death hasn't already torn us apart.

LifeStream's customer service is sympathetic but firm. There are no payment plans, no discounts for long-term customers. Digital immortality comes at a fixed price.

I consider taking another loan, but the banks have already closed their doors to me. My sister stopped taking my calls after I asked to borrow money for the third time.

Mom talks about her digital book club, about the other consciousness-preserved individuals she's befriended. She's happy here, thriving in ways she couldn't during her illness.

The final notice arrives in my email. "Service Termination Imminent." My hands shake as I read the words I've been dreading for months.

"Is everything okay?" she asks, noticing my distraction. I force a smile and change the subject, knowing this might be our last conversation.

Tomorrow, I'll have to tell her the truth. That her immortality was temporary, that I failed to keep my promise, that love sometimes isn't enough against the cold reality of economics.

For now, I memorize every pixel of her face, every inflection in her voice, every digital gesture that mirrors the woman who raised me.

في تطور مفاجئ على مواقع التواصل الاجتماعي، نشر الفنان المصري محمد رشاد صورة لزوجته الإعلامية مي حلمي وهي راقدة في المستشفى، مما أثار قلق متابعيه ومحبيه على صحتها. وقد طالب رشاد جمهوره بالدعاء لزوجته في هذه المحنة الصحية.

وظهرت مي حلمي في الصورة المنشورة وهي ممددة على سرير المستشفى، متصلة بأجهزة طبية، في حين لم يكشف رشاد عن تفاصيل حالتها الصحية أو سبب دخولها المستشفى، مكتفياً بطلب الدعاء لها من متابعيه.

وقد تفاعل رواد مواقع التواصل الاجتماعي بشكل كبير مع المنشور، حيث انهالت التعليقات الداعمة والدعوات بالشفاء العاجل لمي حلمي، خاصة وأن علاقتها بزوجها محمد رشاد شهدت العديد من المنعطفات خلال الفترة الماضية.

يذكر أن محمد رشاد ومي حلمي قد تزوجا بعد قصة حب جمعت بينهما، إلا أن زواجهما شهد العديد من الأزمات والخلافات التي وصلت إلى حد الانفصال في وقت سابق، قبل أن يعودا مجدداً إلى بعضهما البعض.

وتعد هذه المرة الأولى التي يظهر فيها رشاد هذا القدر من القلق العلني على صحة زوجته، مما يعكس تحسن العلاقة بينهما وتجاوزهما للخلافات السابقة التي كانت محل اهتمام الرأي العام ووسائل الإعلام.

وحتى كتابة هذا الخبر، لم يصدر أي بيان رسمي من المستشفى أو من أسرة مي حلمي حول طبيعة حالتها الصحية، في حين يواصل محبوها ومتابعوها الدعاء لها بالشفاء العاجل والعودة إلى منزلها سالمة معافاة.

En una iniciativa conmovedora que busca alegrar los corazones de los más pequeños, diversos grupos de voluntarios han comenzado a distribuir golosinas en minibuses por toda la ciudad como parte de las celebraciones del mes de las infancias.

La campaña, que comenzó hace apenas unos días, ha logrado reunir a decenas de personas comprometidas con la causa, quienes dedican su tiempo libre a recorrer diferentes barrios llevando dulces y sonrisas a los niños que encuentran en su camino.

Los minibuses, decorados con coloridos globos y carteles festivos, se han convertido en verdaderos símbolos de alegría rodante, atrayendo la atención tanto de pequeños como de adultos que no pueden evitar sonreír al verlos pasar por las calles de la ciudad.

María González, una de las organizadoras principales del proyecto, explica que la idea surgió como respuesta a la necesidad de crear momentos especiales para los niños, especialmente en aquellas zonas donde las celebraciones tradicionales suelen ser más limitadas.

"Queríamos llevar un poco de magia a cada rincón de nuestra comunidad", comenta González mientras supervisa la carga de otro minibús con bolsas repletas de caramelos, chocolates y otras golosinas cuidadosamente seleccionadas para garantizar la seguridad alimentaria de los pequeños.

El proyecto ha recibido el apoyo de varias empresas locales que han donado tanto los dulces como los vehículos necesarios para su distribución. Los conductores, todos voluntarios, han dedicado sus fines de semana a esta noble causa, manifestando su satisfacción por ser parte de una iniciativa tan significativa.

Los padres de familia han expresado su gratitud por esta acción que no solo brinda alegría momentánea a sus hijos, sino que también contribuye a crear memorias duraderas en una época tan especial como es el mes dedicado a las infancias.

Los organizadores han establecido rutas estratégicas para asegurar que la distribución alcance a la mayor cantidad posible de niños, priorizando aquellas zonas donde el acceso a actividades recreativas es más limitado.

El impacto positivo de esta iniciativa se ha visto reflejado en las redes sociales, donde numerosos vecinos comparten fotos y videos de los momentos de alegría que estos minibuses generan en cada parada, multiplicando así el efecto de la campaña.

Deep learning has revolutionized the field of artificial intelligence, achieving unprecedented performance across diverse domains such as computer vision, natural language processing, and speech recognition. However, as neural networks grow increasingly sophisticated, the fundamental challenge of model complexity has emerged as a critical area of study. This complexity manifests not only in the sheer size of modern architectures but also in their computational requirements, training dynamics, and theoretical understanding.

The rapid evolution of deep learning models has been marked by an exponential increase in parameters, from early networks with thousands of weights to contemporary architectures containing billions of parameters. This dramatic scaling has raised important questions about the relationship between model size, computational efficiency, and performance gains. While larger models have consistently demonstrated superior capabilities, they have also introduced significant challenges in terms of training resources, inference latency, and deployment constraints.

The theoretical foundations underlying deep learning complexity remain partially understood, despite the practical successes achieved in recent years. Researchers have made substantial progress in analyzing the expressivity of neural networks, their optimization landscapes, and generalization properties. However, the gap between theoretical bounds and empirical performance continues to motivate extensive research efforts aimed at developing a more comprehensive understanding of these systems.

Model complexity in deep learning encompasses multiple interconnected dimensions that extend beyond mere parameter counts. These include architectural complexity, measured through depth and width; computational complexity, reflected in floating-point operations and memory requirements; statistical complexity, related to the model's capacity to learn and generalize; and optimization complexity, concerning the challenges in training these systems effectively. Each dimension contributes to the overall challenge of managing and understanding deep learning systems.

The trade-offs between model complexity and practical considerations have become increasingly relevant as deep learning applications expand into resource-constrained environments. Edge computing, mobile devices, and real-time systems demand efficient models that maintain high performance while operating within strict computational budgets. This has spawned research into model compression, neural architecture search, and efficient training methods, all aimed at optimizing the complexity-performance balance.

Recent advances in transformer architectures have further highlighted the importance of understanding model complexity. These models have demonstrated remarkable scaling properties, where increases in model size and computational resources consistently yield improved performance across a wide range of tasks. However, this scaling behavior has also intensified discussions about the sustainability and accessibility of deep learning research, given the substantial computational resources required for training and deployment.

The relationship between model complexity and generalization remains a central question in deep learning research. Classical learning theory suggests that simpler models should generalize better, yet modern deep learning systems often defy this intuition, with overparameterized networks showing surprisingly good generalization performance. This phenomenon has led to new theoretical frameworks and empirical investigations attempting to reconcile traditional complexity measures with observed behavior.

The impact of model complexity extends beyond technical considerations to encompass broader societal implications. The increasing computational requirements of state-of-the-art models raise concerns about environmental sustainability, economic accessibility, and the concentration of deep learning capabilities among well-resourced organizations. These considerations have motivated research into more efficient architectures and training methods that could democratize access to advanced AI capabilities.

Understanding and managing model complexity has become crucial for the practical deployment of deep learning systems. Organizations must balance the benefits of more sophisticated models against hardware constraints, energy costs, and maintenance requirements. This has led to the development of various complexity metrics and benchmarks that help practitioners make informed decisions about model selection and optimization.

The intersection of model complexity with other key challenges in deep learning, such as robustness, interpretability, and privacy, presents additional research opportunities. More complex models often exhibit less transparent decision-making processes and may be more vulnerable to adversarial attacks. Conversely, certain forms of complexity might be necessary to achieve desired properties such as fairness or privacy preservation.

The evolution of hardware architectures and computational paradigms continues to influence our understanding of model complexity. Specialized accelerators, distributed computing systems, and novel computing paradigms such as quantum computing may reshape the traditional complexity trade-offs in deep learning. These developments suggest that our conception of model complexity must remain dynamic and adaptable to technological advances.

As deep learning continues to advance, the study of model complexity becomes increasingly critical for both theoretical understanding and practical applications. This survey examines the multifaceted nature of complexity in deep learning systems, synthesizing current knowledge, identifying key challenges, and highlighting promising directions for future research.

In the dim light of my bathroom, I stood frozen before the mirror, my toothbrush suspended halfway to my mouth. The familiar face staring back at me had just done something impossible – something that sent chills racing down my spine. My reflection, independent of my own movements, had smiled and nodded at me, a gesture so brief yet so deliberate that I couldn't dismiss it as a trick of the light.

I blinked hard, my heart thundering in my chest as I studied my reflection intently. Everything seemed normal now: my disheveled morning hair, the dark circles under my eyes from another sleepless night, and the small coffee stain on my white t-shirt. My reflection mimicked my movements perfectly, just as it had done for the past thirty-two years of my life. But I couldn't shake the memory of that knowing smile, that conspiratorial nod.

Throughout the day at work, I found myself avoiding reflective surfaces. I took the stairs instead of the elevator with its mirrored walls, and I kept my eyes down when passing the glass doors in the office. My colleagues must have noticed my strange behavior, but no one said anything. Perhaps they attributed it to the stress of our upcoming project deadline, or maybe they were too absorbed in their own lives to care.

That evening, I arrived home later than usual, having taken a deliberately long route to avoid the reflective windows of the shops I normally passed. As I stood in my darkened entryway, my hand hesitated over the light switch. The hallway mirror hung there, waiting. With a deep breath, I flicked on the lights and forced myself to look. My reflection stared back, tired and wary, but otherwise normal.

Just as I began to convince myself that the morning's incident had been a product of my imagination, something shifted in the mirror. It wasn't a dramatic change – just a subtle softening around the eyes, a slight upturn of the lips. My real face remained frozen in shock as my reflection's expression grew warmer, more knowing. This time, the smile lingered longer, and the nod was slower, more deliberate.

I stumbled backward, my shoulder blading hitting the wall behind me. My reflection didn't mirror my movement. Instead, it remained standing straight, watching me with an expression that seemed almost pitying. I squeezed my eyes shut, counting to ten before opening them again. When I did, my reflection was back to normal, matching my terrified posture perfectly.

Over the next few days, I began to notice subtle differences in my reflection. Sometimes, when I wasn't paying full attention, I would catch glimpses of it moving a fraction of a second before I did, as if it were leading rather than following. Other times, I could swear I saw it watching me from the corner of its eyes, even when I was looking straight ahead. The smiles and nods became more frequent, though they only happened when we were alone.

I started researching mirror phenomena, diving deep into forums filled with similar experiences. Most were obviously fake, written for attention or entertainment. But some accounts resonated with a truth I recognized – the same unnerving feeling of discovering that your most familiar companion, your own reflection, had developed a will of its own. None of the stories had endings, I noticed. They all just trailed off, their authors never posting again.

One morning, as I stood before the bathroom mirror, I decided to confront whatever was happening. "What do you want?" I whispered, feeling both foolish and terrified. My reflection's response was immediate – a broad smile, different from its previous knowing smirks. It raised its hand and pressed it against its side of the glass. I noticed with horror that its hand was reversed, as if it were reaching out from behind the mirror rather than merely reflecting my movement.

I never learned what my reflection wanted that day, because I couldn't bring myself to touch the glass. Instead, I covered every mirror in my house with sheets and called in sick to work. But as I sit here writing this, I can see my reflection in the darkened window of my laptop screen, and it's smiling again. This time, though, I think I understand. It's not trying to frighten me – it's trying to show me something. Tomorrow, I'll uncover the mirrors. Tomorrow, when it reaches out its hand, I'll reach back. After all, who better to guide me than myself?

في واقعة غير مسبوقة في تاريخ الأوساط الأكاديمية المصرية، أصدرت المحكمة الإدارية العليا حكماً يقضي بإعادة محاكمة أربعة من أساتذة أكاديمية الفنون، وذلك على خلفية حادثة مؤسفة شهدت قيامهم بقذف رئيس الأكاديمية بالطماطم والقُلل الفخارية، في مشهد أثار جدلاً واسعاً في الأوساط الثقافية والأكاديمية.

وتعود تفاصيل الواقعة إلى العام الماضي، حينما قام الأساتذة الأربعة، الذين يعملون في مختلف أقسام الأكاديمية، باقتحام مكتب رئيس الأكاديمية خلال اجتماع رسمي، وقاموا برشقه بالطماطم والقُلل الفخارية، احتجاجاً على ما وصفوه بـ"القرارات التعسفية" التي اتخذها في حقهم.

وأوضحت حيثيات الحكم الصادر عن المحكمة الإدارية العليا أن القرار السابق بفصل الأساتذة من عملهم شابه قصور في التحقيقات وعدم استيفاء كافة الإجراءات القانونية اللازمة، مما استوجب إعادة المحاكمة لضمان عدالة الإجراءات وحق الدفاع للمتهمين.

وقد أكد المستشار محمد سامي، رئيس هيئة المحكمة، في تصريحات صحفية، أن القرار يأتي في إطار حرص القضاء الإداري على تحقيق العدالة الناجزة وضمان حقوق جميع الأطراف، مشدداً على أن إعادة المحاكمة لا تعني بالضرورة تبرئة المتهمين، وإنما تهدف إلى استكمال الإجراءات القانونية بشكل سليم.

من جانبه، عبر الدكتور أحمد زكي، المتحدث الرسمي باسم أكاديمية الفنون، عن احترام المؤسسة لقرار المحكمة، مؤكداً أن الأكاديمية ستتعاون بشكل كامل مع الجهات القضائية لاستكمال الإجراءات القانونية، مع الحفاظ على هيبة المؤسسة وضمان سير العملية التعليمية بشكل منتظم.

وفي السياق ذاته، أعرب محامي الأساتذة الأربعة، الأستاذ هشام عبد الحميد، عن ترحيبه بقرار المحكمة، معتبراً إياه انتصاراً للعدالة وحق الدفاع. وأضاف في تصريحات خاصة أن موكليه كانوا يعانون من ممارسات إدارية تعسفية، وأن ردة فعلهم، وإن كانت غير مقبولة، إلا أنها جاءت نتيجة تراكمات وضغوط نفسية شديدة.

وقد أثارت القضية جدلاً واسعاً في الأوساط الأكاديمية والثقافية، حيث انقسمت الآراء بين مؤيد لقرار إعادة المحاكمة باعتباره ضماناً للعدالة، وبين معارض يرى فيه تشجيعاً على التجاوزات وإضعافاً لهيبة المؤسسات التعليمية.

根据房仲业者统计数据显示，2023年台湾房仲业整体营收较前一年度大幅成长16%，创下近三年来最佳表现，显示房市已逐步走出疫情阴霾，市场正朝向复苏方向发展。

各大房仲业者分析指出，去年房市表现亮眼主要受惠于疫后经济复苏、购屋者信心回升，以及政府推出的各项振兴措施，带动整体市场交易热度明显回温。特别是在第三季度开始，成交量逐步攀升，第四季度更呈现加速成长态势。

数据显示，六都地区中以台北市的成交量增幅最为显著，较2022年增长约20%，其次为新北市的18%增幅。专家表示，这反映出北部都会区的房市需求依然强劲，尤其是首购族群的入市意愿提升明显。

值得注意的是，即使在利率持续走高的环境下，购屋者的买气仍维持稳定。业者分析认为，这与民众对抗通膨的资产配置需求有关，不少投资者将房地产视为重要的保值标的。

中小型住宅市场表现特别亮眼，2房、3房等实用坪数的产品最受欢迎。这显示出市场以自住需求为主的特性，同时也反映出近年来家庭结构变迁的趋势。

展望2024年，多数房仲业者持审慎乐观态度。他们预期，在全球经济逐步复苏的带动下，台湾房市可望持续维持稳定成长态势，但增幅可能较2023年略为趋缓。

专家建议，有意入市的民众应审慎评估自身财务状况，选择适合的产品和区位。同时也要留意全球经济变化及政策面的影响，做出明智的购屋决策。

根据各家房仲业者的展望，预估2024年全台房市交易量有机会较2023年小幅成长5-8%，但仍需视经济复苏力道及政策面变化而定。房仲业者也将持续优化服务内容，以因应市场需求变化。

Here's a 425-word introduction split into three paragraphs:

Offline reinforcement learning (RL) has emerged as a promising paradigm for developing autonomous agents by learning from pre-collected datasets without direct environment interaction. While this approach offers practical advantages in real-world applications where online exploration is costly or dangerous, it faces unique challenges, particularly in managing uncertainty and avoiding overestimation of action values. Ensemble methods, which combine multiple learning models, have become a standard technique for addressing these challenges by providing more robust value estimates and uncertainty quantification. However, the computational overhead and memory requirements of maintaining large ensembles have limited their practical scalability, especially in resource-constrained settings.

Recent research has revealed an intriguing paradox in the relationship between ensemble size and performance in offline RL. While conventional wisdom suggests that larger ensembles lead to better performance through improved uncertainty estimation, empirical evidence indicates that the benefits of increasing ensemble size often plateau after a relatively small number of models. This observation raises fundamental questions about the optimal allocation of computational resources in offline RL systems. Our investigation challenges the traditional approach of scaling up ensemble size and instead proposes a novel perspective: increasing the batch size used during training may offer superior performance benefits while maintaining computational efficiency.

This paper introduces Q-Ensemble, a methodological framework that reimagines the role of batch size in offline RL ensemble methods. Through theoretical analysis and extensive empirical evaluation, we demonstrate that larger batch sizes enable more stable and accurate value estimation across a smaller number of ensemble members. This finding has significant implications for practical applications, as it suggests that practitioners can achieve state-of-the-art performance with fewer ensemble members by focusing on batch size optimization. Our approach not only reduces the memory footprint and computational requirements compared to traditional large-ensemble methods but also exhibits improved sample efficiency and robustness across a diverse range of offline RL benchmarks.

La coalición opositora venezolana Plataforma Unitaria anunció este martes una nueva serie de manifestaciones pacíficas programadas para la próxima semana, coincidiendo con las festividades de Semana Santa, en un esfuerzo por mantener la presión sobre el gobierno de Nicolás Maduro.

María Corina Machado, líder de la oposición, instó a los ciudadanos a participar en las movilizaciones previstas en las principales ciudades del país, destacando que el período vacacional no debe frenar las demandas por elecciones libres y transparentes.

"El momento de luchar por nuestra democracia no conoce pausas ni descansos", declaró Machado durante una conferencia de prensa en Caracas, donde también denunció nuevos casos de intimidación contra activistas políticos y manifestantes.

Las protestas, programadas para iniciar el Domingo de Ramos y extenderse hasta el Sábado Santo, incluirán marchas pacíficas, vigilias y encuentros comunitarios en plazas públicas, con especial énfasis en las ciudades de Caracas, Maracaibo, Valencia y Barquisimeto.

As a young man seeking adventure and purpose, I can confidently say that joining the Seagoing Cowboys program was one of the best decisions of my life. Not only did it give me the opportunity to serve others by delivering much-needed livestock to war-torn Europe, but it also opened my eyes to a world beyond our American shores. The program offers a unique blend of meaningful humanitarian work and personal growth that few other experiences can match.

During my journey across the Atlantic, I witnessed firsthand the devastating aftermath of World War II and understood how our mission made a real difference in people's lives. In Poland, I saw families who had lost everything yet maintained their dignity and gratitude for our help. The sight of children's faces lighting up at the arrival of our cattle made every challenging moment at sea worthwhile. Working alongside fellow cowboys, I learned valuable skills in animal care and seamanship while forming lifelong friendships with people from diverse backgrounds.

For anyone considering joining the Seagoing Cowboys program, I can assure you that the rewards far outweigh any initial hesitation. Beyond the practical experience of handling livestock at sea, you'll gain a broader perspective on life and develop a deeper appreciation for both American abundance and international cooperation. This program isn't just about transporting animals – it's about building bridges between nations and making a tangible impact on global recovery efforts.

```markdown
Dans la soirée de mardi, un violent incendie s'est déclaré dans la commune de Rochefort-du-Gard, dans le département du Gard, mobilisant rapidement d'importantes forces de lutte contre les incendies. Les flammes, attisées par des conditions météorologiques défavorables, ont rapidement progressé à travers la végétation sèche caractéristique de la région.

Plus de 120 sapeurs-pompiers ont été déployés sur place, appuyés par des moyens aériens comprenant deux Canadair et un hélicoptère bombardier d'eau. Cette mobilisation massive a permis une intervention rapide et efficace, cruciale pour empêcher la propagation du feu vers les zones habitées environnantes. Les autorités locales ont également mis en place un périmètre de sécurité pour protéger les résidents.

Après plusieurs heures d'une lutte acharnée, les équipes d'intervention sont parvenues à maîtriser l'incendie qui a ravagé environ 10 hectares de végétation. Fort heureusement, aucune victime n'est à déplorer et aucune habitation n'a été touchée, grâce à l'action coordonnée des services de secours et à la rapidité de leur intervention.

Une enquête a été ouverte pour déterminer l'origine exacte du sinistre, bien que les premiers éléments suggèrent une cause accidentelle. Les autorités rappellent l'importance de la vigilance en cette période de l'année, particulièrement propice aux départs de feu, et appellent la population à respecter scrupuleusement les mesures de prévention des incendies.
```

The gentle pressure on my shoulder made me jump, nearly spilling coffee across my laptop. Sarah, my cubicle neighbor of three years, stood behind me with an intensity in her eyes I'd never seen before. The fluorescent office lights cast strange shadows across her face.

"I need to tell you something," she whispered, glancing nervously at our coworkers. "Not here. Can we go to the break room?" Her fingers were trembling as she pulled away from my shoulder, and I noticed she was wearing mismatched socks – very unlike her usual meticulous self.

The break room was mercifully empty when we entered. Sarah closed the door behind us, and the usual hum of office chatter became a distant murmur. She paced back and forth between the refrigerator and the coffee maker, her hands clasped tightly together.

"I'm not who you think I am," she began, her voice barely audible. "I'm not really an accountant. I work for the FBI's Witness Protection Program, and I've been assigned to protect you for the past three years." The words tumbled out of her mouth like a dam breaking.

My mind reeled as I tried to process this information. Me? Why would I need protection? I'm just a regular software developer who spends too much time debugging other people's code and watching cat videos during lunch breaks.

"Your father," she continued, noting my confusion, "wasn't really a small-town insurance salesman who died in a car accident when you were twelve. He was one of our most valuable undercover agents, and he uncovered a massive international crime syndicate. The accident... wasn't an accident."

The room started spinning slightly as decades of memories rearranged themselves like puzzle pieces falling into a completely different picture. Every birthday card, every bedtime story, every fishing trip – they all took on new meaning.

"I'm telling you this now because we've received intelligence that you might be in danger. They've somehow discovered your connection to him. We need to move you to a new location immediately." Sarah – if that was even her real name – pulled out a badge and a phone I'd never seen her use before.

As I stood there in the break room, between the humming vending machine and the half-empty coffee pot, I realized that my ordinary Tuesday afternoon had just become the first page of a very different story.

Here's a 667-word introduction split into 7 paragraphs for your academic paper:

Object counting in crowded scenes remains one of computer vision's most challenging yet practically significant tasks, with applications spanning from urban planning and crowd management to ecological surveys and microscopic cell analysis. While recent deep learning approaches have demonstrated remarkable progress in this domain, they typically require complete retraining when new object categories are introduced, leading to substantial computational overhead and potential catastrophic forgetting of previously learned patterns.

The emergence of density map estimation as a dominant paradigm in object counting has revolutionized how we approach this problem. By transforming discrete object locations into continuous density distributions, these methods have proven particularly effective in handling scenes with severe occlusions and varying object scales. However, the challenge of incrementally learning new object categories while maintaining performance on existing ones has remained largely unaddressed, creating a significant barrier to real-world deployment.

In this paper, we introduce Density Map Distillation (DMD), a novel framework that enables incremental learning for object counting systems without requiring access to the original training data. Our approach leverages the concept of knowledge distillation, traditionally used in classification tasks, and adapts it to the unique characteristics of density map estimation. By distilling knowledge from a teacher model trained on previous categories into a student model learning new categories, we preserve crucial information about spatial distributions and counting patterns.

The core innovation of our method lies in its ability to maintain high-fidelity density maps for previously learned object categories while accommodating new ones. This is achieved through a carefully designed distillation loss that considers both global count accuracy and local density patterns. Unlike conventional distillation approaches that focus solely on final predictions, our method preserves intermediate feature representations that are essential for accurate density estimation across diverse object categories.

Experimental results across multiple challenging datasets demonstrate the effectiveness of our approach.

根据中国海关总署最新公布的数据显示，2023年12月中国贵金属市场呈现出复杂的进出口态势，其中白银、铂金和钯金的贸易数据格外引人注目。数据显示，12月份中国白银进口量达到2,315.99吨，环比增长15.3%，同比增长22.7%，创下近六个月来的新高，这主要得益于年末珠宝制造业的季节性需求增长以及投资者对白银的避险需求上升；与此同时，白银出口量则相对温和，为426.78吨，环比下降8.2%。铂金方面，12月进口量为7.82吨，较11月份的6.93吨有所增加，显示出工业需求的稳步回升，特别是在汽车催化剂制造领域的应用持续扩大；铂金出口量则保持在较低水平，仅为0.95吨。钯金的进出口数据则反映出更为显著的变化，12月进口量达到4.56吨，创下2023年下半年以来的最高水平，这一增长主要受到新能源汽车产业链需求带动，以及全球钯金价格回落带来的采购机会；钯金出口量则维持在1.23吨的水平，环比基本持平。值得注意的是，这些贵金属的贸易数据不仅反映出中国工业生产的活跃度，也折射出全球经济复苏背景下中国制造业的转型升级进程，同时还体现了中国在全球贵金属市场中的重要地位。数据还显示，全年来看，中国贵金属进出口总体保持增长态势，其中白银累计进口量达到24,567.89吨，同比增长18.6%；铂金全年进口总量为85.34吨，同比增长12.4%；钯金全年进口量则达到48.92吨，同比增长8.7%。这些数据表明，尽管全球经济面临诸多不确定性，中国贵金属市场仍展现出强劲的发展动力和巨大的发展潜力。业内专家分析认为，随着中国经济的持续复苏和产业结构的优化升级，贵金属的市场需求将继续保持稳定增长，特别是在新能源汽车、电子制造、珠宝首饰等领域的应用将进一步扩大。同时，全球经济的不确定性也可能推动投资者增加对贵金属的配置，这将为中国贵金属市场带来新的发展机遇。展望2024年，预计中国贵金属进出口市场将继续保持活跃，特别是在"双碳"目标和产业升级的推动下，相关贵金属的需求有望进一步提升。此外，随着国际贸易环境的改善和区域全面经济伙伴关系协定（RCEP）的深入实施，中国贵金属市场的国际化程度将进一步提高，市场运行机制也将更加完善。

近日，全球金融市场再次聚焦美国国债收益率曲线倒挂现象，多位华尔街分析师对此表示担忧。

知名对冲基金Crescat Capital的首席投资官Kevin Smith警告，标普500指数可能面临高达40%的暴跌风险。

Smith指出，当前美国经济面临的通胀压力与货币政策收紧的双重打击，或将导致股市估值进一步承压。

美国2年期与10年期国债收益率之差已达到40多年来的最大负值，这一历史性的倒挂程度预示着经济衰退风险正在加剧。

市场数据显示，过去50年中，每次出现收益率曲线倒挂后，美国经济都在12-18个月内陷入衰退。

Crescat Capital的分析报告强调，当前市场估值处于历史高位，而企业盈利增长预期可能过于乐观。

值得注意的是，科技股占标普500指数权重已达到历史新高，这种集中度增加了市场的脆弱性。

Smith表示，美联储的货币政策转向可能触发市场剧烈调整，特别是在高估值板块中。

多位市场专家认为，投资者应当重新评估投资组合风险，适当增加防御性资产配置。

The integration of robotic manipulators with unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs) has emerged as a transformative development in aerial robotics, enabling unprecedented capabilities in aerial manipulation tasks. These aerial manipulator systems, which combine the mobility of UAVs with the dexterity of robotic arms, present remarkable potential for applications ranging from infrastructure maintenance and disaster response to aerial construction and environmental monitoring. However, the inherent complexity of these systems, characterized by strong dynamic coupling between the aerial platform and the manipulator, poses significant challenges in achieving precise and robust control, particularly when operating in uncertain environments or under external disturbances.

The control of aerial manipulators represents a particularly challenging problem due to the multifaceted nature of their dynamics. The addition of a robotic arm to a UAV platform introduces substantial variations in the system's center of mass, generates reaction forces and moments during manipulation tasks, and creates complex aerodynamic interactions. Traditional control approaches, while effective for individual UAVs or ground-based manipulators, often fall short when applied to these integrated systems. This limitation has sparked considerable research interest in developing more sophisticated control strategies that can effectively handle the coupled dynamics while maintaining stability and performance under various operating conditions.

Among the advanced control methodologies proposed for aerial manipulators, sliding mode control (SMC) has garnered significant attention due to its robust performance in the presence of uncertainties and disturbances. However, conventional SMC approaches suffer from chattering phenomena, which can excite unmodeled dynamics and potentially damage the system's actuators. The Super Twisting Algorithm (STA), as a second-order sliding mode control technique, has emerged as a promising solution to mitigate these issues while maintaining the robust characteristics of sliding mode control. Nevertheless, the direct application of STA to aerial manipulators faces challenges in handling the complex, coupled dynamics and ensuring stability across the entire operational envelope.

This paper introduces a novel proxy-based Super Twisting Control (PSTC) algorithm that addresses these limitations by incorporating a proxy-based framework into the traditional STA structure. The proposed approach utilizes virtual proxy points to decouple the control problem and manage the complex interactions between the aerial platform and the manipulator more effectively.

The ability to read human emotions through technology represents a significant leap in our understanding of human behavior, yet its application in educational settings raises important questions. The Facial Action Coding System (FACS) offers unprecedented insights into students' emotional states, potentially revolutionizing how teachers gauge classroom engagement and comprehension.

Consider a teacher attempting to explain a complex mathematical concept. With FACS technology, they could instantly recognize when students display confusion or frustration, allowing for immediate adjustments to their teaching approach. This real-time feedback could prove invaluable in creating more responsive and effective learning environments.

However, the implementation of such technology also presents serious ethical concerns. Students might feel uncomfortable knowing their facial expressions are being constantly monitored and analyzed. This surveillance could create anxiety and self-consciousness, potentially hindering rather than helping the learning process.

Moreover, emotional expressions are deeply personal and culturally influenced. A system that attempts to standardize and categorize these expressions might oversimplify the complex nature of human emotions, leading to misinterpretations and false assumptions about students' engagement or understanding.

The technology could also inadvertently shift focus away from genuine human connection in the classroom. Teachers might become overly reliant on technological feedback rather than developing their natural ability to read and respond to students' needs through traditional observation and interaction.

While FACS technology shows promise in educational settings, its value must be carefully weighed against potential drawbacks. Perhaps a balanced approach, using this technology as one of many tools in the educational toolkit rather than a primary means of student assessment, would be most beneficial.

في مقارنة تاريخية لافتة، يكشف الباحث السعودي صالح العساف عن أوجه التشابه المثيرة بين وباءي الكوليرا وكورونا في المملكة العربية السعودية، مسلطاً الضوء على كيفية تعامل المجتمع السعودي مع الأوبئة عبر العصور.

يشير العساف إلى أن وباء الكوليرا الذي ضرب المملكة في ثلاثينيات القرن الماضي شكل تحدياً كبيراً للمجتمع، تماماً كما فعل فيروس كورونا في العصر الحديث.

ومن أبرز أوجه التشابه التي رصدها العساف، الإجراءات الاحترازية التي اتخذتها السلطات في كلا الوباءين، حيث فُرض الحجر الصحي وتقييد الحركة بين المناطق.

كما يلفت الباحث إلى تشابه ردود الفعل المجتمعية، حيث ظهرت في كلا الفترتين حالات من الهلع والخوف، إلى جانب محاولات البعض إنكار خطورة المرض.

ويوضح العساف أن التدابير الوقائية في زمن الكوليرا شملت تعقيم المنازل والأماكن العامة، وهو ما تكرر بشكل مماثل خلال جائحة كورونا، مع تطور في الوسائل والتقنيات المستخدمة.

ومن المثير للاهتمام، كما يذكر العساف، أن كلا الوباءين شهدا تضامناً مجتمعياً كبيراً، حيث تكاتف الناس لمساعدة بعضهم البعض في تجاوز المحنة.

كما يشير إلى أن الأزمتين شهدتا تأثيراً اقتصادياً كبيراً على المجتمع، مع توقف العديد من الأنشطة التجارية وتعطل حركة التنقل.

ويلفت العساف إلى دور العلماء ورجال الدين في كلا الفترتين، حيث كان لهم دور مهم في توعية الناس وحثهم على الالتزام بالإجراءات الوقائية.

كما يتحدث عن تطور الخدمات الصحية في المملكة بين الفترتين، مشيراً إلى الفارق الكبير في الإمكانيات والقدرات الطبية.

ويشير الباحث إلى أن كلا الوباءين أدى إلى تغييرات في العادات الاجتماعية، وخاصة فيما يتعلق بالتجمعات والمناسبات.

كما يوضح أن الوباءين شهدا ظهور العديد من الشائعات والمعلومات المغلوطة، وكيف تصدت السلطات لها في كل فترة.

ويتحدث العساف عن تأثير الوباءين على التعليم، حيث توقفت الدراسة في كلتا الفترتين، مع اختلاف في طرق التعامل مع هذا التوقف.

كما يشير إلى تطور وسائل التواصل بين الفترتين، وكيف ساهمت التكنولوجيا الحديثة في تسهيل التعامل مع أزمة كورونا مقارنة بالكوليرا.

ويلفت الباحث إلى أن كلا الوباءين كان لهما تأثير نفسي كبير على المجتمع، مع ظهور حالات من القلق والاكتئاب.

ويؤكد العساف أن دراسة هذه التجارب التاريخية مهمة لاستخلاص الدروس والعبر في مواجهة الأوبئة المستقبلية.

The rapid evolution of wireless communication technologies has ushered in unprecedented challenges for meeting the demanding requirements of next-generation networks, particularly in terms of spectral efficiency, energy consumption, and massive connectivity. Among the promising solutions that have emerged, Intelligent Reflecting Surfaces (IRS) have garnered significant attention from both academia and industry for their ability to create programmable wireless environments through passive beamforming. These metasurface-based structures, comprising arrays of low-cost passive reflecting elements, can dynamically modify the propagation characteristics of electromagnetic waves, thereby enhancing coverage, improving signal quality, and potentially reducing the overall system power consumption. While the integration of IRS technology with existing wireless systems has been extensively studied, the fundamental question of optimal multiple access scheme selection in IRS-assisted networks remains largely unexplored, particularly in scenarios involving user pairing.

The choice between Non-Orthogonal Multiple Access (NOMA) and Orthogonal Multiple Access (OMA) in IRS-assisted systems presents a complex trade-off that demands careful consideration of various factors, including channel conditions, user locations, and system requirements. NOMA, which allows multiple users to share the same time-frequency resources through power-domain multiplexing, has demonstrated superior spectral efficiency in conventional wireless systems. However, its performance advantages in IRS-assisted scenarios may not always be guaranteed due to the additional degrees of freedom introduced by the reflecting elements and the complex interaction between user pairing strategies and IRS phase shift optimization. OMA, while potentially simpler to implement, might achieve comparable or even superior performance under certain conditions when combined with intelligent reflecting surfaces, particularly when the IRS can be optimized to create favorable channel conditions for individual users. This paper presents a comprehensive analysis of the performance trade-offs between NOMA and OMA in IRS-assisted networks, taking into account practical considerations such as imperfect channel state information, finite-resolution phase shifts, and the impact of user pairing strategies on system performance.

La Fórmula E, la categoría de automovilismo eléctrico más emocionante del mundo, ha anunciado un nuevo formato de clasificación que promete revolucionar la forma en que se determinan las posiciones de salida en las carreras. Este cambio, que se implementará a partir de la próxima temporada, busca aumentar la competitividad y el espectáculo en cada evento.

El nuevo sistema de clasificación se basa en un formato de "knockout", similar al utilizado en otras competiciones de motorsport. En lugar de la tradicional sesión de clasificación de una hora, los pilotos se enfrentarán en rondas eliminatorias que les permitirán demostrar su velocidad y habilidad en la pista. Este enfoque no solo hará que la clasificación sea más emocionante, sino que también ofrecerá a los aficionados un espectáculo más dinámico.

Cada evento contará con una sesión de clasificación dividida en varias rondas. En la primera ronda, todos los pilotos tendrán la oportunidad de marcar su mejor tiempo. Los más lentos serán eliminados, mientras que los más rápidos avanzarán a la siguiente ronda. Este proceso se repetirá hasta que queden solo dos pilotos, quienes lucharán por la pole position en una emocionante última vuelta.

Los organizadores de la Fórmula E han señalado que este nuevo formato no solo beneficiará a los espectadores, sino que también permitirá a los equipos y pilotos adaptarse mejor a las condiciones cambiantes de la pista. La imprevisibilidad del formato knockout significa que cualquier piloto tiene la oportunidad de brillar, independientemente de su posición en el campeonato.

Además, se espera que este cambio atraiga a más aficionados a las carreras, ya que la emoción de las eliminatorias puede generar un mayor interés en la competición. La Fórmula E ha estado trabajando arduamente para aumentar su base de seguidores y este nuevo formato de clasificación es un paso importante en esa dirección.

Los pilotos han reaccionado de manera mixta ante la noticia.

Inner speech, the internal monologue that accompanies our thoughts and cognitive processes, has long fascinated researchers in neuroscience and cognitive psychology. While this covert form of speech production occurs without overt articulation, it engages similar neural mechanisms to those involved in overt speech. Recent advances in neuroimaging and machine learning have opened new possibilities for decoding these internal verbal processes, potentially revolutionizing brain-computer interfaces and our understanding of language processing in the brain.

The challenge of accurately decoding inner speech lies in its subtle neural signatures and the complexity of the underlying cognitive processes. Traditional approaches have relied primarily on single-modality neuroimaging techniques, such as electroencephalography (EEG) or functional magnetic resonance imaging (fMRI), each with its own limitations. EEG offers excellent temporal resolution but suffers from poor spatial localization, while fMRI provides precise spatial information but lacks temporal precision. This inherent trade-off has historically constrained our ability to capture the full dynamics of inner speech processes.

Recent developments in multimodal neuroimaging and data fusion techniques have suggested a promising direction for overcoming these limitations. By combining EEG and fMRI data acquired during the same task, researchers can leverage the complementary strengths of both modalities. This approach has shown particular promise in various cognitive decoding tasks, but its application to inner speech decoding remains relatively unexplored. The temporal precision of EEG, combined with the spatial accuracy of fMRI, offers a unique opportunity to capture both the rapid temporal dynamics and precise spatial patterns associated with inner speech production.

The emergence of sophisticated machine learning approaches, particularly deep learning architectures designed for multimodal data integration, has further enhanced our ability to extract meaningful patterns from complex neuroimaging data. Bimodal models, which can simultaneously process and learn from both EEG and fMRI data streams, represent a significant advancement over traditional unimodal approaches. These models can automatically learn optimal features from both modalities and their interactions, potentially capturing subtle patterns that might be missed by conventional analysis methods.

Data-driven approaches to inner speech decoding present several unique challenges that must be addressed. First, the quality and alignment of EEG and fMRI data acquired during the same task are crucial, as any temporal or spatial misalignment can significantly impact decoding performance. Second, the design of appropriate experimental paradigms that can effectively elicit and control inner speech while maintaining data quality in both modalities requires careful consideration. Third, the development of robust fusion algorithms that can handle the different temporal and spatial scales of EEG and fMRI data while preserving their complementary information remains an active area of research.

The accurate estimation of bone mineral density (BMD) plays a crucial role in diagnosing osteoporosis and assessing fracture risk, particularly in the aging population. While dual-energy X-ray absorptiometry (DXA) remains the gold standard for BMD measurement, its limited availability and cost in many healthcare settings have sparked interest in alternative assessment methods using conventional radiographs. Recent advances in deep learning have shown promising results in extracting quantitative measurements from medical images, yet the development of reliable BMD estimation models has been hampered by the scarcity of labeled training data, as paired X-ray and DXA measurements are rarely available in clinical practice.

The challenge of limited labeled data in medical imaging has led researchers to explore semi-supervised learning (SSL) approaches, which leverage both labeled and unlabeled data to improve model performance. These techniques are particularly relevant in the context of BMD estimation, where hospitals may have vast archives of hip X-rays but only a small subset with corresponding DXA measurements. SSL methods can potentially bridge this gap by learning meaningful representations from unlabeled images while maintaining the precision required for clinical applications. This approach aligns with the broader trend in medical image analysis, where the cost and time constraints of expert annotation have made traditional supervised learning approaches increasingly impractical.

Our research introduces a novel semi-supervised framework for BMD estimation that combines the strengths of contrastive learning and consistency regularization. The proposed method utilizes a dual-branch architecture that simultaneously processes labeled and unlabeled hip X-rays, enforcing consistency between different augmented views of the same image while learning from the limited available ground truth data. This approach is designed to capture the subtle textural and structural variations in bone architecture that correlate with mineral density, while being robust to the typical variations in X-ray acquisition parameters and patient positioning encountered in clinical practice.

The significance of this work extends beyond the immediate application of BMD estimation, as it addresses fundamental challenges in medical image analysis where labeled data is scarce but unlabeled data is abundant.

في إنجاز رياضي مثير للإعجاب، أكمل المتسلق المغامر خالد السعيد رحلته الطموحة بتسلق ثلاثة عشر قمة جبلية في غضون ستة أشهر فقط، متحدياً الظروف المناخية القاسية والصعوبات التقنية.

وشملت رحلته تسلق قمم في جبال الهيمالايا والألب والأنديز، حيث واجه درجات حرارة تحت الصفر وعواصف ثلجية عنيفة، مستخدماً خبرته التي اكتسبها على مدى خمسة عشر عاماً في تسلق الجبال.

وأوضح السعيد في تصريحات صحفية أن هدفه من هذه المغامرة كان تشجيع الشباب العربي على تحدي أنفسهم وتحقيق أحلامهم، مهما كانت صعبة أو مستحيلة في نظر الآخرين.

وقد حظيت إنجازاته باهتمام إعلامي واسع، وتلقى تهاني من مسؤولين رياضيين ومتسلقين محترفين من مختلف أنحاء العالم، مؤكدين أن ما حققه يعد إنجازاً استثنائياً في عالم تسلق الجبال.

في خطوة رائدة نحو تعزيز دور الشباب في المجتمع، أعلن مجلس التنمية الأسرية للشباب عن نجاح تنفيذ 17 مبادرة متنوعة خلال دورته الأولى، مما يعكس التزامه الراسخ بدعم وتمكين الشباب في مختلف المجالات.

وتضمنت المبادرات برامج تدريبية متخصصة في مجال التخطيط المالي والإدارة الأسرية، حيث استفاد منها أكثر من 500 شاب وشابة، مما ساهم في تعزيز مهاراتهم في إدارة ميزانية الأسرة وتحقيق الاستقرار المالي.

كما شملت المبادرات برامج إرشادية في مجال العلاقات الزوجية والتربية السليمة للأبناء، حيث قدم خبراء متخصصون جلسات استشارية وورش عمل تفاعلية ساعدت المشاركين على فهم أعمق لديناميكيات العلاقات الأسرية.

وفي إطار دعم المقبلين على الزواج، نظم المجلس سلسلة من الدورات التأهيلية التي تناولت مختلف جوانب الحياة الزوجية، من الناحية النفسية والاجتماعية والاقتصادية، مما أسهم في تهيئة الشباب لمرحلة جديدة من حياتهم.

وتميزت مبادرات المجلس بتنوعها، حيث شملت أيضاً برامج للتوعية الصحية والنفسية، وأنشطة رياضية واجتماعية تهدف إلى تعزيز الترابط الأسري وبناء مجتمع متماسك.

وأكد رئيس المجلس أن هذه المبادرات تأتي ضمن استراتيجية شاملة تهدف إلى تمكين الشباب وتعزيز دورهم في بناء أسر مستقرة وواعية، مشيراً إلى أن النجاح الذي تحقق يشكل دافعاً قوياً لمواصلة العمل وتطوير البرامج.

وأشار التقرير السنوي للمجلس إلى أن المبادرات حققت نسبة رضا عالية بين المشاركين تجاوزت 90%، مما يؤكد فعالية البرامج المقدمة وتلبيتها لاحتياجات الفئة المستهدفة.

وفي ختام الدورة الأولى، أعلن المجلس عن خطط طموحة للدورة القادمة تتضمن توسيع نطاق المبادرات وزيادة عدد المستفيدين، مع التركيز على استخدام التقنيات الحديثة وتطوير محتوى يتناسب مع متطلبات العصر واحتياجات الشباب المتجددة.

The mysterious "Face on Mars" has captivated public imagination since its discovery in 1976, leading many to speculate about its artificial origins. However, as a NASA scientist who has extensively studied this geological formation, I can confidently assert that the Face is nothing more than a natural landform shaped by Martian environmental processes. While the initial low-resolution Viking 1 photographs may have suggested an eerily face-like structure, modern high-resolution imaging has definitively revealed its true nature.

The most compelling evidence against artificial construction comes from the Mars Global Surveyor's detailed photographs, which show the Face for what it really is – an eroded mesa, similar to countless others found across Mars' surface. These images, taken from multiple angles and with far superior technology than the original Viking mission, demonstrate that the seemingly symmetrical facial features disappear when viewed with greater clarity. The "eyes," "nose," and "mouth" that appeared so striking in the original grainy photograph are revealed to be natural geological formations created through millions of years of wind erosion and other weathering processes.

Furthermore, the Face's location within the Cydonia region provides crucial context for understanding its formation. This area of Mars contains numerous similar mesa formations, all created through the same natural processes of erosion and geological uplift. The Face's dimensions and composition match perfectly with these surrounding features, indicating it shares the same natural origin. If aliens had constructed this massive structure, why would they create just one artificial formation that precisely matches the natural geology of the region?

Scientific analysis of the Face's structure reveals patterns consistent with known geological processes. The angular features and layered appearance are characteristic of sedimentary rock formations that have undergone extensive weathering – a common occurrence on Mars. The apparent symmetry that sparked alien construction theories is much less pronounced in reality, with the "face" appearing drastically different when viewed from various angles.

The pervasive nature of gender bias in natural language processing (NLP) systems has emerged as a critical concern in artificial intelligence research, highlighting the urgent need for comprehensive analysis and mitigation strategies. As these systems increasingly influence daily life—from virtual assistants to automated hiring processes—their potential to perpetuate and amplify societal prejudices demands careful scrutiny. The manifestation of gender bias in NLP applications not only reflects existing social inequalities but also risks reinforcing them through automated decision-making processes.

Recent years have witnessed a surge in research examining the role of training data in shaping the behavior of language models. At the heart of this investigation lies the fundamental challenge of creating and maintaining high-quality labeled datasets and lexicons that can help identify, measure, and ultimately reduce gender bias in text-based applications. While significant progress has been made in developing bias detection methodologies, the field still grapples with the complexity of capturing and categorizing the subtle ways in which gender stereotypes manifest in language.

The development of labeled datasets specifically designed to address gender bias represents a crucial step forward in this domain. These resources serve multiple purposes: they enable the systematic evaluation of existing NLP systems, facilitate the training of more equitable models, and provide benchmarks for measuring progress in bias mitigation efforts. However, the creation of such datasets presents its own challenges, including the need to balance comprehensive coverage with practical limitations, ensure cultural sensitivity, and address intersectional aspects of bias.

Lexicons, serving as specialized vocabularies for identifying gender-related language patterns, play an equally vital role in this landscape. These carefully curated collections of words and phrases help researchers and practitioners map the linguistic territory where gender bias typically occurs. The evolution of these lexicons reflects our growing understanding of how gender bias manifests across different contexts, languages, and cultural settings, while also highlighting the dynamic nature of language itself.

The intersection of labeled datasets and lexicons creates a powerful framework for addressing gender bias in text. When combined, these resources enable more sophisticated approaches to bias detection and mitigation, allowing researchers to move beyond simple word-level analysis to understand more complex linguistic patterns and contextual nuances.
