The rapid advancement of large language models (LLMs) has revolutionized natural language processing, enabling unprecedented capabilities in text generation. However, controlling these models to produce content with specific desired attributes while maintaining coherence and fluency remains a significant challenge. While recent approaches have explored various methods for controlled text generation, they often require extensive model fine-tuning, architectural modifications, or complex training procedures that can be resource-intensive and impractical for many applications.

In this paper, we introduce Tailor, a novel prompt-based framework for attribute-based controlled text generation that leverages the inherent capabilities of pre-trained language models without requiring model modifications or additional training. Our approach utilizes carefully crafted prompts that incorporate attribute specifications and demonstrations, allowing for fine-grained control over multiple textual attributes simultaneously. By designing prompts that effectively communicate desired attributes to the model, Tailor enables users to generate text with specific characteristics such as sentiment, style, tone, and content constraints while maintaining the natural fluency and coherence of the underlying language model.

The key innovation of Tailor lies in its systematic approach to prompt engineering, which combines explicit attribute descriptions with carefully selected exemplars to guide the model's generation process. Unlike previous methods that rely on complex control codes or specialized architectures, our framework operates entirely within the prompt space, making it both flexible and accessible to a wide range of users and applications. Through extensive experimentation, we demonstrate that Tailor can effectively control multiple attributes simultaneously while maintaining text quality comparable to or exceeding that of more complex approaches.

Our work builds upon recent advances in prompt engineering and few-shot learning, extending these concepts to the specific challenge of controlled text generation. While previous research has shown that large language models can exhibit impressive few-shot learning capabilities, the systematic application of these principles to attribute-based control has remained largely unexplored. Tailor addresses this gap by developing a structured methodology for constructing prompts that effectively guide the model's generation process while maintaining the desired attributes.

The effectiveness of our approach is demonstrated through comprehensive empirical evaluation across multiple domains and attribute types. We conduct experiments on various text generation tasks, including sentiment-controlled story generation, style transfer, and attribute-preserving text continuation. Our results show that Tailor achieves superior performance compared to existing methods across multiple metrics, including attribute accuracy, text fluency, and content preservation. Furthermore, we provide detailed analyses of the factors contributing to successful attribute control, offering insights into the relationship between prompt design and generation outcomes.

One of the key advantages of Tailor is its adaptability to different language models and attribute combinations without requiring model-specific modifications. This flexibility makes our approach particularly valuable in practical applications where resource constraints or technical limitations may preclude more complex solutions. Additionally, the transparent nature of prompt-based control allows for easier debugging and refinement of the generation process, as the relationship between prompt components and generated output is more directly observable than in black-box approaches.

Beyond its practical applications, our work contributes to the broader understanding of how large language models process and respond to attribute-specific instructions. Through careful analysis of successful and unsuccessful cases, we identify patterns in how models interpret and apply attribute specifications, providing valuable insights for future research in controlled text generation. These findings have implications not only for improving prompt design but also for understanding the capabilities and limitations of current language models in controlled generation tasks.

The development of Tailor represents a significant step forward in making controlled text generation more accessible and practical while maintaining high-quality output. By demonstrating that effective attribute control can be achieved through careful prompt engineering alone, our work opens new possibilities for applications in areas such as content generation, style transfer, and personalized text adaptation. As language models continue to evolve and improve, the principles and methodologies established in this work provide a foundation for future developments in controlled text generation, potentially leading to even more sophisticated and nuanced approaches to attribute-based control.

The mysterious "Face on Mars" has captivated public imagination since its discovery in 1976, leading some to believe it was created by an alien civilization. However, as a NASA scientist who has extensively studied this formation, I can confidently assert that the Face is nothing more than a natural geological feature shaped by millions of years of Martian weathering and erosion. The original Viking 1 photograph that sparked these theories was taken at a low resolution and specific lighting angle that created an illusion of facial features. When the Mars Global Surveyor later captured high-resolution images of the same formation in 1998 and 2001, they clearly revealed a mundane mesa, similar to countless other natural formations found across Mars' surface.

The scientific evidence thoroughly debunks any artificial origin of the Face. The formation's asymmetrical structure and irregular features are consistent with natural geological processes, not intelligent design. Advanced imaging technology has shown that what appeared to be eyes, nose, and mouth in the original photo are actually shadows cast by ordinary rock formations. Furthermore, the Face is just one of many similar mesas in the Cydonia region, all formed by the same natural processes of erosion and sediment deposition. The apparent facial features disappear completely when viewed from different angles or under different lighting conditions, proving that the Face is simply a product of pareidolia – the human tendency to see familiar patterns, like faces, in random stimuli. As scientists, we must base our conclusions on empirical evidence rather than speculation, and all available data points to the Face being a fascinating, but entirely natural, Martian landform.

Here's a 753-word introduction split into 8 paragraphs for the academic paper:

The proliferation of fake news across social media platforms has emerged as one of the most pressing challenges of our digital age, threatening to undermine democratic discourse, public health initiatives, and social stability. As traditional fact-checking methods struggle to keep pace with the volume and sophistication of misinformation, researchers have increasingly turned to automated detection systems, with graph-based approaches showing particular promise in recent years. These systems leverage the inherent network structure of news dissemination, analyzing patterns in user interactions, content sharing, and social relationships to distinguish genuine news from fabricated content.

However, as these detection systems become more sophisticated and widely deployed, they face a growing threat from adversarial attacks – carefully crafted manipulations designed to fool the detectors while preserving the essential characteristics of fake news content. While considerable attention has been paid to adversarial attacks against image classification and natural language processing systems, the vulnerability of graph-based fake news detectors to such attacks remains relatively unexplored. This gap in our understanding is particularly concerning given the critical role these systems play in maintaining information integrity across social platforms.

The challenge of developing effective adversarial attacks against graph-based detectors is complicated by the discrete and structural nature of graph data, which differs fundamentally from the continuous spaces typically encountered in image or text-based attacks. Traditional gradient-based approaches, which have proven successful in other domains, cannot be directly applied to graph structures without significant modifications. Furthermore, most existing attack methods require detailed knowledge of the target model's architecture and parameters – information that is rarely available in real-world scenarios.

Our research addresses these limitations by introducing a novel black-box adversarial attack framework specifically designed for graph-based fake news detection systems. Unlike previous approaches, our method operates without any knowledge of the target model's internal workings, requiring only query access to the model's output probabilities. This makes our attack particularly relevant for real-world applications, where attackers typically cannot access the detector's architecture or parameters.

The proposed framework employs a reinforcement learning approach to learn optimal perturbation strategies, treating the graph modification process as a sequential decision-making problem. By carefully balancing the trade-off between maintaining the plausibility of the fake news propagation pattern and maximizing the likelihood of evading detection, our method generates subtle yet effective modifications to the graph structure. These modifications preserve the essential characteristics of the original fake news dissemination pattern while successfully misleading state-of-the-art detection systems.

Extensive experimental evaluation across multiple datasets and detector architectures demonstrates the effectiveness of our approach.

In a groundbreaking study examining the effectiveness of text message-based suicide prevention among military personnel, researchers have uncovered both promising developments and concerning limitations, highlighting the complex nature of addressing mental health in the armed forces.

The multi-year study, conducted by the Department of Defense in collaboration with leading mental health institutions, followed over 8,000 active-duty service members who received regular supportive text messages as part of a comprehensive suicide prevention program.

Initial findings revealed a 23% reduction in suicidal ideation among participants who consistently engaged with the text messaging system, particularly during their first six months of deployment or immediately following their return home.

However, researchers noted significant disparities in engagement rates across different demographic groups, with younger soldiers showing markedly lower response rates to the automated messages compared to their older counterparts.

The study's lead investigator, Dr. Sarah Martinez, emphasized that while text-based interventions show promise, they cannot serve as a standalone solution to the complex issue of military suicide prevention. "We're seeing encouraging results in certain subgroups, but this approach clearly needs to be part of a more comprehensive strategy," she explained.

One of the most successful aspects of the program was its ability to connect service members with mental health professionals during crucial moments of crisis, with 68% of participants reporting that they felt more comfortable seeking help after receiving supportive messages.

The research team identified several challenges in implementing the text-based system, including connectivity issues in remote deployment locations and concerns about privacy and security of personal communications.

Perhaps most notably, the study found that soldiers who reported previous combat exposure or diagnosed PTSD showed significantly different response patterns to the messages, suggesting the need for more tailored approaches based on individual experiences.

Military leadership has expressed cautious optimism about the findings, with General Michael Roberts stating, "While we're encouraged by the positive outcomes, we recognize that this is just one tool in our ongoing effort to support the mental health of our service members."

The study also revealed an unexpected benefit: improved communication between deployed service members and their families, as the regular check-ins seemed to normalize discussions about mental health and emotional well-being.

Critics of the program have pointed out potential drawbacks, including the risk of message fatigue and the possibility that some soldiers might become overly dependent on digital communication for emotional support.

The research team documented varying success rates across different branches of the military, with Navy personnel showing the highest engagement rates, followed by Air Force members, while Army and Marine Corps participants demonstrated lower overall participation.

Cost-effectiveness analyses indicated that the text-based intervention was significantly less expensive than traditional in-person counseling services, though researchers stressed that it should not be viewed as a replacement for face-to-face mental health support.

The study's findings have prompted military health officials to consider implementing a hybrid approach, combining automated text messages with periodic video calls and in-person check-ins to create a more robust support system.

Looking ahead, the Department of Defense has announced plans to refine the program based on these initial results, with particular focus on developing more personalized message content and improving response protocols for high-risk individuals.

The research has attracted international attention, with several allied nations expressing interest in implementing similar programs within their own military forces, potentially leading to broader global collaboration on military mental health initiatives.

El gobierno ecuatoriano ha revelado documentos que presuntamente demuestran la existencia de financiamiento del régimen venezolano de Nicolás Maduro hacia la campaña política del expresidente Rafael Correa, en lo que podría constituir una seria violación de las leyes electorales del país.

La documentación, presentada por el Ministerio del Interior durante una rueda de prensa en Quito, incluye transferencias bancarias, correos electrónicos y registros de reuniones que sugieren un vínculo financiero directo entre Caracas y el movimiento político de Correa.

Según los documentos revelados, el financiamiento habría ocurrido durante el período 2013-2017, coincidiendo con la última etapa del mandato de Correa y el inicio de la crisis venezolana bajo el liderazgo de Maduro.

Las autoridades ecuatorianas aseguran que el monto total de las transferencias supera los 15 millones de dólares, canalizados a través de una compleja red de empresas fantasma y cuentas bancarias en paraísos fiscales.

Entre los hallazgos más significativos se encuentran registros de reuniones secretas entre altos funcionarios venezolanos y miembros del círculo íntimo de Correa en Panamá y las Islas Caimán.

La investigación, que ha durado más de dos años, fue realizada en colaboración con unidades de inteligencia financiera de varios países y agencias internacionales especializadas en el rastreo de fondos ilícitos.

El actual gobierno ecuatoriano ha anunciado que presentará una denuncia formal ante organismos internacionales, incluyendo la Organización de Estados Americanos (OEA) y la Unión de Naciones Suramericanas (UNASUR).

Por su parte, Rafael Correa, quien reside actualmente en Bélgica, ha negado categóricamente las acusaciones a través de su cuenta de Twitter, calificándolas de "persecución política" y "cortina de humo".

El expresidente venezolano Nicolás Maduro también ha rechazado las acusaciones, describiendo la situación como un "montaje mediático" diseñado para desestabilizar a los gobiernos progresistas de la región.

La oposición ecuatoriana ha exigido una investigación exhaustiva y ha solicitado la conformación de una comisión internacional independiente para examinar los documentos presentados.

Analistas políticos señalan que estas revelaciones podrían tener serias implicaciones para la estabilidad política de Ecuador y las relaciones diplomáticas con Venezuela.

La Fiscalía General del Estado ha confirmado que iniciará una investigación preliminar para determinar la autenticidad de los documentos y establecer posibles responsabilidades penales.

Organizaciones de la sociedad civil han expresado su preocupación por el impacto de estas revelaciones en la credibilidad del sistema democrático ecuatoriano.

Los documentos también sugieren la participación de altos funcionarios del gobierno de Correa en la estructuración de los mecanismos de financiamiento ilegal.

As a young man seeking adventure and purpose, I can confidently say that joining the Seagoing Cowboys program was one of the best decisions of my life. Not only did it give me the opportunity to serve others by delivering livestock to war-torn countries, but it also opened my eyes to the world beyond our American shores. The chance to earn $150 per month while making a difference was an added bonus that helped me save for my future.

During my time with the program, I witnessed firsthand the devastating aftermath of World War II in Poland. The sight of destroyed buildings and hungry children strengthened my resolve to help these communities rebuild. We transported horses and heifers that would provide essential resources to families in need, and the gratitude in their eyes made every challenging moment at sea worthwhile. The camaraderie among fellow cowboys and crew members created lifelong friendships that I still cherish today.

I urge young people to consider joining the Seagoing Cowboys program. Beyond the practical skills you'll gain in animal care and seamanship, you'll experience personal growth that only comes from stepping outside your comfort zone. This program offers more than just a job – it's an opportunity to be part of something bigger than yourself while exploring the world and making a real difference in people's lives.

La Academia de las Artes y las Ciencias Cinematográficas de España ha anunciado oficialmente que la ciudad de Sevilla será la anfitriona de la próxima edición de los Premios Goya. Esta decisión marca un hito importante en la historia de la prestigiosa ceremonia, que por primera vez en varios años abandona Madrid para celebrarse en la capital andaluza, reconociendo así la creciente importancia de la región en la industria cinematográfica española.

El evento, previsto para principios del próximo año, se llevará a cabo en el Palacio de Congresos y Exposiciones FIBES, un recinto emblemático que ha demostrado su capacidad para albergar eventos de gran envergadura. La elección de este espacio no solo responde a sus excelentes instalaciones técnicas y su amplia capacidad, sino también a su ubicación estratégica y sus óptimas conexiones con el centro de la ciudad.

El alcalde de Sevilla ha expresado su entusiasmo por esta designación, destacando el impacto positivo que tendrá en la economía local. Según las estimaciones preliminares, la celebración de los Premios Goya generará un beneficio económico de aproximadamente 4,5 millones de euros para la ciudad, incluyendo sectores como la hostelería, el transporte y el comercio local, además de crear numerosos puestos de trabajo temporales.

La decisión de trasladar la ceremonia a Sevilla forma parte de una estrategia más amplia de la Academia para descentralizar los grandes eventos culturales y dar mayor visibilidad a diferentes regiones de España. Esta iniciativa ha sido acogida con gran satisfacción por la industria cinematográfica andaluza, que ve en ella una oportunidad única para mostrar el potencial de la región como destino de rodajes y centro de producción audiovisual.

Las autoridades locales y regionales han comenzado ya los preparativos para acondicionar la ciudad y garantizar que la gala se desarrolle con el máximo esplendor. Se han anunciado mejoras en las infraestructuras urbanas, refuerzo del transporte público durante los días del evento y la organización de actividades culturales paralelas que convertirán a Sevilla en el epicentro del cine español durante varias semanas.

The rapid advancement of autonomous vehicle (AV) technology has ushered in a new era of transportation safety and efficiency. However, the complexity of real-world driving scenarios, particularly in high-speed highway environments, presents significant challenges for comprehensive AV testing and validation. Traditional testing methodologies often fall short in identifying rare but critical edge cases that could lead to safety-critical failures, necessitating more sophisticated approaches to stress testing.

The dynamic nature of highway driving, characterized by multiple vehicles operating at high speeds, frequent lane changes, and varying weather conditions, creates an intricate web of interactions that autonomous systems must navigate safely. Current testing frameworks typically rely on predetermined scenarios or random sampling methods, which may not effectively capture the most challenging and potentially dangerous situations that AVs could encounter. This limitation has sparked a growing interest in developing more robust and adaptive testing methodologies.

Recent high-profile incidents involving autonomous vehicles have highlighted the critical importance of comprehensive testing protocols, particularly in scenarios where multiple risk factors converge. These incidents have not only raised public concern about AV safety but have also emphasized the need for more sophisticated testing frameworks that can proactively identify potential failure modes before they manifest in real-world situations. The highway environment, with its unique combination of high speeds and complex vehicle interactions, represents a particularly challenging domain for such testing.

The intersection of artificial intelligence, control theory, and safety engineering has created new opportunities for developing more effective testing methodologies. Adaptive stress testing, which dynamically adjusts test scenarios based on system responses and identified vulnerabilities, offers a promising approach to this challenge. By incorporating machine learning algorithms that can learn from previous test outcomes, these methods can more efficiently explore the vast space of possible scenarios and focus on those most likely to reveal system weaknesses.

Previous research in this domain has primarily focused on isolated aspects of autonomous vehicle testing, such as perception systems or decision-making algorithms. While these efforts have yielded valuable insights, they often fail to capture the complex interactions between different system components and their collective response to challenging scenarios. A more holistic approach is needed to ensure comprehensive validation of autonomous vehicle systems, particularly in highway environments where system failures could have catastrophic consequences.

Our proposed framework addresses these limitations by introducing a novel approach to adaptive stress testing that combines reinforcement learning techniques with sophisticated scenario generation algorithms. This approach enables the systematic exploration of edge cases while maintaining realistic physical constraints and traffic patterns. By incorporating real-world data and expert knowledge, the framework can generate challenging scenarios that are both meaningful and representative of actual highway conditions.

The adaptive nature of our framework allows it to evolve test scenarios based on the autonomous vehicle's performance and identified vulnerabilities. This dynamic approach ensures that testing resources are efficiently allocated to explore the most critical areas of the operational space, rather than exhaustively testing scenarios that may not yield meaningful insights. Furthermore, the framework's modular design enables it to accommodate different autonomous vehicle architectures and control strategies, making it applicable across a wide range of platforms and development stages.

One of the key innovations in our approach is the integration of multi-agent modeling techniques that capture the complex interactions between autonomous vehicles and other road users. This allows for more realistic testing scenarios that consider not only the physical dynamics of vehicle movement but also the behavioral aspects of human drivers and their responses to autonomous vehicles. By incorporating these elements, our framework provides a more comprehensive evaluation of AV safety and performance in highway environments.

The significance of this research extends beyond the immediate goal of improving autonomous vehicle testing. The methodologies and insights developed through this work have broader applications in the validation of complex cyber-physical systems, particularly those operating in dynamic, multi-agent environments. As autonomous systems become increasingly prevalent across various domains, the need for sophisticated testing frameworks that can ensure their safe and reliable operation becomes increasingly critical. Our framework represents a significant step forward in addressing this challenge, particularly in the context of highway-based autonomous vehicle operations.

纽森还宣布了一项新的激励计划，将为率先恢复面授课程的学区提供额外的财政支持，以帮助它们购置防疫物资和改善教学设施。

州教育部门的数据显示，目前加州已有超过60%的公立学校恢复了不同程度的面授课程，这一数字还在持续增加。

En un momento de creciente preocupación por los costes energéticos, los consumidores españoles se enfrentan a un nuevo escenario con la reciente actualización de la tarifa eléctrica regulada, que promete ofrecer oportunidades significativas de ahorro para aquellos que sepan aprovecharla adecuadamente.

Los expertos en energía señalan que la clave para maximizar los beneficios de la nueva tarifa reside en comprender a fondo su funcionamiento y adaptar los hábitos de consumo en consecuencia, una tarea que puede resultar más sencilla de lo que parece a primera vista.

La nueva estructura tarifaria establece tres períodos horarios claramente diferenciados: valle, llano y punta, cada uno con costes específicos que varían significativamente entre sí, ofreciendo a los consumidores la posibilidad de planificar su consumo de manera más estratégica.

El período valle, que se extiende desde las 00:00 hasta las 8:00 horas, presenta los precios más económicos, convirtiéndose en el momento ideal para activar los electrodomésticos de mayor consumo energético.

Durante el horario llano, que abarca diferentes franjas horarias según el día de la semana, los precios se mantienen en un nivel intermedio, permitiendo realizar actividades cotidianas sin incurrir en costes excesivos.

Las horas punta, por su parte, coinciden con los momentos de mayor demanda energética y, consecuentemente, presentan las tarifas más elevadas, por lo que es recomendable evitar el uso intensivo de electricidad durante estos períodos.

Un aspecto fundamental para optimizar el gasto eléctrico es la programación de los electrodomésticos, especialmente aquellos que consumen más energía como la lavadora, el lavavajillas y el horno.

Los expertos recomiendan utilizar temporizadores o funciones de inicio diferido para aprovechar las horas valle, lo que puede suponer un ahorro considerable en la factura mensual.

La climatización del hogar también juega un papel crucial en el consumo energético, por lo que es importante establecer estrategias eficientes para su uso, como mantener temperaturas moderadas y aprovechar la inercia térmica de la vivienda.

Los sistemas de domótica pueden ser grandes aliados en esta tarea, permitiendo automatizar el control de la temperatura y otros dispositivos para optimizar su funcionamiento según las franjas horarias más convenientes.

El uso de electrodomésticos eficientes, con clasificación energética A o superior, se convierte en una inversión rentable a medio plazo, ya que su menor consumo se traduce en un ahorro significativo independientemente del horario de uso.

La iluminación LED, aunque representa un porcentaje menor del consumo total, también contribuye al ahorro, especialmente en hogares donde las luces permanecen encendidas durante largos períodos.

The neon-stained alley flickered as two figures materialized from thin air, their tattered holofiber coats catching the dim light of 21st-century streetlamps.

Marcus adjusted his chronometer, its holographic display casting a soft blue glow on his weathered face. "2023. Perfect timing, partner."

Zara pulled her respirator down, inhaling deeply. "Smell that? Pure, unfiltered pollution. Beautiful." Her augmented eyes glowed a faint green as they adjusted to the darkness.

They moved silently through the narrow passage, their magnetic boots barely making a sound on the wet concrete. The future had taught them to be invisible, to exist in the margins.

"There," Marcus whispered, pointing to a row of overflowing dumpsters. "Look at all that precious waste. They just threw it away like it was nothing."

Zara pulled out her matter scanner, running it over the heap of discarded treasures. "Plastics, non-biodegradables, synthetic polymers... we hit the motherlode."

In their time, 2157, such materials were worth more than gold. The Great Purification had eliminated waste production entirely, making ancient garbage the most valuable resource in their squeaky-clean utopia.

Marcus began filling their quantum storage bags with old takeout containers and disposable coffee cups. Each piece would fetch a small fortune in the future's black market.

"Remember when we were respected citizens?" Zara mused, stuffing synthetic fabric into her bag. "Before the Environmental Virtue Act made scavenging the only way to survive?"

Marcus grunted as he lifted a broken plastic chair. "Respect doesn't feed you in paradise. Neither does social credit."

A police siren wailed in the distance, making them both freeze. They'd learned the hard way that law enforcement in any era was bad news for people like them.

"Two minutes until the next temporal window," Marcus announced, checking his chronometer again.

The implementation of Facial Action Coding System (FACS) technology in classrooms presents both promising opportunities and significant concerns for modern education. By analyzing students' facial expressions in real-time, educators could potentially gauge engagement levels, identify confusion, and adjust their teaching methods accordingly, leading to more responsive and effective instruction.

However, the constant surveillance and emotional monitoring of students raises serious ethical questions about privacy and psychological well-being. Students might feel pressured to maintain "appropriate" expressions, potentially hindering genuine emotional responses and creating an atmosphere of artificial behavior. The technology could also misinterpret cultural differences in emotional expression, leading to flawed assessments.

While FACS technology offers innovative possibilities for understanding student engagement, its implementation in classrooms could create more problems than it solves. The potential benefits of improved instructional responsiveness must be weighed against the fundamental right to emotional privacy and the risk of creating an environment where students feel compelled to mask their true feelings.

The ravens circled overhead as Captain Elena Martinez watched the battlefield through her night-vision goggles. The enemy's necromancers had already begun their grim work, violet energy crackling between the corpses of fallen soldiers. Her stomach churned as she witnessed former comrades rise again, their movements jerky and unnatural.

In the command bunker, she had argued against this offensive, knowing the price of every fallen soldier would be paid twice – once in the loss of life, and again when that same body turned against them. The generals, in their infinite wisdom, had dismissed her concerns. Now, as she observed the macabre dance of reanimation, she couldn't help but think of the ancient saying: "The definition of insanity is doing the same thing repeatedly and expecting different results."

The research division had been working tirelessly on a solution, developing weapons that could completely destroy organic matter, leaving nothing for the enemy to resurrect. But these weapons were expensive, limited in supply, and required perfect accuracy. One missed shot meant another soldier lost, another weapon added to the enemy's ever-growing arsenal.

Elena's team had developed a different approach. They'd discovered that the necromantic energy could be disrupted by certain frequencies of electromagnetic pulses. The problem was getting close enough to deploy them effectively. The dead felt no fear, needed no rest, and could sustain damages that would incapacitate any living soldier.

Through her goggles, she watched as the first wave of reanimated soldiers began their advance. Their movements were becoming more coordinated with each passing day, as if the necromancers were learning to better puppet their macabre marionettes. Time was running out – soon, the advantage of the living's superior coordination would be meaningless.

She gave the signal, and her special operations team moved forward silently. They carried prototype devices that looked like ordinary flares but contained the experimental EMP technology. The plan was simple but dangerous: get close enough to deploy the devices in a triangular formation, creating a disruption field that would sever the necromancers' control over their undead army.

The night air was thick with the smell of decay and ozone as they crept forward. Elena's heart pounded in her chest as she watched a reanimated soldier pass within meters of one of her hidden team members. The dead soldier's head turned mechanically, scanning the area with milky eyes that somehow still managed to see.

They were almost in position when everything went wrong. A scout team of the living enemy spotted them, and gunfire erupted across the field. Elena watched in horror as two of her team members fell. She knew they had mere minutes before those bodies would rise again, this time under enemy control.

Making a split-second decision, Elena activated her device prematurely and charged forward. The other surviving team members followed suit, creating an imperfect but functional disruption field. The effect was immediate – dozens of reanimated soldiers collapsed like puppets with cut strings, their second unlife ended by the electromagnetic pulse.

In the chaos that followed, Elena realized the true nature of their war.

La industria aeronáutica global enfrenta uno de sus mayores desafíos históricos mientras los expertos proyectan una dramática disminución en la demanda de aviones comerciales que podría extenderse hasta 2030, como consecuencia directa de la pandemia de COVID-19.

Los fabricantes de aeronaves, incluyendo gigantes como Airbus y Boeing, ya han comenzado a ajustar sus pronósticos de producción y a reevaluar sus planes estratégicos para la próxima década, anticipando una recuperación mucho más lenta de lo inicialmente esperado.

Según un reciente informe de consultores especializados en el sector aeronáutico, las aerolíneas podrían reducir sus pedidos de nuevos aviones hasta en un 40% durante los próximos cinco años, comparado con las proyecciones pre-pandemia.

Esta caída sin precedentes en la demanda se atribuye principalmente a la drástica reducción en el tráfico aéreo global, que ha llevado a numerosas aerolíneas a postergar o cancelar sus planes de expansión y renovación de flota.

Los analistas señalan que el cambio en los hábitos de viaje corporativo, con una mayor dependencia en las reuniones virtuales, podría tener un impacto duradero en la demanda de vuelos de negocios, tradicionalmente uno de los segmentos más rentables para las aerolíneas.

Las aerolíneas están optando por mantener en servicio sus aviones existentes por más tiempo, lo que representa un desafío adicional para los fabricantes que esperaban capitalizar la tendencia hacia flotas más eficientes en términos de consumo de combustible.

El impacto económico de esta situación ya se está manifestando en las comunidades que dependen de la industria aeronáutica, con despidos masivos y el cierre de plantas de producción en diversos países.

Los sindicatos del sector advierten que la crisis podría resultar en la pérdida de más de un millón de empleos directos e indirectos en la industria aeronáutica global durante los próximos años.

Los gobiernos de varios países están considerando programas de apoyo específicos para el sector, reconociendo su importancia estratégica y su rol en la economía global.

Las empresas proveedoras de componentes y servicios para la industria aeronáutica también están siendo severamente afectadas, con muchas pequeñas y medianas empresas al borde de la quiebra.

Los expertos sugieren que la recuperación podría ser más rápida en el mercado de aviones de menor tamaño, ya que las aerolíneas buscarán opciones más flexibles para adaptar su capacidad a la demanda fluctuante.

El sector de mantenimiento y reparación de aeronaves podría experimentar un crecimiento contrario a la tendencia general, ya que las aerolíneas optarán por mantener sus flotas existentes en lugar de adquirir nuevos aviones.

Los fabricantes están acelerando el desarrollo de tecnologías más sostenibles, viendo la crisis como una oportunidad para reinventar el futuro de la aviación comercial.

La industria de carga aérea representa un rayo de esperanza, con un crecimiento sostenido impulsado por el comercio electrónico y la necesidad de transportar suministros médicos globalmente.

Los analistas financieros predicen que la recuperación completa del sector podría no materializarse hasta 2028-2030, cuando se espera que los niveles de tráfico aéreo vuelvan a los registrados en 2019.

日前彰化县发生一起令人心碎的意外事故，一名尽孝男子为筹措母亲丧葬费用，却在母亲过世隔天骑车自撞身亡，留下智障哥哥无人照料，让人不胜唏嘘。

据了解，死者黄先生（35岁）与智障哥哥（37岁）相依为命多年，兄弟俩与母亲同住在彰化市郊区的老旧平房中，生活清贫但温馨。

黄母长期患有慢性病，近期病情恶化，于上周三不幸病逝。黄先生为了给母亲办一场体面的丧礼，四处奔波筹措费用，但困难重重。

邻居表示，黄先生平日在工地打零工维持家计，同时还要照顾智障哥哥和生病的母亲，生活十分辛苦，但从未听他抱怨。

警方调查发现，事发当天凌晨，黄先生骑乘机车行经市区某路段时，突然加速冲向路边护栏，当场身亡。现场未发现煞车痕迹，疑似蓄意自撞。

黄先生的好友透露，事发前一天，他曾向多人借钱未果，情绪低落。当晚还在社交媒体上发文道歉，称"对不起，我真的尽力了"。

社会局获报后立即介入关怀，表示将协助安置智障哥哥，并联系相关单位提供必要援助。

邻里纷纷表示不舍，称黄先生是个善良的人，总是默默照顾家人，没想到最后会走上绝路。

当地慈善团体得知此事后，已主动表示愿意承担黄母的丧葬费用，并为智障哥哥提供长期照护服务。

社工人员呼吁，面对困境时应寻求协助，社会资源与援助管道很多，不应轻言放弃。

这起悲剧再次引发社会关注，提醒我们要多关心身边需要帮助的人，适时伸出援手，避免憾事发生。

Here's a 1,069-word introduction split into 9 paragraphs for your academic paper:

The integration of human expertise with artificial neural networks represents one of the most promising frontiers in machine learning, particularly within the emerging paradigm of concept-based learning. While neural networks have demonstrated remarkable success in various domains, from image recognition to natural language processing, they often lack the interpretability and domain-specific knowledge that human experts possess. This fundamental limitation has sparked increasing interest in hybrid approaches that combine the pattern recognition capabilities of neural networks with explicit expert knowledge, potentially offering the best of both worlds.

The traditional approach to neural network development has primarily focused on data-driven learning, where networks discover patterns and relationships through extensive training on large datasets. However, this methodology often overlooks valuable domain expertise that has been accumulated over decades or even centuries of human experience. Expert rules, which encapsulate this knowledge in formal logical structures, represent a rich source of information that could potentially enhance the learning process and improve the overall performance of neural networks. The challenge lies in developing frameworks that can effectively incorporate these rules while maintaining the flexibility and generalization capabilities that make neural networks so powerful.

Concept-based learning has emerged as a particularly promising framework for bridging the gap between symbolic expert knowledge and neural network architectures. This approach aims to organize knowledge around fundamental concepts and their relationships, mirroring the way human experts structure their understanding of complex domains. By explicitly representing concepts within the network architecture, it becomes possible to integrate expert rules in a more natural and interpretable manner. This integration is not merely a matter of combining two different approaches but rather represents a fundamental rethinking of how knowledge is represented and processed within artificial neural systems.

The significance of this research direction extends beyond purely technical considerations. In many critical applications, such as medical diagnosis, financial risk assessment, or industrial process control, the stakes are too high to rely solely on black-box models, regardless of their statistical performance. Stakeholders in these domains require systems that can not only make accurate predictions but also provide transparent reasoning for their decisions. The incorporation of expert rules into neural networks through concept-based learning offers a pathway toward achieving this goal, potentially leading to systems that combine the reliability of expert knowledge with the adaptability of machine learning.

Recent advances in neural network architectures and training methodologies have created new opportunities for implementing concept-based learning approaches. Attention mechanisms, graph neural networks, and neural-symbolic computing have provided powerful tools for representing and manipulating structured knowledge within neural networks. These developments have made it increasingly feasible to design architectures that can simultaneously process numerical data and symbolic rules, opening new avenues for the integration of expert knowledge.

The challenge of incorporating expert rules into neural networks involves several key considerations that must be carefully balanced. First, the representation of expert rules must be sufficiently formal and structured to be processed by the network while remaining faithful to the original expert knowledge. Second, the integration mechanism must preserve the network's ability to learn from data while effectively utilizing the encoded rules. Third, the resulting system must maintain interpretability, allowing users to understand how expert knowledge influences the network's decisions. These requirements have led to the development of various innovative approaches, each with its own strengths and limitations.

Concept-based learning provides a natural framework for addressing these challenges by organizing knowledge around clearly defined concepts and their relationships. This approach aligns well with how human experts typically structure their knowledge and makes it easier to incorporate domain-specific rules and constraints. Furthermore, by making concepts explicit within the network architecture, it becomes possible to create more interpretable models that can explain their decisions in terms that domain experts can understand and validate. This transparency is crucial for building trust in applications where accountability and verification are essential.

The practical implementation of these ideas has already shown promising results across various domains. In medical diagnosis, systems that combine neural networks with expert rules have demonstrated improved accuracy while providing interpretable explanations for their diagnoses. In financial applications, hybrid approaches have successfully incorporated regulatory constraints and risk management rules into predictive models. These early successes suggest that the integration of expert rules through concept-based learning could become a standard approach in developing more reliable and transparent artificial intelligence systems.

The shadows creep along the walls, dark and menacing, he says. I roll my eyes and flick on another light switch. It's 2 PM on a sunny Tuesday.

In hushed, dramatic tones, he describes the ancient evil lurking in my kitchen. I'm trying to make a sandwich.

"The air grows thick with malevolent energy," he whispers intensely. I open a window because I burned my toast.

He gasps as I reach for the knife drawer. "The gleaming instruments of death call to you." It's a butter knife, and I need it for the mayonnaise.

"Each step brings you closer to your doom," he intones. I'm just walking to the fridge to get the lettuce.

The narrator's voice trembles as I open the refrigerator door. "The cold breath of the underworld escapes its prison." No, that's just the cooling system working properly.

"Pale, lifeless forms await within," he continues. Yeah, that's what happens when you store eggs and milk.

I grab the tomatoes, and he nearly faints. "Blood-red spheres of forbidden knowledge!" They were on sale at the grocery store, two for one.

"Your hands tremble as you make the ritual cuts," he breathes. I'm just slicing the tomatoes, and my hands are perfectly steady, thank you very much.

The lettuce makes him particularly agitated. "Green, writhing tentacles of eldritch horror!" It's iceberg lettuce. The least exciting lettuce in existence.

"The ancient condiments of power call forth their dark magic!" I squeeze the mayonnaise bottle. It makes a slightly rude noise.

He's practically hyperventilating as I stack the ingredients. "Layer upon layer of forbidden combinations!" It's a BLT. Possibly the most normal sandwich in existence.

"The final seal is broken!" he declares as I put the second slice of bread on top. I consider making another sandwich just to spite him.

"Now the transformation begins!" he announces as I lift the sandwich. I take a big, deliberate bite while maintaining eye contact with the ceiling.

"The ritual is complete! The sacrifice has been consumed!" He sounds like he's about to pass out. I chew thoroughly and swallow.

"What horrors have you unleashed upon this mortal realm?" he demands. Lunch. I have unleashed lunch.

"The darkness grows stronger with each passing moment!" Actually, it's getting brighter because the sun just came out from behind a cloud.

I finish my sandwich in peaceful defiance of his narrative, brush the crumbs off my hands, and start loading the dishwasher. He's still muttering about ancient curses and impending doom, but I've learned to tune him out. Maybe tomorrow I'll make spaghetti and really give him something to be dramatic about.

أدى النقص الحاد في كميات الأسماك الواردة إلى سوق كلباء المركزي خلال الأيام القليلة الماضية إلى ارتفاع ملحوظ في أسعار مختلف أنواع الأسماك، مما أثار استياء المستهلكين وأصحاب المطاعم على حد سواء.

وأرجع الصيادون المحليون سبب شح الأسماك إلى سوء الأحوال الجوية وارتفاع درجات الحرارة، مما أدى إلى هجرة الأسماك إلى المياه العميقة بحثاً عن درجات حرارة أكثر اعتدالاً.

وأكد تجار السمك في السوق المركزي أن أسعار بعض أنواع الأسماك المحلية المفضلة ارتفعت بنسبة تصل إلى 40% مقارنة بالأسعار المعتادة، مما دفع العديد من المستهلكين للبحث عن بدائل أقل تكلفة.

وقال علي الزعابي، أحد كبار تجار الأسماك في السوق: "نشهد انخفاضاً غير مسبوق في كميات الأسماك الواردة إلى السوق، خاصة الأنواع المحلية المطلوبة مثل الهامور والشعري والكنعد."

وأضاف أن هذا الوضع قد يستمر لعدة أسابيع أخرى حتى تتحسن الظروف البحرية وتعود الأسماك إلى مياهها المعتادة القريبة من الساحل.

وأشار مسؤول في بلدية كلباء إلى أن الجهات المعنية تراقب الوضع عن كثب وتعمل على إيجاد حلول لضمان استقرار الأسعار وتوفير البدائل المناسبة للمستهلكين.

وفي السياق ذاته، أكد عدد من أصحاب المطاعم أن ارتفاع أسعار الأسماك أثر سلباً على أعمالهم، مما اضطرهم إلى رفع أسعار وجباتهم أو تقليص كميات الأسماك المستخدمة.

ودعا خبراء في مجال الثروة السمكية إلى ضرورة تطوير استراتيجيات مستدامة للصيد وتعزيز مشاريع الاستزراع السمكي لمواجهة مثل هذه التحديات مستقبلاً.

وتجدر الإشارة إلى أن سوق كلباء المركزي يعد أحد أهم أسواق الأسماك في المنطقة الشرقية من إمارة الشارقة، حيث يعتمد عليه سكان المنطقة والمناطق المجاورة في تلبية احتياجاتهم من الأسماك الطازجة.

أعلنت وزارة الداخلية المصرية اليوم عن استشهاد 13 من رجال الشرطة في هجوم إرهابي غادر استهدف كمين الصفا بمدينة العريش في شمال سيناء.

وأوضح بيان الوزارة أن الهجوم وقع إثر إطلاق قذائف هاون على الكمين، مما أدى إلى سقوط الشهداء وإصابة عدد آخر من القوات.

وأكدت الوزارة أن قوات الأمن تقوم بتمشيط المنطقة وملاحقة العناصر الإرهابية المتورطة في الحادث، مشددة على أن هذا العمل الإرهابي لن يثني عزيمة رجال الشرطة.

香港卫生署卫生防护中心今日公布，截至昨日午夜12时，香港新增108例新冠肺炎确诊个案，其中本地感染占105例，输入性病例3例。目前香港累计确诊病例已突破12,000例。

为应对疫情反弹，香港特区政府宣布，明日起所有政府部门实施在家工作安排，为期一周。必要岗位人员将继续维持有限度的紧急及基本公共服务。

卫生防护中心传染病处主任张竹君医生表示，新增确诊个案中有43例源头不明，情况令人担忧。其中，油尖旺区及深水埗区的确诊数字持续上升。

特区政府发言人强调，实施公务员在家工作安排旨在减少人员流动及社交接触，以切断病毒传播链。政府呼吁私营机构雇主酌情采取相应措施。

卫生署署长陈汉仪表示，近期确诊个案呈上升趋势，显示社区传播持续活跃。她呼吁市民保持警惕，严格遵守防疫措施。

医管局总行政经理（质素及标准）刘家献医生指出，目前公立医院收治的确诊患者中，有23人情况危重，38人情况严重，其余患者情况稳定。

特区政府重申，将继续加强对高风险地区的病毒检测工作，并扩大强制检测范围。同时，政府正积极筹备疫苗接种计划。

多位专家学者表示，香港第四波疫情仍未见顶，预计未来一周确诊数字将继续上升。他们建议政府考虑进一步收紧社交距离措施。

市民陈小姐表示，对疫情反弹感到忧虑，但理解政府采取的防疫措施。她说："希望大家都能配合防疫工作，尽快控制疫情。"

近日，一项针对电动汽车市场的消费者调查显示，特斯拉Model 3和Model S车型正在重新获得消费者的青睐，品牌认可度明显回升。

调查数据表明，在过去六个月中，特斯拉这两款主力车型的消费者满意度上升了15%，其中Model 3的好评率达到了88%，创下近两年新高。

专家分析认为，这一转变主要得益于特斯拉近期在质量控制和售后服务方面的显著改进，以及更具竞争力的价格策略。

值得注意的是，Model 3在年轻消费群体中的欢迎程度尤其突出，90后购车者对其设计理念和智能化功能给予了高度评价。

调查还发现，特斯拉在充电网络建设方面的持续投入，有效缓解了消费者的里程焦虑，这被认为是品牌重获信任的关键因素之一。

与此同时，Model S在高端市场的表现同样亮眼，其最新款车型在豪华电动轿车细分市场的占有率同比提升了12个百分点。

市场研究机构指出，尽管新能源汽车市场竞争日趋激烈，特斯拉依然保持着技术创新的优势，这为品牌的持续发展提供了有力支撑。

消费者反馈显示，特斯拉在软件更新和用户体验优化方面的努力得到了广泛认可，超过75%的用户表示愿意向亲友推荐该品牌。

业内人士预测，随着新一代电池技术的应用和自动驾驶功能的进一步完善，特斯拉有望在未来的市场竞争中继续保持领先地位。

Here's a 794-word introduction split into 10 paragraphs for the academic paper (asterisk note omitted for flow):

In distributed computing systems, the reliability of broadcast protocols forms the cornerstone of dependable communication. As networks grow increasingly complex and dynamic, the challenge of maintaining consistent and accurate message dissemination becomes particularly acute when faced with Byzantine faults—especially those that can move or propagate through the system. These mobile Byzantine faults represent a sophisticated threat model where adversarial nodes can dynamically transfer their malicious behavior to different parts of the network, creating a more challenging environment than traditional static Byzantine failures.

The concept of mobile Byzantine faults was first introduced to address scenarios where compromised nodes could recover, but the total number of simultaneously compromised nodes remained bounded. This model more accurately reflects real-world situations where attacks might propagate through a network, such as in cases of malware infections, coordinated cyber-attacks, or cascading hardware failures. Unlike static Byzantine faults, where the set of faulty nodes remains constant throughout the execution of the protocol, mobile Byzantine faults present a moving target that significantly complicates the design of reliable broadcast mechanisms.

Traditional approaches to Byzantine fault tolerance often rely on assumptions about the static nature of faulty nodes, allowing protocols to identify and isolate problematic participants over time. However, these methods prove inadequate when confronting mobile Byzantine faults, as the very nodes that might be trusted in one round of communication could become compromised in the next. This dynamic nature of the threat necessitates a fundamental rethinking of how we design and implement reliable broadcast protocols.

The challenge of achieving reliable broadcast in the presence of mobile Byzantine faults lies not only in ensuring message delivery but also in maintaining consistency across all correct nodes. When Byzantine nodes can move, they may temporarily corrupt different parts of the network at different times, potentially creating conflicting views of the broadcast message among honest participants. This temporal aspect of the fault model introduces new complexities in achieving agreement and validity properties that are essential for reliable broadcast.

Recent advances in distributed systems theory have begun to address these challenges through various approaches, including temporal message authentication, dynamic trust management, and adaptive consensus mechanisms. These solutions attempt to track and adapt to the movement of Byzantine faults while maintaining the fundamental properties required for reliable broadcast: agreement, validity, and termination. However, the inherent uncertainty introduced by mobility continues to pose significant theoretical and practical challenges.

Our research builds upon these foundations while introducing novel mechanisms for detecting and mitigating the impact of mobile Byzantine faults. By leveraging temporal patterns in fault movement and incorporating probabilistic analysis of node behavior, we propose a new framework for reliable broadcast that can maintain correctness even as Byzantine faults move through the system. This approach represents a significant departure from traditional Byzantine fault-tolerant protocols, acknowledging the dynamic nature of modern security threats.

The implications of this work extend beyond theoretical computer science, touching upon practical applications in areas such as cloud computing, blockchain systems, and Internet of Things (IoT) networks. In these contexts, the ability to maintain reliable broadcast capabilities despite mobile Byzantine faults becomes crucial for ensuring the integrity and availability of distributed services. Our findings suggest that by carefully considering the temporal and spatial characteristics of fault mobility, it is possible to design protocols that remain robust even under these challenging conditions.

Central to our approach is the recognition that mobile Byzantine faults create patterns of behavior that, while more complex than static faults, still exhibit certain predictable characteristics. By analyzing these patterns and developing appropriate response mechanisms, we demonstrate that reliable broadcast can be achieved with lower overhead than previously thought possible. This efficiency is particularly important in resource-constrained environments where traditional Byzantine fault-tolerant protocols might be too expensive to implement.

The theoretical foundations we establish in this paper open new avenues for research in distributed systems security and reliability. By providing a formal framework for understanding and addressing mobile Byzantine faults, we enable future researchers to build upon these results and develop increasingly sophisticated protocols. Our analysis includes rigorous proofs of correctness and performance bounds, ensuring that implementations based on our work can provide strong guarantees even in adversarial conditions.

As distributed systems continue to grow in scale and complexity, the importance of addressing mobile Byzantine faults becomes increasingly apparent.

في خضم الأزمة الاقتصادية المتفاقمة التي تشهدها البلاد، تواجه وزارة المال تحديات جمة في معالجة الواقع الاقتصادي المتردي، وسط حالة من الضبابية وعدم وضوح الرؤية المستقبلية. فالتصريحات المتناقضة والوعود المتكررة التي تطلقها الوزارة لم تعد تلقى آذاناً صاغية لدى المواطنين الذين يعانون من تدهور مستمر في مستوى معيشتهم.

وفي ظل غياب خطة اقتصادية واضحة المعالم، تستمر المؤشرات الاقتصادية في التراجع، حيث سجل التضخم مستويات قياسية، وارتفعت نسب البطالة بشكل غير مسبوق، في حين تواصل العملة المحلية انهيارها أمام العملات الأجنبية. وتشير التقديرات الاقتصادية إلى أن الوضع قد يزداد سوءاً في الأشهر المقبلة ما لم تتخذ إجراءات جذرية وفعالة.

ويرى خبراء الاقتصاد أن عدم قدرة وزارة المال على المصارحة بحقيقة الوضع الاقتصادي وتداعياته المستقبلية يزيد من حدة الأزمة ويضعف ثقة المستثمرين المحليين والأجانب في الاقتصاد الوطني. فالشفافية في التعامل مع الأزمة وإعلان خطة إصلاح واضحة أصبحت ضرورة ملحة لا يمكن تأجيلها.

وفي سياق متصل، كشفت مصادر مطلعة عن مساعٍ حثيثة تقوم بها الوزارة للتفاوض مع صندوق النقد الدولي للحصول على حزمة مساعدات مالية جديدة، غير أن هذه المفاوضات تصطدم بشروط صعبة تتعلق بضرورة تنفيذ إصلاحات هيكلية في الاقتصاد وترشيد الإنفاق الحكومي وإصلاح القطاع العام.

وتواجه وزارة المال ضغوطاً متزايدة من مختلف القوى السياسية والاقتصادية والاجتماعية للكشف عن خطتها في معالجة الأزمة الراهنة، خاصة مع تزايد المخاوف من انهيار اقتصادي شامل قد يؤدي إلى اضطرابات اجتماعية خطيرة. فالمواطن العادي لم يعد قادراً على تحمل المزيد من الأعباء المالية في ظل ارتفاع الأسعار وتدني القدرة الشرائية.

وفي الختام، يبدو أن الخروج من النفق المظلم يتطلب إرادة سياسية حقيقية وخطة إنقاذ شاملة تتضمن إصلاحات جذرية في مختلف القطاعات، مع ضرورة تحلي وزارة المال بالشفافية والمصداقية في التعامل مع الأزمة. فالوقت يداهم الجميع، والحلول الترقيعية لم تعد تجدي نفعاً في ظل عمق الأزمة وتشعب تداعياتها.

在当今竞争激烈的保健品市场中，一个新兴品牌正在以其独特的商业模式引起广泛关注。「美日觉醒」以其创新的营销策略和优质的产品，正在为追求健康生活的现代人开启一扇斜杠收入的大门。

这家成立于2022年的保健品公司，不仅致力于提供高品质的营养补充剂，更重要的是创造了一个让普通消费者也能参与其中的商业生态系统。通过"社群营销+直播电商"的双轨模式，「美日觉醒」正在重新定义传统保健品行业的营销方式。

据公司创始人王明远介绍，「美日觉醒」采用的是"共享经济+健康管理"的创新模式。消费者不仅可以享受到优质的保健产品，还能通过成为品牌推广者获得可观的收入。这种模式既满足了人们对健康生活的追求，又为他们提供了一个实现财务自由的机会。

值得注意的是，「美日觉醒」的产品研发团队由来自日本和美国的专家组成，确保了产品的科学性和安全性。所有产品都通过了严格的质量认证，并获得了多项国际专利，这也是该品牌能够快速获得消费者信任的重要原因。

在社交媒体时代，「美日觉醒」充分利用短视频平台和直播带货的优势，让产品信息更直观地传递给消费者。同时，公司还建立了完善的培训体系，帮助推广者掌握专业的产品知识和营销技能。

数据显示，截至2023年底，已有超过10万名消费者通过「美日觉醒」的平台实现了额外收入，其中超过1000人的月收入突破2万元。这种"以健康带动财富"的模式，正在吸引越来越多的年轻人加入。

公司市场总监李婷表示，「美日觉醒」未来将继续扩大产品线，并计划在2024年推出更多创新性的营养补充产品。同时，公司也将加大技术投入，开发智能健康管理系统，为用户提供更全面的健康解决方案。

专家认为，「美日觉醒」的成功不仅在于其优质的产品，更重要的是抓住了当代人对健康和副业的双重需求。在后疫情时代，这种既能改善健康又能创造收入的商业模式，很可能成为保健品行业的新趋势。

Dans une décision historique, le conseil municipal de notre ville a voté à l'unanimité le changement de nom d'une rue emblématique du centre-ville.

La rue anciennement connue sous le nom de "Rue des Tilleuls" deviendra officiellement la "Rue du Merle-Blanc" dès le mois prochain.

Cette décision fait suite à une pétition lancée par les habitants du quartier, qui souhaitaient honorer la présence régulière d'un merle blanc, phénomène rare, dans ce secteur depuis plus de trois ans.

En parallèle, un nouvel espace commémoratif a été inauguré hier : le "Souvenir Michel-Tanné", en hommage à l'ancien chef des pompiers décédé l'année dernière.

Michel Tanné avait servi la communauté pendant plus de quatre décennies, laissant une empreinte indélébile dans l'histoire de notre service d'incendie.

La cérémonie d'inauguration s'est déroulée en présence de sa famille et de nombreux collègues pompiers, dans une atmosphère empreinte d'émotion.

Dans la continuité de cet hommage, la caserne des pompiers a annoncé le lancement d'un nouveau programme de formation pour les jeunes.

Cette initiative, baptisée "Jeunes Pompiers en Action", vise à sensibiliser les adolescents aux métiers de la sécurité civile.

Déjà, plus de cinquante candidatures ont été reçues pour ce programme qui débutera en septembre.

Les jeunes sélectionnés suivront une formation complète de deux ans, alternant théorie et pratique.

Le maire s'est félicité de cette initiative qui "perpétue l'esprit de service et d'engagement de Michel Tanné".

Les inscriptions pour ce programme restent ouvertes jusqu'à la fin du mois en cours.

La ville espère ainsi former une nouvelle génération de pompiers dévoués et compétents.

In the heart of Kazakhstan's vast steppes, where the land stretches endlessly toward the horizon, Dr. Elena Petrova stood transfixed before the smoking wreckage. The twisted metal bore unmistakable markings – NASA's iconic logo and the distinctive silhouette of humanity's most distant explorer, Voyager 1. Her hands trembled as she cross-referenced the telemetry data on her tablet: the original Voyager 1 was transmitting normally, over 14 billion miles away, continuing its eternal journey through interstellar space. Yet here, partially buried in the earth before her, lay what appeared to be its exact twin, down to the smallest detail.

The recovery team worked methodically around her, documenting every fragment and scanning for radiation. The golden record, that ambitious message to alien civilizations, was intact but different. Elena noticed subtle variations in the engravings – similar pictographs and mathematical constants, but with slight alterations that suggested either an imperfect copy or an alternative version of human history. The spacecraft's structure showed signs of technological advancement beyond 1977's capabilities, despite maintaining the same basic design. Most puzzling were the scorch marks on its surface, which seemed to indicate it had traveled through time rather than just space.

As news of the discovery spread, the scientific community fractured into competing theories. Some suggested parallel universes, others proposed future humans had built a replica for reasons unknown. The most unsettling hypothesis came from Dr. James Chen at MIT, who demonstrated that the metallurgical composition of the crashed probe contained elements that didn't exist in our periodic table. The implications were staggering – this wasn't just a copy of Voyager 1, but perhaps a message from an alternate version of humanity, or something far more incomprehensible.

The breakthrough came three weeks later, when Elena's team managed to access the probe's data storage. The images and information it contained showed a journey similar to our Voyager 1's mission, but through a subtly different solar system. The Jupiter it photographed had an additional moon; Saturn's rings displayed patterns that didn't match our records. Most shocking were the final transmissions – a sequence of images showing Earth, but not our Earth.

En medio de un panorama económico desafiante, el sector agrícola ha demostrado su resiliencia durante el mes de agosto, registrando resultados positivos tanto en producción como en estabilidad de precios para los consumidores.

Los agricultores de las principales regiones productivas del país reportan cosechas excepcionales de granos básicos, especialmente en maíz y frijol, superando las expectativas iniciales gracias a condiciones climáticas favorables y la implementación de técnicas agrícolas mejoradas.

Las cifras oficiales del Ministerio de Agricultura indican un incremento del 15% en la producción total respecto al mismo período del año anterior, consolidando así una tendencia positiva que beneficia tanto a productores como a consumidores finales.

Los mercados mayoristas han mantenido una notable estabilidad en los precios de los productos agrícolas básicos, lo cual ha permitido que las familias puedan acceder a alimentos frescos sin experimentar los aumentos significativos que se temían al inicio de la temporada.

Esta estabilidad se atribuye principalmente a la abundante oferta local y a las políticas de regulación implementadas por las autoridades, que han logrado contener las presiones inflacionarias en el sector alimentario.

Los pequeños productores, en particular, han expresado su satisfacción con los resultados obtenidos, destacando que los programas de apoyo gubernamental y el acceso a mejores tecnologías han sido fundamentales para alcanzar estos niveles de producción.

Las cooperativas agrícolas reportan que sus sistemas de almacenamiento están operando a plena capacidad, lo que garantiza un suministro constante de productos para los próximos meses y ayuda a mantener la estabilidad en los precios.

Los expertos del sector pronostican que esta tendencia positiva podría mantenerse durante el último trimestre del año, siempre que las condiciones meteorológicas continúen siendo favorables y se mantengan los actuales niveles de apoyo al sector.

Here's a 1,098-word introduction split into 9 paragraphs for your academic paper:

Time series forecasting has emerged as a critical component in numerous domains, from financial market prediction to climate modeling and industrial process optimization. While traditional statistical methods have long been the cornerstone of time series analysis, the advent of deep learning has revolutionized our approach to temporal data prediction. However, despite their remarkable success, deep neural networks often struggle to incorporate domain expertise and established theoretical knowledge effectively, potentially overlooking valuable insights that could enhance their predictive capabilities. This limitation becomes particularly apparent when dealing with complex time series data that exhibits well-understood underlying patterns or adheres to known physical laws.

The integration of domain knowledge into machine learning models has been a persistent challenge in artificial intelligence research. While deep neural networks excel at discovering patterns from large datasets, they frequently operate as black boxes, making decisions based purely on statistical correlations without considering established theoretical frameworks or domain-specific constraints. This disconnect between learned representations and human expertise can lead to predictions that, while statistically sound, may violate fundamental principles or fail to capitalize on well-established domain knowledge that could improve their accuracy and reliability.

To address these limitations, we present KENN (Knowledge-Enhanced Neural Networks), a novel framework that seamlessly incorporates domain knowledge into deep learning architectures for time series forecasting. KENN introduces a hybrid approach that combines the powerful feature learning capabilities of neural networks with structured knowledge representation, enabling models to leverage both data-driven insights and expert knowledge simultaneously. This integration is achieved through a specialized architecture that maintains the flexibility of deep learning while enforcing consistency with known patterns, relationships, and constraints specific to the temporal domain under consideration.

The fundamental innovation of KENN lies in its ability to encode domain knowledge as differentiable constraints and auxiliary learning objectives, which guide the network's learning process without sacrificing its capacity to discover new patterns. This is accomplished through a multi-level knowledge integration mechanism that operates at both the architectural and loss function levels. At the architectural level, KENN introduces knowledge-guided attention mechanisms and specialized layers that explicitly model known temporal dependencies and patterns. At the loss function level, it incorporates physics-informed regularization terms and knowledge-based constraints that ensure predictions align with established domain principles.

Our framework represents a significant advancement in the field of time series forecasting by addressing several critical challenges that have historically limited the effectiveness of deep learning approaches. First, it reduces the reliance on massive datasets by leveraging prior knowledge to guide learning in data-scarce scenarios. Second, it enhances model interpretability by explicitly incorporating domain knowledge into the prediction process, making it easier to understand and validate the model's decisions. Third, it improves generalization performance by constraining the solution space to physically or theoretically plausible predictions, particularly important when forecasting complex temporal phenomena.

The versatility of KENN is demonstrated through its successful application across diverse domains, including financial market prediction, weather forecasting, and industrial process monitoring. In each case, the framework demonstrates superior performance compared to traditional deep learning approaches, particularly in scenarios where domain knowledge plays a crucial role in understanding temporal dynamics. For instance, in financial forecasting, KENN successfully incorporates market microstructure theories and regulatory constraints, leading to more reliable predictions of price movements and market trends.

Empirical evaluations on multiple benchmark datasets reveal that KENN consistently outperforms state-of-the-art baseline models, achieving an average improvement of 15-20% in forecasting accuracy across different metrics. More importantly, the framework shows remarkable robustness in handling challenging scenarios such as regime changes, extreme events, and limited training data. These improvements are attributed to the model's ability to leverage domain knowledge effectively, particularly in situations where pure data-driven approaches struggle to capture complex temporal dependencies or rare events.

The technical contributions of this work extend beyond the mere combination of knowledge and neural networks. We introduce novel architectural components specifically designed for time series forecasting, including knowledge-aware attention mechanisms, temporal knowledge graphs, and adaptive knowledge integration layers. These components are complemented by innovative training strategies that balance the influence of data-driven learning and knowledge-based constraints, ensuring optimal performance across different forecasting scenarios. Furthermore, we develop efficient methods for encoding and updating domain knowledge, making the framework adaptable to evolving temporal patterns and new insights.

The sirens blared that fateful morning, but I simply sipped my coffee, watching chaos unfold through my kitchen window.

Neighbors frantically packed their cars, while I calmly watered my petunias, knowing full well what was coming.

After three centuries of existence, a zombie apocalypse seemed almost quaint – just another Thursday in my immortal life.

The first zombie shuffled past my white picket fence, and I nodded politely, as one does to any neighbor, undead or otherwise.

It was peculiar, really, how they simply ignored me – perhaps death recognized death's absence in me, or maybe they sensed I wasn't worth the effort.

I maintained my routine: morning yoga, afternoon gardening, evening reading – though now with the occasional moaning soundtrack.

The electricity stayed on longer than expected, nearly three weeks, which gave me time to finish my Netflix queue before switching to my extensive book collection.

Sometimes I'd walk to the abandoned grocery store, carefully stepping around the shambling corpses to restock my pantry.

The zombies would part like the Red Sea, unconsciously giving me space as if I were a rock in their stream of decay.

I started leaving my front door open – no need for locks when the only visitors were mindless creatures who couldn't care less about your existence.

My garden flourished that summer, fertilized by decomposing matter I'd rather not think about too closely.

I held tea parties on my porch, setting places for guests who would never arrive, surrounded by the symphony of groans and distant screams.

Once a month, I'd dress up and walk to the local library, borrowing books that would never need returning.

The silence between the moans became my meditation, a reminder that even in chaos, there could be peace.

I began painting the zombies – they made excellent still-life subjects, though they did occasionally wander off mid-sketch.

When winter came, I knitted scarves for the less decomposed ones. They didn't notice, but I felt better about their exposed necks in the cold.

I wrote letters to no one, documenting the slow decay of civilization from my unique perspective as both observer and outsider.

Sometimes survivors would pass through, wide-eyed and terrified, unable to comprehend how I could sit so calmly among the dead.

Here's a 767-word introduction split into 5 paragraphs for your academic paper:

The emergence of egocentric hand pose estimation has become increasingly crucial in human-computer interaction, virtual and augmented reality, and gesture-based interfaces. As wearable devices like smart glasses and head-mounted displays become more prevalent, the ability to accurately track and reconstruct hand movements from a first-person perspective has transformed from an ambitious technical challenge into a fundamental requirement for next-generation interactive systems. However, existing approaches to egocentric 3D hand pose estimation face significant limitations, particularly in their reliance on single-view data for training and inference, which often fails to capture the full complexity of hand articulations and self-occlusions inherent in egocentric perspectives.

Traditional single-view methods have made considerable progress in controlled environments, leveraging deep learning architectures and large-scale datasets to achieve promising results in third-person scenarios. Yet, when applied to egocentric settings, these approaches frequently struggle with the unique challenges posed by the first-person viewpoint, including severe self-occlusions, rapid hand movements, and varying lighting conditions. The fundamental issue lies in the inherent ambiguity of 3D pose reconstruction from a single viewpoint, where multiple possible hand configurations could produce similar 2D projections, leading to significant uncertainty in depth estimation and joint positioning.

To address these limitations, recent research has explored multi-view approaches that utilize multiple synchronized cameras to capture hand poses from different angles simultaneously. While these methods have demonstrated superior accuracy and robustness compared to single-view approaches, they present practical challenges in real-world applications. The requirement for multiple calibrated cameras increases system complexity, cost, and computational overhead, making such solutions impractical for everyday use in wearable devices. Moreover, the vast majority of existing egocentric datasets and deployed systems are based on single-view configurations, creating a significant gap between research innovations and practical applications.

This paper introduces a novel single-to-dual-view adaptation framework that bridges this gap by enabling more accurate and robust 3D hand pose estimation from single egocentric views while leveraging the benefits of multi-view learning. Our approach employs a carefully designed cross-view consistency learning mechanism that allows the model to learn rich view-invariant features during training, even when only single-view inputs are available during inference. By incorporating a synthetic dual-view generation module and a view-adaptive fusion network, our framework can effectively simulate and utilize multi-view constraints without requiring additional cameras during deployment. This innovation represents a significant step forward in addressing the fundamental limitations of single-view egocentric hand pose estimation while maintaining practical applicability.

The key contributions of our work are threefold. First, we propose a novel architecture that enables the adaptation of single-view inputs to dual-view representations through a learned transformation module, effectively expanding the model's understanding of hand pose geometry beyond the limitations of a single perspective. Second, we introduce a cross-view consistency loss that enforces geometric constraints between the generated dual views, ensuring coherent and physically plausible pose estimations.

Un reciente estudio realizado por Comscore, la reconocida empresa de medición y análisis digital, ha revelado que el Perú cuenta actualmente con 12,7 millones de usuarios activos de internet, marcando un hito significativo en la penetración digital del país andino.

Los datos, que corresponden al último trimestre analizado, muestran un crecimiento sostenido en comparación con períodos anteriores, evidenciando la creciente adopción de tecnologías digitales en la sociedad peruana, especialmente en zonas urbanas.

El informe destaca que aproximadamente el 65% de estos usuarios se concentra en Lima Metropolitana, mientras que el resto se distribuye entre las principales ciudades del interior del país, como Arequipa, Trujillo y Cusco, donde el acceso a internet ha experimentado un notable incremento.

Un aspecto relevante del estudio señala que el 78% de los internautas peruanos accede a internet principalmente a través de dispositivos móviles, reflejando una clara tendencia hacia la conectividad móvil y el consumo de contenido en smartphones y tablets.

Las redes sociales continúan siendo las plataformas más visitadas por los usuarios peruanos, seguidas por sitios de noticias, entretenimiento y comercio electrónico. Este último sector ha registrado un crecimiento particularmente significativo, con un aumento del 45% en el número de transacciones online.

El estudio también revela que el tiempo promedio de navegación diaria por usuario es de 6,2 horas, ubicando al Perú por encima del promedio regional en términos de engagement digital.

Los expertos de Comscore señalan que estos resultados reflejan el éxito de las políticas de digitalización implementadas en el país durante los últimos años, así como la creciente inversión en infraestructura de telecomunicaciones.

En el ámbito demográfico, el grupo etario entre 18 y 34 años representa el 58% del total de usuarios, seguido por el segmento de 35 a 44 años con un 23%, evidenciando una clara dominancia de la población joven en el entorno digital peruano.

Esta tendencia al alza en el número de internautas sugiere un futuro prometedor para el desarrollo digital del Perú, aunque también plantea desafíos importantes en términos de inclusión digital y reducción de la brecha tecnológica en zonas rurales y remotas del país.
