Dans un tragique événement qui a secoué la communauté universitaire européenne, une étudiante française participant au programme Erasmus a été découverte sans vie dans son appartement à Madrid.

La victime, âgée de 21 ans et originaire de Lyon, était en échange universitaire depuis septembre dernier à l'Universidad Complutense de Madrid, où elle poursuivait des études en langues étrangères appliquées.

C'est sa colocataire qui a fait la macabre découverte hier matin, après s'être inquiétée de ne pas avoir vu la jeune femme depuis plusieurs jours.

Les autorités espagnoles ont immédiatement ouvert une enquête pour déterminer les circonstances exactes du décès, bien que les premiers éléments suggèrent un acte volontaire.

Selon ses proches, l'étudiante n'avait montré aucun signe de détresse particulière lors de ses dernières communications avec sa famille, survenues il y a une semaine.

L'ambassade de France en Espagne a été immédiatement informée et travaille en étroite collaboration avec les autorités locales pour accompagner la famille dans ces moments difficiles.

L'université d'accueil a mis en place une cellule psychologique pour soutenir les étudiants et le personnel affectés par ce drame.

Cette tragédie soulève des questions sur l'accompagnement psychologique des étudiants en mobilité internationale, particulièrement vulnérables à l'isolement.

Une cérémonie d'hommage sera organisée la semaine prochaine sur le campus madrilène, tandis que le rapatriement du corps est en cours d'organisation par les services consulaires.

The scalar Gaussian wiretap channel represents a fundamental model in physical layer security, where secure communication occurs in the presence of an eavesdropper. While extensive research has addressed various aspects of this channel, the consideration of peak amplitude constraints introduces significant analytical challenges that remain largely unexplored.

In practical communication systems, hardware limitations and regulatory requirements often impose strict constraints on the peak amplitude of transmitted signals. These constraints fundamentally alter the nature of optimal input distributions, departing from the conventional Gaussian signaling that is optimal for average power-constrained scenarios.

The intersection of secrecy requirements and peak amplitude constraints presents a particularly intricate optimization problem. The capacity-achieving input distribution for this channel must simultaneously maximize the legitimate receiver's information rate while ensuring that the eavesdropper gains minimal information, all while adhering to strict amplitude boundaries.

Previous works have primarily focused on either peak amplitude constraints in non-secure channels or secrecy capacity under average power constraints. The joint consideration of these constraints has been limited, primarily due to the mathematical complexity involved in characterizing the optimal input distribution under these dual requirements.

Our work addresses this gap by developing a numerical framework for computing the optimal input distribution for the scalar Gaussian wiretap channel subject to peak amplitude constraints. This approach leverages recent advances in convex optimization and functional analysis to transform an infinite-dimensional optimization problem into a tractable numerical solution.

The significance of this investigation extends beyond theoretical interests. In practical implementations of physical layer security, particularly in power-limited devices or systems operating under strict regulatory frameworks, understanding the optimal signaling strategy under peak constraints is crucial for achieving maximum secure throughput.

Through careful mathematical analysis and numerical validation, we demonstrate that the optimal input distribution exhibits distinct characteristics that differ significantly from both the unconstrained wiretap channel and the peak-constrained channel without secrecy requirements. These findings provide valuable insights for the design of practical secure communication systems operating under realistic hardware constraints.

The red dust swirled outside the reinforced windows of Transport Vessel 247, carrying another batch of the condemned toward their cosmic punishment. Sarah Matthews pressed her forehead against the cold glass, watching Earth shrink into a pale blue dot behind them. Unlike the traditional death row, this sentence offered a twisted form of hope – the chance to survive on an alien world, albeit without any possibility of return.

In the three years since the Global Justice Reform Act had passed, nearly a thousand former death row inmates had been sent to establish the first penal colony on Mars. The public had embraced the change, seeing it as both more humane and practical. After all, someone had to test the harsh conditions of Mars before civilian colonization could begin, and who better than those who had already forfeited their right to life on Earth?

Sarah's hands, free of restraints during the journey, traced the outline of the photograph she'd been allowed to bring – her daughter's tenth birthday party, taken just weeks before the incident that landed her here. The memory of that night still haunted her: the intruder, the kitchen knife, the split-second decision that transformed her from suburban mother to convicted killer. Self-defense, she'd claimed, but the jury saw it differently.

The other eleven passengers in her transport pod remained eerily quiet, each lost in their own thoughts. Some had volunteered for this alternative sentence, preferring the unknown possibilities of Mars to the certainty of lethal injection. Others, like Sarah, had been given no choice when the law changed. They were a diverse group – former gang members, white-collar criminals whose actions had led to deaths, and people like her, whose cases lived in the grey areas of justice.

The mandatory training they'd received before launch had been intense: basic engineering, hydroponics, emergency medical procedures, and survival skills. The authorities had made it clear – their survival was their own responsibility. The monthly supply drops would provide the essentials, but building a sustainable colony fell to them. It was a cruel irony that those deemed unfit for society were now tasked with creating one from scratch.

Through the vessel's communication system, they could hear the pilot announcing their approach to the existing settlement. Dome Alpha, as it was officially known, or "Hell's Outpost" as the inmates called it, would be visible soon. Sarah thought about the messages she'd received from her daughter during training – tearful videos promising to become an astronaut someday, just to see her mother again. She'd never told her child that such a reunion was impossible, that this sentence was as final as the one it replaced.

The first glimpse of the Martian surface brought a collective gasp from the passengers. The massive transparent domes gleamed under the distant sun, surrounded by makeshift structures and solar arrays that stretched across the rust-colored landscape. This would be their home now, their prison without walls, their chance at redemption or their final resting place – perhaps both. As Transport Vessel 247 began its descent, Sarah closed her eyes and whispered a prayer, not for survival, but for the strength to find purpose in this cosmic exile, where the horizon stretched endlessly red and the Earth was just another star in the alien sky.

起亚汽车日前发布了全新改款的Picanto GT-Line车型，以其运动化设计和精致细节赢得市场瞩目。这款城市小型车在保持灵活机动特性的同时，展现出更具进取性的外观。

预计该车型将于下个月正式登陆亚洲市场，起售价预计在15万港币左右，相信将会受到年轻消费群体的青睐。

La Federación Médica del Interior (FEMI) emitió hoy un comunicado oficial en respuesta a las recientes preocupaciones sobre la situación sanitaria en el interior del país, destacando su compromiso continuo con la calidad de atención médica.

En el documento, la organización que representa a más de 3,000 profesionales de la salud en el interior de Uruguay, expresó su profunda preocupación por la creciente disparidad en el acceso a servicios médicos entre la capital y las zonas rurales.

El Dr. Carlos Rodríguez, presidente de FEMI, enfatizó la necesidad urgente de implementar medidas correctivas para abordar la escasez de especialistas en determinadas regiones, un problema que se ha agudizado en los últimos meses.

La federación propone un plan integral de mejoras que incluye incentivos económicos para médicos dispuestos a ejercer en el interior, así como la modernización de infraestructuras sanitarias en departamentos menos desarrollados.

Entre los puntos más destacados del comunicado, se menciona la importancia de fortalecer la telemedicina como herramienta complementaria para garantizar el acceso a consultas especializadas en zonas remotas.

FEMI también señaló la necesidad de revisar los actuales convenios colectivos para asegurar condiciones laborales más atractivas que fomenten la permanencia de profesionales en el interior del país.

El comunicado hace hincapié en la importancia de la formación continua, proponiendo la creación de centros de capacitación regional que permitan a los médicos actualizarse sin necesidad de trasladarse a Montevideo.

La organización manifestó su disposición para dialogar con las autoridades del Ministerio de Salud Pública y establecer mesas de trabajo conjunto que permitan implementar las soluciones propuestas.

Asimismo, FEMI destacó los avances logrados en los últimos años en materia de equipamiento médico, aunque señaló que aún existen brechas significativas por resolver.

La federación reafirmó su compromiso con la población del interior, garantizando la continuidad de los servicios médicos mientras se trabaja en la implementación de las mejoras propuestas.

ودعا المحمود جميع الموظفين إلى الالتزام بالأنظمة والتعليمات المتعلقة بالدوام الرسمي، محذراً من خطورة التهاون في هذا الأمر وما قد يترتب عليه من آثار سلبية على المسيرة الوظيفية.

The mysterious "Face on Mars" has captivated public imagination since its discovery in 1976, leading many to speculate about its artificial origins. However, as a NASA scientist who has extensively studied this formation, I can confidently assert that the Face is nothing more than a natural geological feature shaped by Martian weathering processes. The original Viking 1 photograph that sparked these theories was taken at a low resolution and specific lighting angle that created an illusion of facial features. When the Mars Global Surveyor later captured high-resolution images of the same formation in 1998 and 2001, they clearly revealed a heavily eroded mesa, similar to many others found in Mars' Cydonia region. These detailed photographs showed none of the symmetry or architectural precision one would expect from an artificial structure.

Furthermore, the scientific evidence overwhelmingly supports the natural formation theory. The Face is approximately 2 kilometers long, and its seemingly facial features are easily explained by natural geological processes common on Mars. The "eyes" and "nose" are actually shadows cast by eroded ridges and valleys, while the "mouth" is a collection of smaller mesas and hills. Similar formations are abundant on both Mars and Earth, particularly in desert regions where wind erosion shapes rock into unusual forms. The newer images also revealed numerous other mesas in the vicinity with comparable characteristics, demonstrating that this formation is part of a larger pattern of natural geological features. When we examine the evidence objectively, it becomes clear that the Face on Mars is simply another example of pareidolia – the human tendency to see familiar patterns, like faces, in random stimuli.

The proliferation of social bots on online platforms has emerged as one of the most pressing challenges in maintaining the integrity of social media ecosystems. These automated accounts, increasingly sophisticated in their ability to mimic human behavior, have evolved from simple automated scripts to complex systems capable of engaging in nuanced interactions, spreading misinformation, and manipulating public discourse. While traditional bot detection methods have relied primarily on static features and rule-based approaches, the dynamic nature of bot behavior necessitates a more sophisticated analytical framework that can adapt to their ever-evolving strategies.

Recent advances in deep learning, particularly in the domain of graph neural networks, have opened new avenues for addressing the challenge of social bot detection. However, most existing approaches treat the social network as a static structure, failing to capture the temporal dynamics of user interactions and behavioral patterns that could serve as crucial indicators of automated activity. This limitation becomes particularly apparent when considering that modern social bots frequently modify their behavior patterns to evade detection, creating a cat-and-mouse game between defenders and malicious actors.

The temporal dimension of social media interactions provides valuable insights that static analysis methods cannot capture. User activities, relationship formations, and content sharing patterns evolve over time, creating distinct signatures that can differentiate between genuine human users and automated accounts. Understanding these temporal dynamics is crucial for developing more robust and accurate bot detection systems that can adapt to the changing landscape of social media manipulation.

Graph transformers have demonstrated remarkable success in various network analysis tasks, leveraging their ability to capture complex relationships and dependencies within graph-structured data. However, their application to dynamic social networks, particularly in the context of bot detection, remains relatively unexplored. The integration of temporal information into graph transformer architectures presents both challenges and opportunities for advancing the state of the art in social bot detection.

Our research introduces a novel approach that addresses these limitations through the development of dynamicity-aware graph transformers specifically designed for social bot detection. By incorporating temporal attention mechanisms and dynamic graph evolution patterns, our model can capture the subtle behavioral differences between human users and automated accounts across different time scales. This approach represents a significant departure from traditional static analysis methods, offering a more nuanced understanding of user behavior in social networks.

The proposed framework leverages recent developments in dynamic graph representation learning, extending the transformer architecture to explicitly model temporal dependencies in user interactions. By maintaining a temporal memory of user activities and relationship evolution, our model can identify suspicious patterns that might be invisible when considering only static snapshots of the network. This temporal awareness is particularly crucial for detecting sophisticated bots that carefully orchestrate their activities to appear more human-like.

One of the key innovations of our approach lies in its ability to adapt to changing bot behaviors without requiring constant retraining. Through the implementation of a novel dynamic attention mechanism, the model can automatically adjust its detection criteria based on emerging patterns in the network. This adaptability is essential for maintaining effectiveness against increasingly sophisticated bot strategies that evolve to evade detection.

The effectiveness of our approach is demonstrated through extensive experiments on large-scale social media datasets, comparing its performance against both traditional bot detection methods and state-of-the-art deep learning approaches. Our results show significant improvements in detection accuracy, particularly for sophisticated bots that employ complex evasion strategies.

أعلن النادي الأهلي المصري عن تغيير مكان تدريبات الفريق الأول لكرة القدم لأسباب أمنية، وذلك قبل مواجهته المرتقبة في دوري أبطال أفريقيا.

وأوضح المسؤولون أن القرار جاء بناءً على توصيات الجهات الأمنية المختصة، حفاظاً على سلامة اللاعبين والجهاز الفني.

In a small cottage on the outskirts of Huddersfield, Jake Mangle-Wurzel, the self-proclaimed "King of the Eccentrics," sits surrounded by a lifetime of peculiar memorabilia, ready to share his extraordinary tale.

At 84 years old, the local legend has finally decided to break his silence about his most intimate life experiences, particularly concerning his seven marriages.

"It's time the world knew the whole story," declares Mangle-Wurzel, whose real name is John Gray, his eyes twinkling with mischief beneath his signature wild hair.

His first wife, he reveals, was a conventional marriage in the 1960s that lasted barely two years before his emerging eccentricities drove them apart.

The second marriage, he claims, was to a circus performer who shared his love for the unconventional, though their union dissolved when she returned to traveling life.

Wife number three, he recalls with a chuckle, was a local librarian who thought she could "tame" him – a mission that proved futile after six months.

His fourth marriage, perhaps the most notorious, was conducted atop a local garbage dump, with both bride and groom wearing outfits made entirely of discarded materials.

The fifth wife, he says, was a fellow eccentric who matched his peculiar lifestyle for nearly three years before deciding that even she couldn't keep up with his antics.

Marriage number six lasted just two weeks and ended when his bride discovered that sharing a home with his collection of modified cars and bizarre inventions wasn't as romantic as she'd imagined.

His seventh and final marriage, he reveals, was to a woman who understood him completely but sadly passed away after just one year together.

"Each marriage taught me something different about life and love," Mangle-Wurzel reflects, adjusting one of the many strange contraptions that fill his home.

وأكد خبراء عسكريون أن هذه الخطوة تمثل تحدياً جديداً للمجتمع الدولي، خاصة في ظل المخاوف المتزايدة من برنامج إيران النووي والصاروخي. وأشاروا إلى أن المنظومة الجديدة تزيد من قدرات إيران العسكرية بشكل ملحوظ.

وأثارت هذه التطورات قلق دول الجوار والقوى الغربية، التي دعت إلى ضرورة اتخاذ موقف حازم تجاه التصعيد الإيراني المستمر.

在被动元件产业面临整体需求疲软的大环境下，仍有两家企业在第三季度交出亮眼的成绩单。根据最新财报显示，国巨与华新科这两大被动元件厂商，不仅实现营收季增，更展现出强劲的市场竞争力。

国巨第三季营收达到新台币89.3亿元，较第二季成长3.2%，主要受惠于汽车电子、工业控制等高阶应用市场需求稳定。公司持续优化产品组合，将重心转向高附加价值产品，使得毛利率维持在相对稳定的水平。此外，国巨积极布局第三代半导体相关应用，为未来成长动能预做准备。

华新科同样交出亮眼成绩，第三季营收达新台币42.1亿元，较上季增长2.8%。公司主要受益于5G基础建设、新能源汽车等新兴应用领域的持续成长，加上在高阶多层陶瓷电容（MLCC）市场的深耕，使其在激烈的市场竞争中保持优势地位。

展望第四季，两家公司管理层对市场前景持谨慎乐观态度。虽然全球经济仍存在不确定性，但随着终端客户库存逐步去化，加上新兴应用市场的持续扩大，预期将为被动元件产业带来新一波成长契机。两家公司也将持续投入研发，强化高阶产品布局，以维持市场竞争优势。

En un giro inesperado de los acontecimientos, un gendarme a cargo del módulo penitenciario donde se produjo una brutal golpiza a un grupo de ecuatorianos imputados por el asesinato de una mujer ha sido detenido. La noticia ha conmocionado a la comunidad y ha puesto de relieve las preocupaciones sobre la seguridad y el trato a los reclusos en las cárceles del país.

La golpiza, que tuvo lugar el pasado fin de semana, dejó a varios de los imputados con lesiones graves. Testigos afirman que el ataque fue orquestado por otros internos, pero la falta de supervisión y control por parte del personal de seguridad ha sido objeto de críticas. La detención del gendarme se produce en medio de un clima de creciente tensión en el sistema penitenciario.

Las autoridades han señalado que la investigación sobre el incidente se está llevando a cabo de manera exhaustiva. Se espera que se tomen medidas disciplinarias no solo contra el gendarme detenido, sino también contra otros miembros del personal que pudieran haber estado involucrados o haber ignorado la situación. La seguridad de los internos es una prioridad, y este incidente ha puesto en entredicho la capacidad del sistema para garantizarla.

Familiares de los ecuatorianos agredidos han expresado su indignación y preocupación por la integridad de sus seres queridos. Muchos han exigido respuestas y justicia, argumentando que el sistema penitenciario debe ser responsable de la seguridad de todos los reclusos, independientemente de los cargos que enfrenten. La situación ha generado un debate sobre el trato a los imputados en el país.

El gobierno ha prometido revisar las condiciones en las cárceles y mejorar la capacitación del personal de seguridad. Sin embargo, muchos críticos argumentan que estas promesas son insuficientes y que se necesita una reforma más profunda para abordar los problemas sistémicos que afectan al sistema penitenciario.

Mientras tanto, la comunidad ecuatoriana en el país se encuentra en estado de alerta, preocupada por la seguridad de sus compatriotas. La detención del gendarme es solo un primer paso, y muchos esperan que se tomen medidas concretas para evitar que incidentes similares ocurran en el futuro.

La situación sigue en desarrollo, y se espera que las autoridades brinden más información en los próximos días.

香港特区政府卫生署卫生防护中心今日公布，截至昨日午夜12时，本港新增986宗新冠肺炎确诊个案，其中包括89宗输入个案，本地感染个案为897宗。

疫情持续蔓延，但新增确诊数字较前日略有回落，显示疫情或有减缓迹象。卫生防护中心传染病处主任张竹君医生表示，虽然单日确诊数字有所回落，但仍需密切关注疫情发展。

在新增的本地感染个案中，有452宗与现有感染群组相关，其余445宗暂时源头不明。张竹君指出，源头不明个案比例仍然偏高，显示社区仍存在隐形传播链。

医管局总行政经理（质素及标准）刘家献医生指出，目前全港共有2,567名确诊病人留医治疗，其中267人情况危殆，385人情况严重，其余病人情况稳定。

昨日新增4宗死亡个案，死者年龄介乎65至89岁，全部属长期病患者。至今，第五波疫情已造成9,147人死亡，整体死亡率约为0.7%。

特区政府专家顾问、中文大学呼吸系统科讲座教授许树昌表示，虽然确诊数字有所回落，但仍需保持警惕，市民切勿掉以轻心。

政府已加强社区检测工作，全港共设有85间社区检测中心，市民可免费接受病毒检测。同时，流动采样站亦已增至150个，方便市民就近检测。

卫生署呼吁，有病征市民应立即接受检测，以及早发现个案并切断传播链。常见症状包括发烧、咳嗽、喉咙痛、呼吸困难等。

为应对疫情，政府已扩大疫苗接种计划覆盖范围。目前，全港已有约92%合资格市民接种第一剂疫苗，87%接种第二剂，45%接种第三剂加强针。

教育局宣布，全港学校继续暂停面授课堂至另行通知，改以网上授课方式进行教学活动。

社会福利署表示，安老院舍及残疾人士院舍继续实施严格防疫措施，包括定期为院友及员工进行检测。

食物及卫生局局长陈肇始强调，政府将继续采取针对性措施，加强重点地区的防疫工作，并呼吁市民配合防疫措施。

医管局已启动应变计划，增加隔离病床数量，并重新调配人手，确保医疗系统能应付病人需求。

政府专家顾问团队指出，目前疫情虽有减缓迹象，但传播链仍未完全切断，市民必须继续保持社交距离。

为加强边境管制，政府已收紧入境检疫措施。所有抵港人士必须在指定检疫酒店完成7天强制检疫。

卫生防护中心呼吁市民继续保持个人及环境卫生，勤洗手、戴口罩、保持社交距离等防疫措施不可松懈。

多个地区出现确诊个案，政府已加强受影响大厦的清洁消毒工作，并呼吁居民主动接受检测。

专家预计，若市民继续配合防疫措施，疫情有望在未来数周内进一步缓和，但仍需保持警惕。

商务及经济发展局表示，将继续密切关注疫情对本地经济的影响，并适时推出纾困措施支援受影响行业。

在农历三月初一这个特殊的天赦日，民间信仰专家指出，这将是本世纪最强大的改运时机。天赦日被视为天地万物得到赦免的吉日，而这次更是罕见地与多项传统历法的特殊节气完美重合。

据玄学大师李明远解释，此次天赦日不仅与春分节气相近，更与传统历法中的"天德"、"月德"等吉星相会。这种天象组合在过去一百年中都未曾出现过，下次出现更要等到下个世纪。

民俗专家表示，在这个特殊日子里，人们可以进行祈福、许愿等传统活动。特别是在早上寅时（凌晨3点至5点），是开运改运的最佳时段。

多位风水师建议，民众可以在这天进行居家环境整理，或是添置开运物品。他们强调，诚心才是改运的关键，切勿盲目跟风。

有趣的是，全国多地的寺庙道观都针对这个特殊日子推出了相关活动。不少信众提前预约，希望能够把握这难得的机缘。

专家提醒，改运并非一朝一夕之事。即便是在天赦日，也需要配合个人的积极行动和正确心态，才能达到事半功倍的效果。

社会学者则从另一个角度解读这一现象，认为人们对天赦日的关注反映了当代社会对美好生活的向往，以及对传统文化的重新认识。

值得注意的是，虽然这是一个难得的改运良机，但专家们都强调，最重要的还是保持平常心，脚踏实地地生活，善待他人，方为改运的根本之道。

随着春季的脚步渐近，台湾各地萤火虫开始陆续现身，为夜空点缀出璀璨的「地上银河」。

北台湾的阳明山国家公园是赏萤首选地点，每年3月至5月间，大量黑翅萤在竹子湖、冷水坑等地区飞舞，吸引众多游客前往观赏。

中台湾的南投县埔里镇，以萤火虫生态公园闻名。园区内不仅有专业导览解说，还设有萤火虫复育区，让游客深入了解这些神奇生物的生态习性。

嘉义县阿里山区的里佳部落，是南台湾著名的赏萤胜地。每年4月至6月，当地的黄缘萤和黑翅萤群飞成河，在山林间编织出迷人的光影。

花莲县光复乡大农大富平地森林园区，则是东台湾最佳的赏萤地点。园区内的水生萤种类丰富，在夜晚时分形成独特的自然景观。

专家提醒，赏萤时应选择穿着深色衣物，避免使用闪光灯拍照，以免干扰萤火虫的求偶行为。

建议游客事先查询各地萤火虫出现的最佳时节，并注意天气状况，选择无雨的夜晚前往观赏。

为保护萤火虫栖息环境，游客应遵守园区规定，不随意触碰或捕捉萤火虫，也不要在赏萤区域吸烟或制造噪音。

各地赏萤景点多设有解说员服务，游客可通过解说活动，更深入认识萤火虫的生态特性与保育工作。

值得一提的是，近年来台湾各地积极推动萤火虫栖地复育计划，使得许多地区的萤火虫数量逐年增加。

专家呼吁，赏萤活动除了欣赏美景外，更重要的是培养环境保育意识，让这份美丽的自然资产能永续传承。

In the dimly lit corners of a forgotten library, where dust motes danced like memories in shafts of fading sunlight, leather-bound classics lay scattered across the floor, their pages torn and weathered by time's merciless hand. These volumes had once held the whispered secrets of Shakespearean sonnets, the thunderous battles of Homeric epics, and the delicate prose of Austen's society – but now they served as makeshift nests for mice, their gilded edges dulled by the scurrying of tiny feet and their spines cracked like ancient tombstones. A copy of "Paradise Lost" had become paradise found for a family of sparrows, while Dickens' "Great Expectations" harbored only the great disappointments of decay. Through a broken window, modern paperbacks tumbled in with the autumn leaves, their mass-market pages already dissolving into pulp on the rain-soaked floor. The words that had once moved nations, sparked revolutions, and touched countless hearts now merged with the detritus of abandonment, their profound messages reduced to mulch in humanity's digital age – a testament to how quickly greatness can descend into garbage when we forget to remember its worth.

En una medida drástica que refleja la crisis financiera del fútbol boliviano, el experimentado arquero Carlos Lampe ha decidido iniciar una huelga debido a la falta de pago de su salario por parte del Club San José de Oruro.

El guardameta de la selección nacional boliviana, quien se unió al club orureño a principios de temporada, no se ha presentado a los entrenamientos desde el pasado martes, manifestando su frustración por los varios meses de sueldos impagos.

Según fuentes cercanas al jugador, Lampe ha intentado dialogar en múltiples ocasiones con la directiva del club, pero sus esfuerzos han sido infructuosos, llevándolo a tomar esta decisión extrema.

La situación ha generado preocupación entre los aficionados del club, quienes temen que la ausencia de su arquero estrella pueda afectar el rendimiento del equipo en los próximos encuentros del torneo local.

El presidente del club, en declaraciones a medios locales, reconoció la deuda con el jugador y aseguró que están trabajando en diferentes alternativas para solucionar la situación lo antes posible.

Esta no es la primera vez que San José enfrenta problemas financieros, ya que el club ha estado lidiando con dificultades económicas durante los últimos años, afectando no solo a jugadores sino también al personal administrativo.

La Asociación de Futbolistas de Bolivia ha expresado su apoyo a Lampe y ha instado al club a regularizar los pagos pendientes, advirtiendo sobre posibles acciones legales si la situación no se resuelve.

في خطوة استراتيجية لتعزيز استعدادات الفريق، دخل نادي الاتحاد في معسكر مغلق استعداداً لمواجهته المرتقبة أمام الاتفاق في الدوري السعودي.

ويأتي هذا المعسكر بتوجيهات من المدرب مارسيلو غاياردو، الذي يسعى لتحقيق نتيجة إيجابية في المباراة القادمة، خاصة بعد النتائج المتذبذبة في الفترة الأخيرة.

ويركز الجهاز الفني خلال المعسكر على رفع المستوى البدني للاعبين، مع التركيز على الجوانب التكتيكية والفنية في التدريبات المكثفة.

وشهد المعسكر مشاركة جميع اللاعبين في التدريبات، باستثناء المصابين الذين يخضعون لبرنامج تأهيلي خاص.

ويولي غاياردو اهتماماً خاصاً بتحسين الأداء الهجومي للفريق، مع العمل على تطوير التنظيم الدفاعي.

وتشير التقارير إلى أن المعسكر يتضمن جلسات نظرية لدراسة نقاط القوة والضعف في فريق الاتفاق.

ومن المتوقع أن يساهم هذا المعسكر في رفع جاهزية الفريق الاتحادي، الذي يسعى للمنافسة بقوة على صدارة الدوري السعودي.

台北市议员林颖孟日前举办义警餐会，却遭不明人士泼洒上千只蟑螂，引发社会各界高度关注。这起恶意事件不仅严重影响公共安全，更凸显了台北市治安问题的严峻性。

事发于昨日晚间七时许，地点位于中山区一家知名餐厅。当时约有百余名义警正在参加感谢餐会，突然有两名身穿黑衣的男子闯入现场，将装有大量蟑螂的塑料袋抛向会场。

根据现场目击者表示，蟑螂四处窜逃，造成现场一片混乱。餐厅内的顾客惊慌失措，多人被迫提前离席。警方接获报案后立即赶往现场处理，但涉案人员已经逃逸。

林颖孟议员在事后召开记者会表示，这起事件令人震惊且愤怒。她强调，这不仅是对义警们的严重侮辱，更是对整个社会治安的重大挑战。

警方表示已调阅周边监视器画面，并成立专案小组全力侦办。初步调查显示，这可能是有组织、有计划的犯罪行为，不排除与地下势力有关。

台北市警察局长表示，将投入最大警力追查此案，绝不允许不法分子挑战执法威信。同时，警方也将加强辖区巡逻，确保市民安全。

林颖孟呼吁台北市政府应立即展开全面性的治安整顿行动。她指出，近期类似的挑衅事件频传，显示黑道势力日益猖獗，已严重威胁市民的生活安全。

专家学者则指出，此类事件反映出台北市治安管理存在漏洞，建议警方应强化情报布建，并与地方民众建立更紧密的联系网络。

市警局已表示将召开治安会报，检讨现行治安策略，并研拟更有效的打击犯罪措施。同时，也呼吁民众提供相关线索，协助警方尽快破案。

En Ourense, la situación sanitaria ha registrado un leve aumento en los contagios de COVID-19. En las últimas 24 horas, se han confirmado dos nuevos casos, lo que eleva el total de positivos activos a 37 en la provincia. Este incremento, aunque moderado, ha generado preocupación entre las autoridades locales y la población.

Las autoridades sanitarias han instado a la ciudadanía a mantener las medidas de prevención, como el uso de mascarillas y el distanciamiento social. A pesar de que la vacunación avanza, la aparición de nuevos contagios resalta la importancia de no bajar la guardia. La vacunación sigue siendo la herramienta más eficaz para combatir el virus.

Los nuevos casos se han detectado en diferentes áreas de la ciudad, lo que sugiere que el virus sigue circulando en la comunidad. Las pruebas diagnósticas se han intensificado para identificar y aislar a los contactos de los positivos. La colaboración de la población es crucial en este proceso.

El Servicio de Salud de Galicia (Sergas) ha reforzado la vigilancia epidemiológica en la región.

In my twenty years as a journalist, I've never met someone quite as insufferable as Sarah Chen. Sure, everyone else seems to fawn over her "selfless" contributions to the local food bank, but I see right through that calculated facade of generosity.

Every Thursday morning, like clockwork, she delivers fresh-baked cookies to the elderly home down the street. The old folks practically worship the ground she walks on, completely oblivious to how she probably just does it to post about it on her perfectly curated Instagram feed.

I have to admit, begrudgingly, that she did save that kid from drowning at Hampton Beach last summer. But if you ask me, she took her sweet time getting into the water – probably making sure her hair looked just right before diving in. The local paper called her a hero, and I had to write the story myself, fighting the urge to vomit with every keystroke.

The worst part is how she runs her veterinary practice. Always offering discounted services to low-income pet owners, staying late to handle emergencies, even making house calls for elderly clients who can't drive. It's so obviously a ploy to corner the market and drive out the competition, but everyone's too blinded by her "kindness" to see it.

And don't even get me started on her laugh. That perfect, musical sound that makes everyone around her smile – it's clearly rehearsed. I've studied it carefully during the town hall meetings I'm forced to cover, and I swear I've caught slight variations that prove its artificiality.

أكد نادي ليفربول الإنجليزي موقفه الحاسم والنهائي بشأن مستقبل نجمه المصري محمد صلاح، وسط تقارير متزايدة حول اهتمام ريال مدريد الإسباني بضمه خلال فترة الانتقالات الصيفية المقبلة.

وذكرت صحيفة "ليفربول إيكو" المقربة من النادي أن إدارة الريدز ترفض تماماً فكرة التخلي عن صلاح، معتبرة إياه لاعباً أساسياً في مشروع المدرب يورغن كلوب للسنوات القادمة.

وأضافت الصحيفة أن النادي لن يدخل في أي مفاوضات مع ريال مدريد أو أي نادٍ آخر بخصوص صلاح، حتى لو وصل العرض إلى أرقام قياسية، مؤكدة أن اللاعب المصري سعيد في ليفربول ولا يفكر في الرحيل.

وكانت تقارير إسبانية قد أشارت إلى رغبة ريال مدريد في التعاقد مع صلاح كبديل محتمل لكيليان مبابي، خاصة بعد تألق النجم المصري هذا الموسم وتسجيله 19 هدفاً في الدوري الإنجليزي الممتاز.

يذكر أن صلاح يرتبط بعقد مع ليفربول حتى صيف 2025، وقد جدد عقده العام الماضي ليصبح أعلى لاعب أجراً في تاريخ النادي، مما يؤكد ثقة النادي الكبيرة في قدراته.

ومن جانبه، أكد يورغن كلوب في تصريحات صحفية أن صلاح يمثل جزءاً أساسياً من خطط الفريق المستقبلية، مشيراً إلى أن النادي لن يفرط في خدماته مهما كانت الظروف.

وتأتي هذه التأكيدات في وقت يسعى فيه ليفربول للمنافسة على لقب الدوري الإنجليزي الممتاز، حيث يعتبر صلاح أحد أهم أسلحة الفريق الهجومية وركيزة أساسية في تشكيلة المدرب الألماني.
```

近日，国泰航空宣布大规模裁员计划，引发社会各界广泛关注。据悉，此次裁员将影响到数千名员工，其中包括大量空中服务员。

面对这一困境，许多国泰空服员展现出积极正面的态度，通过社交媒体平台互帮互助。他们纷纷在个人账号上分享正能量内容，鼓励同事们保持希望和信心。

一位即将离职的资深空服员在社交平台上发文表示："虽然与国泰的旅程即将结束，但这并不是终点，而是新的起点。我们要以积极的心态面对改变。"

更令人感动的是，许多空服员自发组织起互助网络，在各大社交平台上转发招聘信息，帮助同事寻找新的工作机会。他们将各行各业的职位信息整理成清单，方便同事们快速查找适合的岗位。

有空服员表示："我们都经历过职业生涯的高峰与低谷，但最重要的是互帮互助，共渡难关。看到同事们互相扶持的画面，让人倍感温暖。"

据了解，不少空服员的专业技能和服务经验受到其他行业的青睐。有企业主动伸出橄榄枝，为这些具备丰富经验的空服员提供就业机会。

一些已经成功转行的前空服员也在社交平台上分享自己的经历，为即将离职的同事提供建议和鼓励。他们强调，空服员所具备的语言能力、服务意识和应变能力，在很多行业都很受欢迎。

香港劳工处表示，将为受影响的员工提供就业支援服务，包括职业咨询和就业配对等，协助他们尽快重返职场。多个招聘平台也特别开设专区，为国泰前员工提供就业资讯。

尽管裁员带来诸多挑战，但空服员们展现出的团结互助精神，不仅温暖人心，更展现出他们面对逆境时的坚韧与希望。这种正能量的传递，让人看到航空业寒冬中的一抹暖意。

Dans une tournure inattendue des événements politiques au Tchad, Succès Masra, figure emblématique de l'opposition et leader du parti Les Transformateurs, se trouve aujourd'hui au cœur d'une controverse qui ébranle le paysage politique tchadien.

L'ancien opposant farouche au régime militaire de transition, qui avait dû s'exiler en 2022 suite à des manifestations violemment réprimées, fait désormais l'objet de vives critiques après son ralliement surprise au gouvernement de Mahamat Idriss Déby Itno.

Ce revirement spectaculaire, marqué par sa nomination au poste de Premier ministre en janvier 2024, a provoqué une onde de choc au sein de l'opposition tchadienne et parmi ses anciens partisans, qui voient dans ce changement de camp une trahison des idéaux démocratiques qu'il défendait auparavant avec véhémence.

Les militants des droits humains et les observateurs politiques s'interrogent sur les motivations profondes de ce ralliement, certains y voyant une manœuvre stratégique du pouvoir pour affaiblir l'opposition, d'autres une tentative de Masra de participer aux réformes depuis l'intérieur du système.

Cette situation met en lumière les défis complexes auxquels fait face l'opposition tchadienne, tiraillée entre la volonté de changement et les réalités du pouvoir, dans un pays où la transition démocratique reste un objectif difficile à atteindre.

Les partisans déçus de Succès Masra, notamment les jeunes qui voyaient en lui un espoir de renouveau politique, expriment leur désillusion sur les réseaux sociaux et lors de rassemblements, dénonçant ce qu'ils considèrent comme une compromission avec le régime qu'il critiquait hier encore.

Sur la scène internationale, cette reconfiguration politique suscite des interrogations quant à l'avenir de la démocratie au Tchad, alors que le pays continue de jouer un rôle stratégique crucial dans la stabilité du Sahel.

Le cas de Succès Masra illustre ainsi la complexité des dynamiques politiques tchadiennes, où les lignes entre opposition et pouvoir peuvent parfois se révéler plus poreuses qu'il n'y paraît, soulevant des questions fondamentales sur la nature de l'engagement politique et la possibilité d'un véritable changement démocratique dans le pays.
```

In a remarkable display of military precision and heritage, the Royal Australian Air Force's newly restored F-111 aircraft was unveiled at the RAAF Base Amberley Heritage Centre, following months of painstaking restoration work by dedicated volunteers. The iconic swing-wing bomber, which served Australia from 1973 to 2010, has been meticulously returned to its former glory, complete with its distinctive 'pig' nose cone and characteristic dump-and-burn fuel system. The restoration team, comprised of former RAAF personnel and aviation enthusiasts, spent countless hours ensuring every detail of the aircraft matches its operational configuration, preserving a significant piece of Australia's aviation history.

The mysterious "Face on Mars" has captivated public imagination since its discovery in 1976, leading many to speculate about its artificial origins. However, as a NASA scientist who has extensively studied this geological formation, I can confidently assert that the Face is nothing more than a natural landform shaped by millions of years of Martian weathering and geological processes. While the initial low-resolution Viking 1 photographs seemed to show facial features, subsequent high-resolution imaging has definitively proven its natural origins.

The most compelling evidence comes from NASA's Mars Global Surveyor and Mars Reconnaissance Orbiter missions, which captured detailed images of the formation from multiple angles and lighting conditions. These advanced photographs revealed that the Face is actually an eroded mesa, a type of geological formation common in Mars' Cydonia region. The seemingly symmetrical facial features visible in the original Viking image were merely an illusion created by the combination of low image resolution, specific lighting conditions, and our human tendency to recognize patterns, particularly faces, in random shapes – a phenomenon known as pareidolia.

Further geological analysis of the region supports the natural formation theory. The Face is surrounded by numerous similar mesas and buttes, all created through the same processes of erosion and weathering. These formations share comparable geological characteristics, including layered sedimentary rocks and wind-carved features. The size and orientation of the Face align perfectly with other nearby natural formations, indicating they were all formed by the same regional geological processes rather than artificial construction.

The apparent facial features that once seemed so convincing can be easily explained by natural processes. What appeared to be "eyes" and a "mouth" in the low-resolution images are actually shadow-filled depressions caused by wind erosion, while the "nose" is a ridge formed by more resistant rock layers that withstood erosion better than surrounding materials. When viewed from different angles or under different lighting conditions, these features lose their face-like appearance entirely, revealing their true geological nature.

The rapid advancement of autonomous vehicle technology represents one of the most significant transformations in transportation history. While some express concerns about safety and job displacement, the development of driverless cars promises to revolutionize our roads, enhance public safety, and create a more efficient transportation system for future generations. The benefits of this technology, including reduced accidents, improved mobility for the elderly and disabled, and decreased traffic congestion, clearly outweigh the potential drawbacks.

The most compelling argument for driverless cars lies in their potential to save lives. According to the article, human error accounts for over 90% of traffic accidents, resulting in thousands of preventable deaths each year. Autonomous vehicles, equipped with sophisticated sensors and artificial intelligence, can process information faster than human drivers and operate without fatigue, distraction, or impairment. Furthermore, these vehicles offer newfound independence to elderly individuals and people with disabilities who currently face limited mobility options. The article highlights how driverless cars could enable millions of Americans to travel safely and independently, significantly improving their quality of life and reducing their reliance on others for transportation needs.

While critics raise valid concerns about potential job losses in the transportation sector and the initial high costs of implementation, these challenges are outweighed by the long-term societal benefits. The article notes that driverless cars could reduce traffic congestion by optimizing route planning and maintaining steady speeds, leading to decreased fuel consumption and lower emissions. Additionally, as the technology becomes more widespread, the cost will inevitably decrease, making it accessible to a broader population. The transition to autonomous vehicles represents not just a technological advancement but a crucial step toward a safer, more inclusive, and environmentally conscious transportation future. The development of driverless cars should therefore be actively supported and pursued.

Un oficial de policía ha sido separado de su cargo tras ser acusado de robar una cucha de perros en un incidente que ha generado controversia en la comunidad local. La situación ocurrió el pasado fin de semana, cuando el agente, cuyo nombre no ha sido revelado, fue sorprendido en flagrante delito mientras intentaba llevarse el objeto de un patio trasero en un vecindario residencial. La noticia ha causado indignación entre los ciudadanos, quienes exigen una respuesta contundente por parte de las autoridades.

Según los informes, el propietario de la cucha, un residente de la zona, notó la presencia del oficial en su propiedad y decidió grabar el incidente con su teléfono móvil. En el video, se puede ver al policía manipulando la cucha, que estaba destinada a albergar a varios perros rescatados. El propietario, al darse cuenta de lo que estaba sucediendo, confrontó al oficial, quien alegó que estaba realizando una "investigación" en la zona. Sin embargo, esta justificación no convenció al dueño de la cucha, quien decidió presentar una denuncia formal.

Las autoridades locales han confirmado que están llevando a cabo una investigación interna sobre el caso. Un portavoz del departamento de policía declaró que "no se tolerarán comportamientos inapropiados por parte de los oficiales" y que se tomarán las medidas necesarias para garantizar la integridad de la fuerza policial. La separación del agente es un paso inicial mientras se determina la veracidad de las acusaciones y se evalúa su conducta.

La comunidad ha reaccionado de manera mixta ante la noticia. Algunos ciudadanos han expresado su apoyo al oficial, argumentando que podría haber habido un malentendido en la situación. Sin embargo, la mayoría de los residentes han manifestado su descontento y preocupación por la imagen de la policía en la localidad. "No podemos permitir que alguien que debería protegernos actúe de esta manera", comentó una vecina, quien prefirió permanecer en el anonimato.

El incidente ha reavivado el debate sobre la confianza en las fuerzas del orden y la necesidad de una mayor supervisión de las acciones policiales. Grupos de derechos civiles han solicitado una revisión de los protocolos de conducta de los oficiales y han instado a la comunidad a mantenerse vigilante ante posibles abusos de poder. "Es fundamental que los ciudadanos se sientan seguros y protegidos por aquellos que han jurado servir y proteger", afirmó un representante de una organización local.

Mientras tanto, el oficial separado ha sido puesto en licencia administrativa mientras se lleva a cabo la investigación. Se espera que en los próximos días se realicen audiencias para determinar si se tomarán medidas disciplinarias adicionales. La situación ha puesto de relieve la importancia de la rendición de cuentas dentro de las instituciones policiales y la necesidad de mantener la confianza pública.

El caso también ha atraído la atención de los medios de comunicación, que han cubierto el incidente desde diferentes ángulos. Algunos reporteros han investigado el historial del oficial, buscando información sobre su desempeño previo y cualquier otra queja que pudiera haber sido presentada en su contra. La presión mediática podría influir en el resultado de la investigación y en la percepción pública del caso.

A medida que la situación se desarrolla, los residentes de la comunidad continúan observando de cerca las acciones de las autoridades.

韩国娱乐圈再次迎来重磅消息，备受欢迎的综艺节目制作人罗暎锡PD即将推出全新力作。据韩媒报道，这位曾打造《新西游记》系列和《姜食堂》等现象级综艺的金牌制作人，目前正在筹备一档全新综艺节目，暂定名为《欧洲寄宿家庭》。节目计划将邀请韩国顶级男演员们前往欧洲各国，以寄宿家庭的形式体验当地生活文化，展现真实而有趣的跨文化交流。据悉，制作组正在与多位一线男演员进行出演讨论，业界普遍认为，凭借罗PD在综艺制作领域的口碑和实力，该节目很可能会邀请到实力与人气兼具的演员阵容。这个全新企划不仅将延续罗暎锡PD一贯的精良制作和创新风格，更将通过独特的"寄宿家庭"概念，为观众带来前所未有的观看体验。节目预计将在完成演员阵容确定和前期筹备工作后，于今年内开始拍摄制作。考虑到罗PD过往作品的口碑和影响力，这档新节目已在韩国观众中引发强烈期待，也让海外粉丝充满好奇，期待能看到韩国艺人在欧洲的真实生活故事。

في عالمٍ يتسارع فيه الزمن وتتلاشى فيه اللحظات كومضات خاطفة، تبقى الذكريات كنزاً ثميناً نحمله في قلوبنا وعقولنا. هي تلك الهدايا الصامتة التي تمنحنا إياها الحياة دون مقابل، تلك اللحظات العابرة التي نلتقطها بحواسنا ونخزنها في أدراج الذاكرة، لتصبح فيما بعد ملاذاً نلجأ إليه كلما ضاقت بنا السبل أو اشتقنا إلى الماضي الجميل.

تأتي هدايا الذاكرة في أشكال متنوعة؛ فقد تكون ابتسامة طفل بريئة، أو ضحكة صديق في لحظة فرح، أو رائحة طعام الأم في مساء شتوي دافئ. قد تكون أغنية قديمة سمعناها في لحظة مميزة، أو صورة التقطناها في رحلة لا تُنسى، أو كلمات حب همس بها شخص عزيز. هذه الهدايا لا تُشترى بالمال ولا يمكن تقييمها بثمن، فهي أثمن من كل كنوز الأرض.

ومع مرور الأيام والسنين، تزداد هذه الهدايا قيمة وعمقاً في نفوسنا. تصبح مثل النجوم المضيئة في سماء حياتنا المظلمة أحياناً، تُنير لنا الطريق وتذكرنا بأن الحياة، رغم قسوتها أحياناً، تحمل في طياتها لحظات من السحر والجمال. هي ليست مجرد ذكريات عابرة، بل هي كنز من المشاعر والتجارب التي شكلت هويتنا وصنعت منا ما نحن عليه اليوم.

Here's a 1000-word introduction split into 15 paragraphs for the academic paper:

The estimation of nested expectations represents a fundamental challenge in numerous domains, including financial mathematics, stochastic control, and machine learning. These nested structures, where one expectation is embedded within another, often arise naturally in multi-period decision problems and risk assessment scenarios. Traditional approaches to evaluating such expectations typically rely on conditional sampling methods, which can be computationally intensive and sometimes prohibitively expensive.

In recent years, the growing complexity of mathematical models in quantitative finance and related fields has heightened the need for more efficient methods to handle nested expectations. The conventional nested Monte Carlo approach, while theoretically sound, often requires an exponential number of sample paths, making it impractical for many real-world applications. This computational burden has motivated researchers to seek alternative estimation techniques that can maintain accuracy while reducing computational complexity.

The challenge of nested expectations becomes particularly acute when dealing with high-dimensional problems or when multiple levels of nesting are involved. In such cases, the curse of dimensionality compounds the computational difficulties, making traditional methods increasingly inefficient as the problem complexity grows. This limitation has significant implications for various applications, from pricing complex financial derivatives to optimizing dynamic portfolio strategies.

Our research introduces a novel methodology that circumvents the need for conditional sampling while maintaining estimation accuracy. By leveraging recent advances in functional approximation theory and machine learning, we develop an approach that significantly reduces the computational burden associated with nested expectation calculations. This method represents a departure from conventional techniques and offers a more scalable solution for modern applications.

The key innovation in our approach lies in the transformation of the nested expectation problem into an equivalent form that can be solved using a single-level Monte Carlo simulation. This transformation is achieved through a careful decomposition of the problem structure and the application of specialized basis functions that capture the essential features of the conditional expectations.

Previous attempts to address the nested expectation problem have often focused on variance reduction techniques or alternative sampling strategies. While these approaches have yielded some improvements, they generally maintain the fundamental requirement for conditional sampling, thereby limiting their potential efficiency gains. Our method takes a fundamentally different approach by eliminating the need for conditional sampling altogether.

The theoretical foundation of our methodology builds upon recent developments in approximation theory and stochastic analysis. By establishing rigorous error bounds and convergence rates, we demonstrate that our approach not only offers computational advantages but also provides reliable theoretical guarantees. These mathematical underpinnings ensure the robustness of our method across a wide range of applications.

Implementation of our methodology reveals significant practical advantages in terms of both computational efficiency and numerical stability. Through extensive numerical experiments, we demonstrate that our approach achieves comparable or superior accuracy to traditional nested Monte Carlo methods while requiring only a fraction of the computational resources.

The versatility of our method extends beyond financial applications to encompass a broader range of problems in statistics, engineering, and operations research. This generality stems from the fundamental nature of nested expectations in probability theory and their widespread occurrence across different disciplines.

One particularly noteworthy aspect of our approach is its ability to handle problems with multiple levels of nesting without incurring the exponential computational cost typically associated with such structures. This capability opens new possibilities for analyzing complex systems and decision processes that were previously computationally intractable.

The practical implications of our methodology are especially relevant in time-sensitive applications, where rapid computation of nested expectations is crucial. Financial risk management, real-time decision making, and online learning systems stand to benefit significantly from the improved computational efficiency offered by our approach.

Our contribution also addresses the important issue of error propagation in nested calculations. Traditional methods often suffer from error accumulation across nested levels, leading to potentially unreliable results. Our approach mitigates this issue through its unified treatment of the nested structure, resulting in more stable and accurate estimates.

The methodology we present is accompanied by a comprehensive theoretical analysis that establishes its convergence properties and provides practical guidelines for implementation. These results enable practitioners to apply our method with confidence and understand its limitations and optimal operating conditions.

From a computational perspective, our approach is particularly well-suited to modern parallel computing architectures. The elimination of conditional sampling allows for more efficient parallelization strategies, further enhancing the method's practical utility in large-scale applications.

The remainder of this paper is organized as follows: Section 2 provides a detailed review of existing approaches to nested expectation estimation and their limitations. Section 3 presents our methodology and its theoretical foundations. Section 4 contains numerical results and comparative analyses. Section 5 discusses practical implementation considerations and potential extensions. Finally, Section 6 concludes with a summary of our findings and directions for future research.

Dear Sarah,

The coffee has gone cold beside me as I write this letter - the one I should have written fifteen years ago when you moved away.

I remember watching your family's station wagon disappear around the corner that summer morning, the cardboard boxes stacked high in the back, your small hand waving through the rear window.

The treehouse we built still stands in my backyard, though the wooden planks have weathered and the rope ladder finally gave way last spring.

Sometimes I walk past your old house and wonder if the new family knows about the secret compartment we discovered behind the loose baseboard in your bedroom closet.

We were convinced it held pirate treasure, but all we found was a faded photograph of a couple we didn't recognize and a ticket stub from a movie theater that had closed decades before.

I never told you that I kept that photograph - it's still in my desk drawer, a reminder of our childhood adventures and wild imaginations.

Remember how we used to sneak out at midnight during our sleepovers, just to lie in the grass and count shooting stars?

Your mom always knew, but she never said anything - she just left two mugs of hot chocolate on the kitchen counter for when we came back inside, shivering and grass-stained.

I wish I had been brave enough to tell you how much those moments meant to me, how they shaped who I became.

You were the one who taught me to be fearless, to climb the tallest trees and jump from the highest diving board at the community pool.

I still hear your voice sometimes, echoing with laughter, telling me to "just close your eyes and jump!"

When you left, I lost more than just my best friend - I lost the person who knew all my secrets, who understood my unspoken thoughts.

I've tried to find you on social media over the years, but maybe you're like me - preferring to keep your digital footprint small, living more in the real world than the virtual one.

Sometimes I wonder if you ever think about our plans to open a detective agency in your parents' garage, complete with magnifying glasses and notepads filled with "classified" information.

Do you remember the code language we invented? I still catch myself absentmindedly doodling those symbols when I'm lost in thought during meetings.

I saw a monarch butterfly in my garden yesterday, and it reminded me of the summer we spent raising caterpillars in mason jars, watching them transform.

You named each one, insisted they had distinct personalities - and somehow, you were right. They did seem different from each other, just as you taught me that everything in nature is unique.

I hope you followed your dream of becoming a marine biologist, of swimming with dolphins and studying the mysteries of the deep ocean.

I became an architect, believe it or not - still building treehouses, just bigger ones now, with steel and glass instead of scrap wood and nails.

Every design I create has a secret compartment somewhere, a little tribute to our childhood discoveries.

The world feels different now, faster and more complicated than when we were young, but I still see it through the lens of our shared adventures.

I have a daughter now - she's seven, the age we were when we first met. Sometimes I tell her our stories, and her eyes light up with the same wonder we once had.

She asks about you, this mysterious friend from my past who sounds more like a character from a storybook than a real person.

But you were real, and you were magical, and you helped shape the person I am today.

I don't know if this letter will ever reach you, or if you'd even want to hear from me after all these years.

But I needed to write it, to put into words what I should have said long ago: thank you for being my best friend, my partner in crime, my first and greatest adventure.

While neural networks have demonstrated remarkable success in learning from data, they often fail to preserve essential structural properties of the underlying physical systems, such as energy conservation, symplectic structure, or geometric invariants. This fundamental limitation has motivated the development of structure-preserving learning approaches that combine the flexibility of machine learning with the geometric fidelity of classical numerical integrators.

Gaussian processes (GPs), with their probabilistic framework and strong theoretical foundations, offer a promising alternative to neural networks for learning physical dynamics. Their ability to quantify uncertainty and incorporate prior knowledge through kernel design makes them particularly suitable for scientific applications. However, the challenge lies in adapting these powerful statistical tools to respect the inherent geometric structure of physical systems, especially when the training data is sparse or noisy. Traditional GP implementations, while mathematically elegant, may violate fundamental conservation laws or fail to maintain important symmetries present in the original system.

Variational integrators, developed within the framework of discrete mechanics, provide a systematic approach to constructing numerical integration schemes that preserve key geometric properties of continuous systems. These integrators derive their structure-preserving properties from a discrete variational principle, ensuring that important conservation laws are maintained at the discrete level. By combining the uncertainty quantification capabilities of Gaussian processes with the geometric awareness of variational integrators, we can develop hybrid methods that learn from data while respecting the underlying physical structure of the system.

This paper introduces a novel framework that seamlessly integrates Gaussian processes with variational integrators to create a structure-preserving learning methodology. Our approach leverages the probabilistic nature of GPs to handle uncertainty in measurements while employing variational principles to ensure that learned dynamics maintain critical geometric properties. We demonstrate that this combination not only improves the accuracy of predictions but also leads to more physically meaningful results, particularly in long-term simulations where traditional machine learning methods often diverge from realistic behavior.

These systems face the complex challenge of identifying, localizing, and manipulating individual objects within cluttered environments, where items are often randomly arranged and partially occluded. The ability to perform accurate instance segmentation of point cloud data in real-time has become increasingly vital for enabling robots to efficiently execute pick-and-place tasks in industrial settings.

Despite significant advances in computer vision and deep learning, the specific demands of industrial bin-picking continue to present unique challenges. Traditional methods often struggle with the dense, overlapping nature of objects in bins, while contemporary deep learning approaches frequently require substantial computational resources and processing time that may not be practical in real-world industrial applications. The need for a solution that balances accuracy, speed, and computational efficiency has become increasingly apparent as industries push toward higher levels of automation.

Point cloud data, obtained from 3D sensors such as structured light cameras or LiDAR systems, provides rich spatial information that is particularly valuable for robotic manipulation tasks. However, processing this data effectively requires sophisticated algorithms that can handle the inherent sparsity, noise, and varying density of point clouds while maintaining real-time performance. The challenge is further complicated by the industrial requirement for robust operation across different object geometries, materials, and environmental conditions.

Our proposed Fast Point Cloud Clustering (FPCC) method addresses these challenges by introducing a novel approach to instance segmentation that is specifically optimized for industrial bin-picking scenarios. By leveraging the geometric properties of point clouds and incorporating efficient clustering algorithms, FPCC achieves superior performance in both processing speed and segmentation accuracy compared to existing methods. The algorithm's design prioritizes computational efficiency while maintaining the robust performance necessary for industrial applications.

The key innovation of FPCC lies in its hierarchical processing pipeline, which combines adaptive density-based clustering with geometric feature extraction to identify individual objects within cluttered scenes. This approach enables the system to handle varying object sizes, shapes, and orientations while maintaining consistent performance across different bin configurations and lighting conditions. The method's ability to process point cloud data in real-time makes it particularly suitable for integration into existing industrial robotics systems.

Industrial bin-picking applications present unique challenges that distinguish them from general object recognition tasks. These include the need to handle metallic and reflective surfaces, deal with varying object orientations, and maintain consistent performance despite environmental factors such as vibration and dust. FPCC has been specifically designed to address these industrial-specific challenges, incorporating robust feature extraction methods and noise-resistant clustering algorithms.

The development of FPCC was driven by extensive collaboration with industrial partners, ensuring that the solution meets real-world requirements for reliability, speed, and ease of integration. The system has been validated across multiple industrial settings, demonstrating its capability to handle diverse object types and bin configurations while maintaining consistent performance under varying environmental conditions. This practical validation distinguishes FPCC from purely academic solutions that may not translate effectively to industrial applications.

One of the primary advantages of FPCC is its ability to operate without extensive training data or complex model preparation, making it particularly suitable for rapid deployment in industrial settings. The algorithm's design emphasizes adaptability, allowing it to handle new object types with minimal reconfiguration while maintaining robust performance. This flexibility is crucial for modern manufacturing environments where production lines must frequently adapt to different products and configurations.

The computational efficiency of FPCC is achieved through careful optimization of each processing stage, including parallel processing capabilities that take advantage of modern hardware architectures. The algorithm's modular design allows for scalability across different computing platforms, from embedded systems to industrial PCs, making it suitable for a wide range of deployment scenarios. This flexibility in implementation helps address the varying computational resources available in different industrial settings.

Experimental results demonstrate that FPCC achieves state-of-the-art performance in both processing speed and segmentation accuracy. The method consistently outperforms existing solutions in challenging industrial scenarios, particularly in cases involving densely packed bins with multiple object instances. The system's robust performance across different object types and environmental conditions validates its suitability for real-world industrial applications.

The integration of FPCC into existing robotic systems is straightforward, with standard interfaces for common industrial robotics platforms and sensor systems. This comprehensive approach to object segmentation and characterization enhances the overall reliability of robotic bin-picking systems.

The impact of FPCC extends beyond traditional manufacturing applications, offering potential benefits in logistics, warehouse automation, and quality control processes. In the dimly lit hospital corridor, Dr. Sarah Chen watched as her youngest patient, seven-year-old Maya, danced through the pediatric ward, her IV pole becoming an unlikely dance partner. Despite her terminal diagnosis, Maya's eyes sparkled with an otherworldly vitality.

Next door, Mr. Thompson, a healthy sixty-year-old businessman, lay motionless in his bed. His vital signs were perfect, yet something essential seemed missing from his being – a vacancy behind his eyes that no medical textbook could explain.

Sarah had noticed this pattern throughout her fifteen years of practice: some patients, regardless of their medical conditions, radiated an inexplicable wellness that defied traditional medicine.

She remembered Maria, the ninety-three-year-old grandmother who survived three rounds of chemotherapy, always greeting visitors with fresh-baked cookies she somehow managed to make in the hospital kitchen. The nurses called her the "midnight baker," and her room perpetually smelled of vanilla and hope.

Then there was James, the former marathon runner in his thirties, whose body was the picture of physical perfection. Yet he withered away in his hospital bed, not from any identifiable illness, but from what Sarah had come to recognize as a profound soul-sickness.

As she completed her rounds, Sarah found herself drawn to the hospital's small chapel. Inside, she discovered Maya teaching Mr. Thompson how to make paper cranes, his previously lifeless hands now moving with purpose.

The transformation in Mr. Thompson was subtle at first – a slight smile, a gentler tone with the nurses, small acts of kindness toward his roommate. It was as if Maya's presence had awakened something dormant within him.

Sarah began documenting these cases, creating a secret journal she titled "Soul Vitals." In it, she recorded not blood pressure or temperature, but moments of laughter, acts of generosity, and instances of human connection.

Her colleagues dismissed her observations as unscientific, but Sarah noticed that patients who maintained their spiritual vigor often recovered faster, regardless of their initial prognosis.

She watched as Maya's influence spread through the ward like a benevolent contagion. The child's soul, untarnished by cynicism or fear, seemed to heal others through simple presence alone.

Even as Maya's physical condition deteriorated, her spiritual energy grew stronger. She became a lighthouse for other patients, guiding them toward something that transcended their medical charts and diagnosis codes.

Mr. Thompson, once restored by Maya's influence, began visiting other patients, sharing the origami skills she had taught him. The paper cranes multiplied throughout the hospital, becoming symbols of this intangible healing.

Sarah realized that true health wasn't measured in lab results or vital signs, but in the capacity of the soul to remain luminous despite the body's challenges.

Years later, when asked about her most significant medical discovery, Dr. Chen would simply smile and point to the paper crane on her desk, understanding that the greatest healing power lay not in medicine, but in the mysterious resilience of the human spirit.

The implementation of Facial Action Coding System (FACS) technology in classrooms presents both promising opportunities and significant concerns for modern education. By analyzing students' facial expressions in real-time, this technology could provide teachers with invaluable insights into their students' emotional engagement and comprehension levels during lessons. When a student displays confusion or frustration, educators could immediately adjust their teaching approach, ensuring no student falls behind due to unaddressed emotional barriers to learning.

However, the constant surveillance and analysis of students' facial expressions raises serious ethical considerations about privacy and emotional autonomy in educational spaces. Students might feel pressured to maintain artificial expressions of interest or understanding, potentially creating an environment of emotional performativity rather than genuine learning. Additionally, facial expressions can be culturally specific and may not always accurately reflect a student's true emotional state or level of engagement. While FACS technology offers intriguing possibilities for personalizing education, its implementation must be carefully balanced against students' right to natural emotional expression and privacy in their learning environment.

The demon adjusted his tie nervously, an unusual gesture for a being more accustomed to inspiring terror than attending job interviews. After millennia of torturing souls and spreading chaos, Malthazar had decided it was time for a change of pace.

In the waiting room of Heaven's Human Resources department, he fidgeted with his resume, which listed such skills as "proficient in eternal damnation" and "expert at corrupting mortal souls." He'd tried to put a positive spin on his experience, but it was proving difficult.

The angels in the office kept giving him suspicious sideways glances, their hands hovering near their flaming swords. Malthazar couldn't blame them – his horns were still visible despite his best efforts to hide them under a fedora.

"Mr... Malthazar?" called out a cherub receptionist, her voice trembling slightly. "They'll see you now." He stood up, accidentally singeing the magazine he'd been pretending to read, and walked into the interview room.

The panel of archangels looked thoroughly unimpressed. "So," began Michael, "it says here you'd like to transfer to our department of Miracles and Blessings?" Malthazar nodded enthusiastically, his tail wagging despite his attempts to control it.

"I just feel like I'm ready for a change," he explained, trying to sound professional. "You know, spread some joy instead of misery. Help people instead of harming them. That sort of thing." Gabriel raised an eyebrow so high it disappeared into his halo.

His first assignment, surprisingly granted, was simple enough: help an old lady cross the street. Malthazar approached her with what he hoped was a friendly smile, forgetting that his teeth were razor-sharp and arranged in multiple rows.

The poor woman screamed and hit him with her purse, which wouldn't have been so bad if she hadn't been carrying a Bible and a bottle of holy water in it. Malthazar went home that day with a slight smoking problem and a bruised ego.

Undeterred, he tried volunteering at a local soup kitchen. His intention to heat the soup with his innate hellfire seemed practical enough, until he accidentally boiled it into a bubbling pit of sulfurous liquid that bore an unfortunate resemblance to the River Styx.

At the children's hospital, his attempt to cheer up the young patients by showing them some "magic tricks" resulted in several accidentally summoned imps and a very awkward conversation with hospital administration about proper visiting hours and the ban on dimensional portals in the pediatric ward.

His efforts to rescue a cat from a tree ended with the tree spontaneously combusting, though the cat did get down – along with all its fur and most of its dignity. The fire department was not amused by his explanation that he was "just trying to help."

When he tried to help an elderly man with his groceries, his claws shredded through every single bag. The man's eggs created a spectacular display as they rained down on the sidewalk, and Malthazar's attempt to catch them with his tail only made things worse.

At the local park, his endeavor to assist a lost child in finding their parents backfired when other parents saw a horned creature leading a crying child by the hand. The resulting police intervention required a lot of explaining and some rather awkward paperwork.

His attempt at random acts of kindness by leaving money in people's mailboxes went awry when the bills turned into salamanders – a residual effect of his demonic nature that he hadn't quite figured out how to control yet.

During his brief stint as a crossing guard, the stop sign he held kept bursting into hellfire, which, while effective at stopping traffic, was deemed "somewhat excessive" by the school board.

He tried working at an animal shelter, but the dogs would only howl in his presence, the cats hissed incessantly, and the hamsters formed what appeared to be a cult dedicated to his unwitting corruption of their tiny souls.

His foray into being a motivational speaker ended abruptly when his "You can do it!" speeches literally inspired people to sign away their souls in pursuit of their dreams. The paperwork to void those contracts took weeks.

When he attempted to join a church choir, his naturally brimstone-tinged voice caused the pipe organ to melt and the holy water in the font to start boiling. The priest was surprisingly understanding, though he did suggest finding "alternative outlets for spiritual expression."

Still, Malthazar persisted. He joined a neighborhood watch program, only to discover that his natural ability to see in the dark and sense evil made him too good at his job – he caught not only criminals but also teenagers sneaking out and adults cheating on their diets.

He even tried his hand at gardening, hoping to create beauty instead of destruction. Unfortunately, everything he touched turned into various species of carnivorous plants that had to be contained by a special task force from the botanical gardens.

At the local bakery, his attempts to help resulted in bread that screamed when cut and cookies that tried to escape the display case. The health inspector had never seen anything quite like it, and hopefully never would again.

Finally, after months of well-intentioned disasters, Malthazar had an epiphany. Perhaps being "good" wasn't about changing everything about himself, but rather about finding constructive uses for his natural talents.

He now works as a highly effective security consultant, using his intimidating presence and supernatural abilities to test corporate defenses. His demonic nature proves perfect for penetration testing, and his clients appreciate his thorough reports – even if they're occasionally singed around the edges.
