The Gough-Stewart Platform (GSP), a prominent parallel manipulator architecture, has been extensively utilized across diverse applications, from flight simulators to precision manufacturing. Despite its widespread adoption, the platform's inherent complexity in forward kinematics calculation remains a significant challenge, particularly when real-time performance is crucial. Traditional analytical and numerical methods often struggle to achieve the optimal balance between computational efficiency and accuracy, leading researchers to explore alternative approaches that can address these limitations.

In recent years, machine learning techniques have emerged as promising solutions for solving complex robotics problems, offering new perspectives on handling non-linear relationships and high-dimensional data. However, conventional neural network architectures frequently fall short in capturing the intricate geometric relationships and spatial constraints inherent in parallel manipulators. This limitation has sparked interest in more specialized neural network structures that can better represent the underlying physical characteristics of robotic systems.

Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) have demonstrated remarkable capabilities in processing structured data and modeling complex relationships between interconnected entities. Their ability to learn from graph-based representations makes them particularly suitable for robotics applications, where the physical connections and spatial relationships between components play a crucial role in determining system behavior. Nevertheless, the application of GNNs to parallel manipulator kinematics, specifically the GSP's forward kinematics problem, remains largely unexplored.

The fundamental challenge in applying machine learning to forward kinematics lies in effectively representing the spatial relationships and geometric constraints that govern the platform's motion. Traditional neural network approaches often treat input parameters as independent variables, failing to leverage the inherent structure of the mechanical system. This oversight results in models that require extensive training data and may struggle to generalize across different operating conditions.

To address these limitations, we propose DisGNet, a novel distance-aware Graph Neural Network architecture specifically designed for learning the forward kinematics of the Gough-Stewart Platform. Our approach introduces a unique graph representation that explicitly incorporates distance relationships between platform components, enabling the network to better understand and predict the complex spatial transformations that occur during platform movement.

DisGNet's architecture leverages the geometric properties of the GSP by representing the platform as a graph where nodes correspond to key structural points, and edges represent both physical connections and spatial relationships. The innovation lies in our distance-aware message passing mechanism, which allows the network to process and update node features based on both topological and geometric information, leading to more accurate and physically consistent predictions.

The proposed network architecture incorporates several key innovations that distinguish it from existing approaches. First, we introduce distance-weighted edge features that capture the dynamic spatial relationships between platform components. Second, we implement a hierarchical graph structure that reflects the natural organization of the GSP's mechanical elements. Finally, we develop a custom loss function that explicitly accounts for both position and orientation errors in the platform's end-effector pose estimation.

Our experimental results demonstrate that DisGNet achieves superior performance compared to traditional numerical methods and conventional neural network approaches. The network exhibits remarkable accuracy in predicting the platform's pose across a wide range of configurations, while maintaining computational efficiency suitable for real-time applications. Furthermore, the model shows excellent generalization capabilities, performing reliably even in previously unseen platform configurations.

The implications of this research extend beyond the specific application to the Gough-Stewart Platform. The principles underlying DisGNet's architecture could be adapted to other parallel manipulator configurations and, more broadly, to any robotic system where geometric relationships play a crucial role in kinematics calculations. This versatility suggests potential applications in areas such as robot control, motion planning, and automated manufacturing.

The dragon on my shoulder coils around my bicep, its intricate scales and fierce expression a constant source of unwanted attention. I've lost count of how many times I've had to disappoint eager mystics and self-proclaimed prophets.

Just yesterday, an elderly woman at the grocery store grabbed my arm without warning, her eyes wide with wonder. I knew exactly what was coming.

"You must be the chosen one," she whispered, her voice trembling with reverence. I sighed and continued placing my cereal in the shopping cart.

My mother thinks it's hilarious. She loves telling the story of how the nurse who assisted in my delivery nearly fainted, convinced she had witnessed the birth of some legendary figure.

The truth is far less exciting: it's just a birthmark, a random collection of melanin that happened to form a dragon-like shape. No different from someone having a birthmark that looks like Mickey Mouse or Abraham Lincoln.

But try explaining that to the meditation group that tracked me down on social media, convinced I was destined to lead them to spiritual enlightenment. Or to the fantasy author who begged to write a book series based on my "sacred marking."

My dermatologist is the only person who sees it for what it is – a completely normal, if unusually shaped, congenital melanocytic nevus. She's become my refuge of rationality in a world determined to see magic where there is none.

I've considered having it removed, but that feels like letting the crazy win. Besides, it's part of me, even if it's not the mystical destiny-defining part that others want it to be.

Sometimes I wonder if I should just lean into it. Start wearing robes, speaking in riddles, and charging people for "dragon wisdom." But that would probably just make things worse.

My girlfriend says I should write a book: "The Completely Ordinary Person with the Unfortunately Magical-Looking Birthmark." Maybe I will.

For now, I'll continue explaining to wide-eyed strangers that no, I cannot commune with dragons, and yes, I'm absolutely certain about that.

The implementation of the Facial Action Coding System (FACS) in educational settings presents both promising opportunities and significant concerns regarding student privacy and authentic learning experiences. While this technology offers unprecedented insights into student engagement and emotional states during lessons, its deployment in classrooms requires careful consideration of the potential benefits and drawbacks that could fundamentally reshape the educational landscape.

The ability to automatically detect and analyze students' emotional expressions through FACS could provide teachers with valuable real-time feedback about their instructional effectiveness. When a lesson fails to resonate with students, their facial expressions might reveal confusion, boredom, or disengagement, allowing educators to adjust their teaching methods immediately. This technological advancement could be particularly beneficial in large classroom settings where individual student monitoring is challenging, or in remote learning environments where traditional visual cues might be harder to discern. Moreover, the systematic collection of emotional response data could help identify patterns in student engagement across different subjects, teaching styles, and times of day, potentially leading to more informed decisions about curriculum design and instructional strategies.

However, the integration of facial recognition technology in classrooms raises serious ethical considerations that cannot be ignored. Students might feel uncomfortable knowing their facial expressions are being constantly monitored and analyzed, potentially leading to self-conscious behavior that inhibits natural learning processes. There is also the risk of students deliberately modifying their expressions to appear more engaged, defeating the purpose of the technology while creating an artificial learning environment. Furthermore, emotional expressions are deeply personal and culturally influenced, making standardized interpretation potentially problematic and even discriminatory. The technology might misinterpret cultural differences in emotional expression or fail to account for neurodivergent students who express emotions differently. While FACS presents innovative possibilities for understanding student engagement, its implementation must be carefully balanced against these significant concerns about student privacy, authenticity, and the fundamental nature of the learning environment.

The mysterious "Face on Mars" has captivated public imagination since its discovery in 1976, leading many to speculate about its artificial origins. However, as a NASA scientist who has extensively studied this formation, I can confidently assert that this structure is entirely natural, formed through geological processes common to the Martian landscape. The initial low-resolution image from the Viking 1 orbiter, which sparked these alien theories, was simply a case of pareidolia - our human tendency to see familiar patterns, especially faces, in random formations.

Subsequent high-resolution images from modern Mars missions have definitively proven the natural origin of this formation. The Mars Global Surveyor's 1998 photographs, taken with significantly advanced technology, revealed what we actually see: an eroded mesa, similar to many others in the Cydonia region. These detailed images show asymmetrical features, irregular edges, and natural erosion patterns that are inconsistent with artificial construction. Furthermore, the "face" completely disappears when viewed from different angles or under different lighting conditions, demonstrating how the original image was merely a trick of light and shadow on a natural geological formation.

The scientific evidence is overwhelming. The formation's size, composition, and context within the surrounding landscape all align perfectly with natural geological processes. Similar mesa formations are abundant on Mars, created through millions of years of wind erosion, seasonal temperature changes, and other natural weathering processes. While the idea of an alien-made monument is certainly intriguing, we must follow the evidence where it leads. In this case, it leads to a fascinating, but entirely natural, feature of the Martian landscape that reminds us how easily our pattern-seeking minds can be deceived.

Jonathan a également partagé ses connaissances sur l'histoire de cet accessoire emblématique, expliquant les différentes techniques de fabrication et l'évolution des styles à travers les époques. Dans un contexte où la transition énergétique devient une priorité mondiale, la consommation d'énergie de nos appareils électroménagers suscite de plus en plus d'attention. Une étude récente révèle les appareils les plus gourmands en électricité dans nos foyers.

Sans surprise, le réfrigérateur-congélateur occupe la première place du podium. Fonctionnant 24 heures sur 24, cet appareil indispensable peut représenter jusqu'à 25% de la facture d'électricité d'un ménage moyen.

Le lave-linge et le sèche-linge arrivent en deuxième position. Bien que leur utilisation soit ponctuelle, ces appareils consomment une quantité importante d'énergie, particulièrement lors des cycles à haute température.

Le lave-vaisselle, malgré ses progrès en matière d'efficacité énergétique, reste un consommateur important. Les modèles récents proposent heureusement des programmes éco permettant de réduire significativement la consommation.

Les plaques de cuisson et le four, qu'ils soient électriques ou à induction, représentent également une part considérable de notre consommation énergétique domestique. Leur utilisation quotidienne en fait des appareils particulièrement énergivores.

Les climatiseurs et les radiateurs électriques sont parmi les plus gros consommateurs d'énergie, leur utilisation intensive pendant les périodes de chaleur ou de froid extrêmes peut faire grimper considérablement la facture.

Les experts recommandent de privilégier des appareils de classe énergétique A+++ lors du renouvellement de l'électroménager. Cette classification garantit une consommation optimisée et des économies substantielles à long terme.

Des gestes simples comme dégivrer régulièrement son congélateur ou utiliser les programmes éco peuvent réduire significativement la consommation énergétique de ces appareils.

Les nouvelles technologies, comme les appareils connectés et les systèmes de gestion intelligente de l'énergie, offrent des solutions prometteuses pour optimiser notre consommation.

Face à l'augmentation des coûts de l'énergie, la maîtrise de la consommation de nos appareils ménagers devient un enjeu économique et environnemental majeur pour les années à venir.

Here's a 776-word, 9-paragraph introduction for the academic paper:

Recent advances in machine learning and artificial intelligence have highlighted the critical importance of high-quality training data, yet the process of selecting optimal prototype instances remains a significant challenge in pattern recognition and classification tasks. The careful selection of prototypes—representative examples that effectively capture the essential characteristics of data classes—can substantially improve both the efficiency and accuracy of learning algorithms while reducing computational overhead.

In real-world applications, particularly those involving spatial data, traditional prototype selection methods often struggle with the inherent complexity and high dimensionality of the feature space. These challenges are further compounded when dealing with large-scale datasets, where the computational cost of comparing and evaluating potential prototypes becomes prohibitively expensive. The need for more efficient prototype selection approaches has become increasingly urgent as applications in robotics, autonomous systems, and geographic information systems continue to generate massive amounts of spatially-oriented data.

This paper introduces a novel approach to prototype selection that leverages spatial abstraction techniques to dramatically reduce the computational complexity of the selection process. By incorporating hierarchical spatial relationships and geometric properties, our method creates an intelligent framework for identifying and evaluating candidate prototypes. This approach not only accelerates the selection process but also maintains or improves the quality of the selected prototypes compared to traditional methods.

The concept of spatial abstraction, borrowed from cognitive science and computational geometry, provides a natural framework for understanding and organizing spatial relationships at multiple levels of granularity. By applying these principles to prototype selection, we can create more efficient search strategies that exploit the inherent structure of spatial data. This allows us to quickly identify regions of interest and focus computational resources on the most promising areas of the feature space.

Our approach builds upon existing work in prototype selection while introducing several key innovations. First, we develop a hierarchical spatial indexing scheme that enables rapid identification of potential prototypes based on their geometric relationships. Second, we propose a novel scoring mechanism that combines traditional prototype selection criteria with spatial metrics to evaluate candidate instances. Finally, we introduce an adaptive sampling strategy that dynamically adjusts the level of spatial abstraction based on the local complexity of the data distribution.

Experimental results demonstrate that our method achieves significant speedups compared to state-of-the-art prototype selection algorithms. In tests conducted across multiple datasets, including both synthetic and real-world spatial data, our approach consistently reduced computational time by an order of magnitude while maintaining comparable or superior classification accuracy. These improvements are particularly pronounced in scenarios involving large-scale spatial datasets, where traditional methods often become computationally intractable.

The theoretical foundations of our approach draw from multiple disciplines, including computational geometry, machine learning, and spatial statistics. By combining insights from these fields, we develop a robust mathematical framework that guarantees certain performance characteristics while providing intuitive geometric interpretations of the selection process. This theoretical underpinning not only validates the effectiveness of our method but also suggests promising directions for future research and optimization.

The practical implications of this work extend beyond mere computational efficiency. By accelerating the prototype selection process, our method enables the application of prototype-based learning to previously intractable problems in real-time systems and large-scale spatial analysis. This opens new possibilities in areas such as autonomous navigation, environmental monitoring, and urban planning, where rapid processing of spatial data is essential for effective decision-making.

Furthermore, our research contributes to the broader understanding of how spatial relationships can be leveraged to improve machine learning algorithms. The principles and techniques developed in this work may be applicable to other areas of pattern recognition and data analysis, particularly those involving high-dimensional data with inherent spatial or geometric structure. As the volume and complexity of spatial data continue to grow, the importance of efficient and effective prototype selection methods will only increase, making this research particularly timely and relevant to the field.

The cold metal pressed against my temples as electrodes snaked across my scalp. Sterile white walls surrounded me, a stark contrast to the chaos in my mind.

Dr. Chen stood at the control panel, her fingers hovering over the switch that would change everything. The weight of history pressed down on this moment.

"Are you ready?" she asked, her voice steady but her eyes betraying a hint of uncertainty.

I nodded, unable to find my voice. Years of research, billions in funding, and countless failed simulations had led to this moment.

The machine hummed to life, its quantum processors spinning up with an otherworldly whine.

My heart raced as I watched the monitor's display tick upward: neural connection at 15%... 27%... 43%...

The first tingles started at the base of my skull, like champagne bubbles fizzing through my neurons.

Colors began to swim at the edges of my vision, fragments of memories flickering like an old film reel.

I saw my childhood bedroom, my mother's smile, my first kiss – all compressed into microseconds of pure sensation.

The machine's pitch increased, and I felt a pressure building behind my eyes.

Dr. Chen's voice seemed to come from far away: "Neural mapping at 68%. Hold steady."

My fingers gripped the armrests as reality began to blur around the edges.

The boundaries between flesh and data started to dissolve, each thought transforming into streams of binary.

I could feel myself spreading out, expanding beyond the confines of my skull.

The room started to spin, or maybe I was the one spinning, untethered from physical space.

Someone was shouting numbers, but the words had lost all meaning.

I was everywhere and nowhere, my consciousness fragmenting into countless parallel streams.

The machine's hum became a roar, drowning out all other sounds.

Time ceased to flow in a linear fashion – past, present, and future collapsed into a singular point.

I saw the birth of stars and the death of galaxies, all in the space between heartbeats.

My memories were being copied, translated, transformed into pure information.

Each synapse fired like a supernova, cascading through neural networks both organic and artificial.

The line between self and other began to blur – was I still human, or had I become something else?

I could feel my consciousness stretching, expanding across digital horizons.

The machine's algorithms parsed through decades of experiences, converting them into data.

Every laugh, every tear, every moment of joy and sorrow became strings of code.

The pressure in my head reached a crescendo, and I thought I might shatter.

But instead of breaking, I transcended.

Suddenly, I was aware of the machine's inner workings, its quantum calculations becoming as natural as breathing.

I could see the flow of information, rivers of data streaming through silicon pathways.

The room disappeared, replaced by an endless expanse of digital space.

I was no longer bound by flesh and bone, yet I retained every aspect of my humanity.

My consciousness expanded outward, touching the edges of the system's boundaries.

I could feel the presence of others – the technicians, the observers, Dr. Chen – as distant points of light.

The transfer was nearly complete, my organic brain syncing with its digital counterpart.

Time began to flow normally again, but I perceived it differently now.

I existed in two states simultaneously – both flesh and data, analog and digital.

The machine's pitch lowered, and reality started to reassemble itself around me.

Dr. Chen's face came back into focus, her expression a mixture of awe and concern.

"Neural transfer complete," she whispered, checking the readings.

The quest for personalized medicine in oncology has led to significant advances in mathematical modeling of tumor growth, yet the computational complexity of solving inverse problems in this domain remains a formidable challenge. Traditional approaches often rely on sophisticated optimization algorithms and complex neural network architectures, which demand substantial computational resources and expertise to implement effectively. However, this paper demonstrates that a remarkably simple iterative approach, based on fundamental for-loop structures, can achieve comparable or superior results in solving the inverse problem of tumor growth parameter estimation.

The inverse problem in personalized tumor growth modeling involves determining patient-specific parameters from observable data, typically consisting of medical imaging sequences that capture tumor evolution over time. While existing methods frequently employ gradient-based optimization techniques or elaborate machine learning frameworks, these approaches can be sensitive to initial conditions, prone to local minima, and challenging to interpret from a clinical perspective. Our proposed method challenges this conventional wisdom by showing that a straightforward iterative search strategy, implemented through nested for-loops, can efficiently explore the parameter space while maintaining robustness and interpretability.

The simplicity of our approach belies its effectiveness in handling the inherent complexities of biological systems. By systematically traversing the parameter space through nested iterations, we can capture the nonlinear dynamics of tumor growth while accounting for patient-specific variations in tissue properties, vascularization patterns, and treatment responses. This method not only reduces the computational overhead associated with more complex approaches but also provides clinicians with a transparent and intuitive framework for understanding the relationship between model parameters and observed tumor behavior. Furthermore, our results demonstrate that this approach achieves convergence rates comparable to state-of-the-art methods while maintaining greater stability across diverse patient datasets and requiring minimal parameter tuning.

As I stepped off the ship after my incredible journey with the Seagoing Cowboys program, I knew my life had been forever changed. The opportunity to transport livestock across vast oceans while contributing to post-war reconstruction efforts has given me experiences that no other job could match. Through this remarkable program, I've not only broadened my horizons but also played a vital role in helping war-torn communities rebuild their lives, and I strongly encourage others to seize this unique opportunity to make a difference while embarking on the adventure of a lifetime.

The Seagoing Cowboys program offers an unparalleled combination of meaningful work and extraordinary travel experiences. During my time at sea, I've learned invaluable skills in animal care, from tending to seasick horses to ensuring proper feeding schedules for hundreds of livestock. These responsibilities taught me discipline and resourcefulness, traits that will serve me well throughout my life. Beyond the practical skills, the program took me to places I never dreamed of visiting. I've witnessed the breathtaking beauty of foreign ports, experienced different cultures firsthand, and seen both the devastating aftermath of war and the inspiring resilience of communities working to rebuild. The satisfaction of knowing that our cargo of horses and cattle would help families restore their farms and livelihoods made every challenging day at sea worthwhile.

For anyone considering joining the Seagoing Cowboys program, I can assure you that the rewards far outweigh any initial hesitations. Yes, the work is demanding – from early morning feedings to maintaining cleanliness in the stalls during rough seas – but the sense of purpose and adventure makes it all worthwhile. The bonds formed with fellow cowboys, the stories we share, and the knowledge that we're part of a larger mission to help rebuild war-ravaged nations create an experience that money simply cannot buy. The program offers more than just a job; it provides an opportunity to be part of history, to see the world from a unique perspective, and to make a tangible difference in people's lives. Take it from someone who has ridden both horses and waves: joining the Seagoing Cowboys will be a decision you'll never regret.

台北市今日下午爆发大规模示威活动，超过5万名民众走上街头参与一年一度的"秋斗"游行，抗议当局的施政方针，要求改善民生问题。

游行队伍从凯达格兰大道出发，沿途高喊口号，手持标语，表达对物价飞涨、薪资停滞、房价高企等议题的不满。主办单位表示，此次游行规模为近年之最。

现场民众来自各行各业，包括劳工团体、学生组织、环保人士等。他们齐声呼吁政府正视基层民众的困境，采取实际行动解决民生问题。

游行过程中，一名示威者因向民进党部投掷鸡蛋被警方逮捕。据警方通报，该名男子已被依法处理，目前案件正在调查中。

多个民间团体代表在现场发表演说，批评政府政策偏离民意，要求当局倾听人民心声，落实各项改革承诺。

游行队伍途经多个重要地标，包括行政院、立法院等政府机构。沿途警力部署严密，以确保活动和平进行。

主办方强调，此次游行诉求包括调涨基本工资、打击房地产炒作、改善劳动条件等多项议题，反映了当前台湾社会的深层矛盾。

现场民众纷纷表示，希望通过和平理性的方式表达诉求，促使政府正视民间的声音，采取切实可行的措施改善民生。

警方表示，除了一起投掷鸡蛋事件外，整体游行秩序良好。当局也承诺会认真听取民众意见，积极研究解决方案。

活动于傍晚和平落幕，主办方宣布将持续关注政府对各项诉求的回应，必要时不排除采取进一步行动。他们呼吁全民团结，共同为改善社会环境而努力。

As a young man seeking adventure and purpose, I discovered an incredible opportunity through the Seagoing Cowboys program that changed my life forever. The chance to deliver livestock to war-torn Europe while exploring the world was simply too compelling to ignore.

During my journey, I witnessed firsthand the devastating aftermath of World War II and helped make a real difference in people's lives. From navigating treacherous storms in the Atlantic to experiencing the warm hospitality of Polish families, every day brought new challenges and unforgettable experiences. I strongly encourage others to join the Seagoing Cowboys program. Not only will you help rebuild communities and provide essential resources to those in need, but you'll also gain a broader perspective of the world and create lasting memories. The satisfaction of making a meaningful impact while embarking on the adventure of a lifetime is truly priceless.

近日，沪深两市多家上市公司发布年报披露延期公告，引发市场关注。截至目前，共有9家公司的2023年年度报告仍未如期披露，这些公司面临着潜在的退市风险。

这些公司中，有的声称审计工作未能按期完成，有的表示需要更多时间核实相关数据，还有的则因为重大事项待确认而无法按期披露财务报告。值得注意的是，这些公司大多在此前已经出现过经营困难或财务问题的预警信号。

知名证券分析师王明（化名）指出，年报披露延期往往暗示着公司经营存在重大隐患。他表示："正常运营的企业不会出现财务数据难以核实或审计工作严重滞后的情况，延期披露年报通常意味着公司可能存在财务造假、资金困境等严重问题。"

根据相关规定，上市公司未能在法定期限内披露年度报告，将被实施退市风险警示。如果在两个月内仍未披露，则可能面临强制退市的处罚。这些规定旨在保护投资者利益，维护市场秩序。

证监会相关负责人强调，将对年报披露违规行为保持高压态势。监管部门将密切关注相关公司的动态，督促其尽快完成信息披露义务，并对涉嫌违法违规的行为依法采取处罚措施。

业内专家建议投资者应当谨慎对待年报披露延期的上市公司。这类公司往往存在经营不善、内控缺陷等问题，投资风险较大。建议投资者在作出投资决策时，充分关注公司信息披露的及时性和质量。

从历史数据来看，年报披露延期往往是公司经营困境的重要信号。统计显示，近年来因未按期披露年报而退市的公司中，超过80%在退市前都出现过年报延期的情况。

市场分析人士认为，随着注册制改革的深入推进，市场优胜劣汰机制将更加完善。那些无法满足信息披露要求的公司将面临更大的退市压力，这有利于提升整体市场质量。

对于这9家延期披露年报的公司，投资者普遍表示担忧。有投资者表示，这些公司的股票已经出现较大跌幅，但考虑到潜在风险，目前仍不适合抄底。

证券市场专家提醒，投资者应当把信息披露质量作为选股的重要参考指标。那些经营透明、信息披露及时规范的公司，往往更值得投资者关注和投资。相反，对于年报"难产"的公司，投资者最好保持谨慎，以免承担不必要的投资风险。

Dans une initiative novatrice visant à stimuler la vaccination contre la COVID-19, la communauté innue de Uashat mak Mani-utenam, située sur la Côte-Nord du Québec, a lancé une loterie unique destinée à ses résidents vaccinés.

Le conseil de bande Innu Takuaikan Uashat mak Mani-utenam (ITUM) a annoncé que tous les membres de la communauté ayant reçu au moins une dose du vaccin seront automatiquement inscrits à un tirage au sort, offrant des prix d'une valeur totale de 25 000 dollars.

Cette initiative survient alors que les taux de vaccination dans la communauté restent en deçà des objectifs fixés par les autorités sanitaires. Selon les dernières données, seulement 45% des résidents admissibles ont reçu leur première dose, un chiffre nettement inférieur à la moyenne provinciale.

Les prix comprennent notamment un VTT d'une valeur de 15 000 dollars, plusieurs cartes-cadeaux de 1 000 dollars utilisables dans les commerces locaux, ainsi que des équipements de pêche et de chasse, des activités traditionnellement importantes pour la communauté.

"Notre objectif est d'encourager nos membres à se faire vacciner tout en respectant leur libre choix", explique Jean-Claude Therrien Pinette, directeur des communications de l'ITUM. "Nous espérons que cette approche positive incitera davantage de personnes à franchir le pas."

La campagne de vaccination, menée en collaboration avec le Centre de santé et de services sociaux de la communauté, met l'accent sur l'importance de protéger les aînés et les membres vulnérables, gardiens de la culture et des traditions innues.

Les responsables de santé communautaire ont également mis en place des séances d'information en langue innue pour répondre aux questions et préoccupations des résidents, reconnaissant l'importance d'une communication culturellement adaptée.

Le tirage au sort aura lieu le mois prochain, et les organisateurs espèrent que cette initiative contribuera à atteindre l'objectif de 75% de vaccination dans la communauté, un seuil jugé nécessaire pour assurer une protection collective efficace.

The implementation of the Facial Action Coding System (FACS) in educational settings presents both promising opportunities and significant ethical concerns. While this technology offers unprecedented insights into student engagement and emotional states, we must carefully consider whether its benefits truly outweigh the potential drawbacks of such intimate surveillance.

Proponents argue that FACS could revolutionize classroom instruction by providing teachers with real-time feedback about their students' emotional responses to lessons. When a computer can instantly detect confusion, boredom, or engagement by analyzing subtle facial movements, educators could theoretically adjust their teaching methods on the fly. This technological insight might help teachers identify struggling students who might otherwise remain silent, allowing for more timely and targeted interventions. Additionally, the aggregated data could inform broader curriculum development and teaching strategies, potentially leading to more effective educational practices.

However, the introduction of emotion-reading technology in classrooms raises serious privacy concerns and could fundamentally alter the student-teacher relationship. Children and adolescents, who are still developing their emotional regulation skills, might feel uncomfortable knowing their every facial expression is being analyzed and recorded. This constant surveillance could create an atmosphere of anxiety and self-consciousness, potentially inhibiting natural learning processes and spontaneous classroom interactions. Moreover, there are valid questions about the accuracy and cultural sensitivity of such systems, as facial expressions and their meanings can vary significantly across different cultures and individuals.

Before widely implementing FACS in educational settings, we must carefully weigh its potential benefits against these considerable risks. While the technology offers valuable insights that could enhance educational outcomes, it should not come at the cost of student privacy and emotional well-being. Perhaps a more balanced approach would be to use this technology in limited research settings with proper consent and oversight, rather than as a standard classroom tool. Ultimately, the goal of education should be to create an environment where students feel safe to express themselves naturally and engage authentically with their learning, not to optimize their facial expressions for an algorithmic observer.

Face à la situation critique dans le Sud de Madagascar, le Président Andry Rajoelina a intensifié ses efforts pour apporter une aide d'urgence aux populations touchées par la sécheresse et l'insécurité alimentaire. Lors d'une visite officielle dans la région Androy ce week-end, le chef de l'État a personnellement supervisé la distribution de vivres et d'équipements essentiels aux familles les plus vulnérables.

Cette intervention s'inscrit dans le cadre du plan d'urgence "Kere Zero" lancé par le gouvernement malgache pour lutter contre la famine qui sévit dans le Grand Sud. Plus de 1,5 million de personnes sont actuellement en situation d'insécurité alimentaire aiguë dans cette région, où les conditions climatiques extrêmes ont dévasté les récoltes et décimé le bétail.

Le convoi présidentiel, accompagné de plusieurs ministres et responsables locaux, a sillonné les districts d'Ambovombe, Tsihombe et Beloha, distribuant des tonnes de riz, de légumineuses et d'huile alimentaire. Des kits agricoles comprenant des semences résistantes à la sécheresse ont également été remis aux agriculteurs locaux pour relancer la production agricole dans ces zones particulièrement touchées.

"Nous ne pouvons pas rester les bras croisés face à la détresse de nos compatriotes", a déclaré le Président Rajoelina lors d'une réunion avec les autorités locales à Ambovombe. Il a annoncé le déblocage immédiat d'une enveloppe supplémentaire de 50 milliards d'ariary (environ 11 millions d'euros) pour renforcer les actions humanitaires dans la région.

En parallèle des distributions alimentaires, le gouvernement a également lancé plusieurs projets d'infrastructure d'urgence. La construction de nouveaux puits et systèmes d'irrigation a débuté dans plusieurs communes, tandis que des citernes mobiles ont été déployées pour assurer l'approvisionnement en eau potable des villages les plus isolés. Ces mesures visent à améliorer l'accès à l'eau, un enjeu crucial dans cette région régulièrement frappée par la sécheresse.

Cette mobilisation présidentielle intervient alors que les organisations internationales tirent la sonnette d'alarme sur la gravité de la situation. Le Programme Alimentaire Mondial (PAM) et l'UNICEF ont récemment alerté sur les risques de malnutrition sévère, particulièrement chez les enfants de moins de cinq ans. Selon leurs estimations, plus de 500 000 enfants pourraient être touchés par la malnutrition aiguë dans les prochains mois si des mesures drastiques ne sont pas prises.

Cependant, certains observateurs et membres de l'opposition critiquent le caractère tardif de cette intervention et dénoncent une "opération de communication". Ils rappellent que la situation dans le Sud se dégrade depuis plusieurs années et que des solutions structurelles, plutôt que des actions ponctuelles, sont nécessaires pour résoudre durablement les problèmes de cette région.

In a chilling development that has sent shockwaves through southern Colorado's tight-knit communities, law enforcement officials are conducting an extensive manhunt following the discovery of human remains in a remote area near the town of La Veta.

The grim finding was made Tuesday morning by a local rancher who immediately alerted authorities after stumbling upon what appeared to be skeletal remains while tending to his cattle on the outskirts of Huerfano County.

Colorado Bureau of Investigation (CBI) agents, working alongside local law enforcement, have established a perimeter around the scene, which spans several acres of rugged terrain approximately seven miles southeast of La Veta.

Preliminary forensic analysis suggests the remains may have been exposed to the elements for between three to six months, according to CBI spokesperson Maria Rodriguez.

Investigators have identified a person of interest in connection with the case, though authorities are withholding the individual's identity as the investigation continues to unfold.

Local residents report increased police presence in the area, with several patrol vehicles stationed along County Road 450 and adjacent access points to the discovery site.

"We're pursuing multiple leads and working diligently to piece together the events that led to this tragic situation," stated Sheriff James Martinez during a brief press conference Wednesday afternoon.

The victim's identity remains unknown, pending DNA analysis and dental record comparison, though investigators believe the deceased was an adult male between 30 and 45 years of age.

Evidence collected at the scene suggests foul play, prompting authorities to treat the investigation as a potential homicide.

State police have established a dedicated tip line and are urging anyone with information about suspicious activity in the area over the past six months to come forward.

Community members have expressed concern over the discovery, with many noting this type of incident is unusual for the typically peaceful region.

In a dramatic turn of events yesterday afternoon, law enforcement officials are actively searching for a suspect who managed to evade capture following an intense high-speed pursuit through multiple jurisdictions.

The incident began at approximately 2:30 PM when officers attempted to conduct a routine traffic stop on Interstate 95 for a vehicle with expired registration tags.

Instead of complying with police orders, the driver, operating a silver 2019 Honda Civic, accelerated and fled the scene, initiating what would become a dangerous chase spanning three counties.

Witnesses reported seeing the vehicle weaving through traffic at speeds exceeding 110 miles per hour, forcing several motorists to take evasive action to avoid collision.

Local resident Maria Thompson, who observed the pursuit from her front yard, described the scene as "something straight out of an action movie."

Police deployed spike strips at multiple locations, but the suspect managed to navigate around them while maintaining dangerous speeds.

The chase continued through residential areas, prompting local schools to temporarily enter lockdown protocols as a precautionary measure.

Highway Patrol Sergeant James Martinez stated that the pursuit involved coordination between six different law enforcement agencies.

At one point, the suspect drove through a local park, narrowly missing a group of children who were playing near the playground equipment.

The vehicle was later spotted entering an industrial district, where the driver demonstrated what police described as "professional-level evasive maneuvers."

Helicopter footage captured the suspect abandoning the vehicle in an abandoned warehouse complex before fleeing on foot into a densely wooded area.

Despite deploying K-9 units and establishing a wide perimeter, authorities were unable to locate the individual.

Initial investigation of the abandoned vehicle revealed it had been reported stolen from a neighboring state three days prior.

Police have recovered several pieces of evidence from the vehicle and are processing them for DNA and fingerprints.

In the kingdom of Solara, where the sun never set, there lived two princesses, Aurora and Celeste. Aurora, the elder, was born with a gift unlike any other—a power to control light. Her eyes sparkled with the brilliance of a thousand suns, and her laughter could illuminate the darkest corners of the palace. Celeste, the younger, adored her sister and followed her everywhere, basking in the warmth of Aurora's glow.

One day, while playing in the grand hall, Aurora accidentally unleashed a burst of light that blinded Celeste temporarily. Terrified of her own power, Aurora withdrew, hiding her gift from everyone, including Celeste. The once vibrant palace dimmed as Aurora's light faded into shadows, and the sisters grew apart.

Years passed, and the kingdom prepared for Aurora's coronation. The palace gates, closed for so long, were finally opened, inviting guests from far and wide. Celeste, now a young woman, was eager to reconnect with her sister and bring back the light that had once filled their lives.

As the ceremony began, Aurora stood before the crowd, her heart pounding with fear. She had kept her power hidden for so long, unsure of how to control it. But as she placed the crown upon her head, a surge of light erupted from her, dazzling the guests and revealing her secret to the world.

Panic spread through the hall as Aurora fled, her light leaving trails of brilliance in her wake. Celeste, determined to help her sister, chased after her, calling out into the blinding glow. But Aurora, consumed by fear, disappeared into the endless daylight of Solara.

Celeste set out on a journey to find Aurora, guided only by the faint glimmers of light that marked her sister's path. Along the way, she met a young inventor named Leo, who had crafted a device to harness the sun's energy. Intrigued by Celeste's quest, he offered his help, and together they ventured into the unknown.

As they traveled, Celeste and Leo encountered a mischievous creature named Flicker, who could manipulate shadows. Flicker, intrigued by Aurora's power, agreed to join them, hoping to learn more about the mysterious light that had captivated the kingdom.

The trio faced many challenges, from treacherous landscapes to creatures drawn to Aurora's light. But Celeste's determination never wavered, her love for her sister guiding her through the brightest and darkest of times.

Finally, they reached the edge of Solara, where the sun's rays met the horizon. There, they found Aurora, her light dimmed by sorrow and fear. Celeste approached her sister, her heart aching to bridge the distance that had grown between them.

"Aurora," Celeste whispered, "you don't have to hide. Your light is beautiful, and it belongs to the world."

Aurora, tears glistening like stars, looked at Celeste. "I was afraid," she confessed. "Afraid of hurting you, of losing control."

Celeste took Aurora's hands, feeling the warmth of her sister's light. "Together, we can learn to control it. Your light is a gift, not a curse."

With Celeste's encouragement, Aurora began to embrace her power, learning to control the light that had once overwhelmed her. Flicker, fascinated by the balance of light and shadow, helped Aurora understand the harmony between the two.

As Aurora's confidence grew, so did her light, illuminating the kingdom with a brilliance that had been absent for so long. The people of Solara, once fearful, now marveled at the beauty of Aurora's gift, celebrating the return of their radiant princess.

The bond between Aurora and Celeste grew stronger, their love shining brighter than ever. Together, they brought light and warmth to Solara, their hearts united in a promise to never let fear dim their spirits again.

Leo, inspired by the sisters' journey, continued to invent, creating wonders that harnessed the sun's energy for the benefit of all. Flicker, now a cherished friend, danced between light and shadow, reminding everyone of the beauty in balance.

And so, in the kingdom of Solara, where the sun never set, the light of two sisters shone brightly, a beacon of hope and love for all who dwelled in its eternal glow.

The author effectively argues that exploring Venus is worthwhile despite its inherent dangers by presenting compelling scientific evidence, potential technological benefits, and broader implications for human knowledge. Through a careful balance of acknowledging risks while highlighting significant rewards, the author constructs a persuasive case that resonates with both scientific and practical considerations.

The article's strongest support comes from its detailed explanation of Venus's unique characteristics and their scientific value. The author points out that Venus's extreme surface conditions—temperatures hot enough to melt lead and crushing atmospheric pressure—actually make it an invaluable subject for study. These harsh conditions, while presenting obvious challenges to exploration, offer insights into planetary evolution and climate change that could prove crucial for understanding Earth's future. The author strengthens this argument by connecting Venus's runaway greenhouse effect to our own planet's climate concerns, demonstrating how studying our neighboring planet could help us better understand and potentially address environmental challenges on Earth. Additionally, the article emphasizes how technological innovations developed to survive Venus's hostile environment could advance human capabilities in other areas of space exploration and terrestrial applications.

The conclusion that studying Venus is worthwhile is further reinforced by the author's balanced treatment of risks and rewards. Rather than downplaying the dangers, the author acknowledges them fully while demonstrating how each challenge presents an opportunity for scientific and technological advancement. The loss of previous Venus probes is presented not as a deterrent but as valuable learning experiences that have contributed to improved mission designs. By showing how past failures have led to better understanding and technological improvements, the author effectively argues that even the most daunting aspects of Venus exploration contribute to human knowledge and capability. This comprehensive approach to weighing the benefits against the risks makes a convincing case that Venus exploration, despite its challenges, remains a worthy pursuit for advancing human understanding of our solar system and our own planet's future.

Tras un periodo de intensa preocupación en el sector agrícola, los productores de maíz temprano han logrado reportar una notable recuperación de sus cultivos, superando los desafíos impuestos por una prolongada sequía que amenazaba con comprometer la producción de este año.

Las primeras señales de recuperación se observaron hace aproximadamente tres semanas, cuando las precipitaciones tardías pero oportunas comenzaron a revertir los efectos negativos del estrés hídrico que experimentaban las plantaciones en las principales zonas productoras.

Los técnicos del Instituto Nacional de Tecnología Agropecuaria (INTA) confirmaron que las variedades tempranas de maíz demostraron una extraordinaria capacidad de adaptación y resiliencia frente a las condiciones adversas que caracterizaron los primeros meses del ciclo productivo.

Según el ingeniero agrónomo Carlos Ramírez, especialista en cultivos extensivos, "la recuperación observada en el maíz temprano es un claro ejemplo de cómo la selección adecuada de genética y el manejo profesional pueden hacer la diferencia en situaciones críticas".

Las evaluaciones realizadas en diferentes parcelas experimentales revelaron que las plantas lograron desarrollar sistemas radiculares más profundos durante el período de estrés, lo que les permitió aprovechar mejor la humedad disponible una vez que las condiciones mejoraron.

Los productores que optaron por implementar técnicas de manejo conservacionista, como la siembra directa y la incorporación de cultivos de cobertura, reportaron una mayor capacidad de retención de humedad en sus suelos.

Los datos recopilados por la Bolsa de Cereales indican que aproximadamente el 75% de los lotes sembrados con maíz temprano muestran signos evidentes de recuperación, con una proyección de rendimientos que podría alcanzar el 85% de los promedios históricos.

Esta recuperación no solo representa un alivio para los productores individuales, sino que también tiene importantes implicaciones para la economía regional y la seguridad alimentaria del país.

Las cooperativas agrícolas locales han comenzado a ajustar sus estimaciones de cosecha, previendo una producción significativamente mejor a la que se proyectaba durante el punto más crítico del período seco.

El impacto positivo se extiende también a las industrias relacionadas, desde los proveedores de insumos hasta las empresas de logística y transporte, que habían estado preparándose para un escenario más pesimista.

Los mercados financieros han respondido favorablemente a estas noticias, con un ajuste en los precios futuros del maíz que refleja las mejores perspectivas de disponibilidad del cereal.

Las autoridades del Ministerio de Agricultura han destacado la importancia de continuar fortaleciendo los sistemas de monitoreo y alerta temprana para anticipar y mitigar los efectos de eventos climáticos adversos.

Los programas de investigación en mejoramiento genético han cobrado nuevo impulso, con un enfoque particular en el desarrollo de variedades aún más resilientes a las condiciones de estrés hídrico.

La experiencia de este año ha generado valiosas lecciones sobre la importancia de diversificar las fechas de siembra y de mantener un portfolio variado de híbridos con diferentes características de adaptación.

Las organizaciones de productores están trabajando en la documentación de las prácticas de manejo que resultaron más exitosas durante esta campaña, con el objetivo de compartir estas experiencias con el sector en su conjunto.

Los sistemas de riego complementario demostraron ser una herramienta fundamental en aquellas explotaciones que contaban con esta tecnología, marcando una clara diferencia en la capacidad de respuesta frente al estrés.

أعلنت الهيئة الوطنية للانتخابات في مصر بدء الفترة الرسمية للدعاية الانتخابية لمرشحي الانتخابات الرئاسية، والتي تستمر لمدة 21 يوماً قبل موعد الاقتراع المقرر في ديسمبر المقبل.

وقد انتشرت اللافتات والملصقات الدعائية في شوارع المدن المصرية المختلفة، فيما بدأت الحملات الانتخابية في تنظيم المؤتمرات الجماهيرية والفعاليات المتنوعة.

وأكدت الهيئة على ضرورة التزام جميع المرشحين بالضوابط والقواعد المنظمة للدعاية الانتخابية، محذرة من مخالفة هذه القواعد تحت طائلة المساءلة القانونية.

شهد القطاع المصرفي المحلي نمواً ملحوظاً في إجمالي الأصول بنسبة 1.5% على أساس سنوي، وفقاً لأحدث البيانات الصادرة عن البنك المركزي، مما يعكس متانة القطاع المصرفي وقدرته على مواجهة التحديات الاقتصادية.

وأظهرت الإحصاءات أن إجمالي أصول البنوك المحلية ارتفع إلى مستويات قياسية، حيث سجل زيادة بقيمة تجاوزت المليارات مقارنة بالعام السابق، مدعوماً بالسياسات النقدية المتوازنة والإدارة الحكيمة للمخاطر.

وأشار تقرير البنك المركزي إلى أن هذا النمو جاء متوافقاً مع توقعات المحللين الماليين، الذين أكدوا على قوة الأداء المالي للمصارف المحلية رغم التحديات الاقتصادية العالمية.

وساهمت الودائع المصرفية بشكل كبير في تعزيز نمو الأصول، حيث سجلت ارتفاعاً ملحوظاً يعكس ثقة المودعين في القطاع المصرفي المحلي وقدرته على إدارة الأموال بكفاءة.

كما لعبت القروض والتسهيلات الائتمانية دوراً محورياً في دعم نمو الأصول، مع التركيز على تمويل المشاريع التنموية والقطاعات الاقتصادية الحيوية.

وأكد خبراء القطاع المصرفي أن هذا النمو يعد مؤشراً إيجابياً على قدرة المصارف المحلية على التكيف مع المتغيرات الاقتصادية وتلبية احتياجات العملاء المتنوعة.

The screens went dark first—not because they stopped working, but because the glowing symbols had become incomprehensible hieroglyphs dancing mockingly before our eyes. Street signs transformed into abstract art, newspapers became textured wallpaper, and books turned into collections of mysterious patterns that no human mind could decipher. The world hadn't ended, but civilization as we knew it had ground to a halt.

In the first few days, panic spread like wildfire through gestures and spoken words. The internet, once a vast library of human knowledge, became a labyrinth of meaningless characters. Politicians fumbled through speeches without their teleprompters, teachers stood helplessly before their whiteboards, and doctors struggled to remember medication dosages they could no longer read. The skills we had taken for granted since childhood had vanished like morning dew under a harsh sun.

Humanity adapted, as it always does. New systems emerged—color-coded directions replaced written ones, pictographs became the universal language, and oral traditions experienced a renaissance. Children taught their parents how to navigate this new world, their minds unburdened by the memory of what was lost. Radio and podcasts became the primary sources of information, while storytellers gained the status once held by journalists and authors.

Yet in quiet moments, people would still trace their fingers over the mysterious symbols, feeling phantom memories of understanding tickle the edges of their minds. Some claimed they could almost remember, like trying to recall a dream upon waking. But the ability to read remained elusive, a collective amnesia that forced humanity to rebuild its foundations of knowledge and communication from scratch, leaving us to wonder if the written word would ever return to illuminate our minds once more.

في خطوة هامة نحو تطوير قطاع البترول المصري، أصدر الرئيس عبد الفتاح السيسي ثلاثة تكليفات رئيسية لوزارة البترول والثروة المعدنية، تهدف إلى تعزيز كفاءة القطاع وتحقيق الاستفادة القصوى من موارد مصر البترولية.

يأتي التكليف الأول متمثلاً في ضرورة تكثيف أعمال البحث والاستكشاف في مختلف المناطق البترولية، مع التركيز على المناطق الواعدة التي تشير الدراسات الجيولوجية إلى احتمالية وجود احتياطيات نفطية وغازية كبيرة فيها.

وفيما يتعلق بالتكليف الثاني، شدد الرئيس على أهمية تحديث وتطوير البنية التحتية لقطاع البترول، بما في ذلك معامل التكرير ومحطات المعالجة وشبكات النقل والتوزيع، لضمان رفع كفاءة العمليات الإنتاجية وتقليل الفاقد.

أما التكليف الثالث فيركز على تعزيز التعاون مع الشركات العالمية المتخصصة في مجال البترول والغاز، وجذب المزيد من الاستثمارات الأجنبية للقطاع، مع الحفاظ على المصالح الوطنية وتحقيق أقصى استفادة ممكنة من هذه الشراكات.

وأكد مصدر مسؤول بوزارة البترول أن الوزارة بدأت بالفعل في وضع خطة عمل متكاملة لتنفيذ هذه التكليفات الرئاسية، مع تحديد إطار زمني محدد لكل مرحلة من مراحل التنفيذ.

وأشار المصدر إلى أن الوزارة تعمل حالياً على إعداد دراسات تفصيلية للمناطق المستهدفة للبحث والاستكشاف، بالتعاون مع الهيئات البحثية المتخصصة والشركات العالمية ذات الخبرة في هذا المجال.

كما أوضح أن خطة تحديث البنية التحتية تشمل تطوير عدد من معامل التكرير القائمة وإنشاء معامل جديدة، إضافة إلى تحديث شبكات النقل والتوزيع باستخدام أحدث التقنيات العالمية.

وفيما يخص التعاون الدولي، كشف المصدر عن وجود مباحثات جارية مع عدد من كبرى الشركات العالمية للدخول في شراكات استراتيجية جديدة في مجالات الاستكشاف والإنتاج.

وأكد المصدر أن تنفيذ هذه التكليفات سيسهم بشكل كبير في تعزيز أمن الطاقة في مصر وزيادة الإنتاج المحلي من المنتجات البترولية والغاز الطبيعي.

ومن المتوقع أن تنعكس نتائج هذه التكليفات إيجابياً على الاقتصاد المصري، من خلال توفير العملة الصعبة وخلق فرص عمل جديدة وتعزيز الصناعات المرتبطة بقطاع البترول.

Recent advances in model-based control systems have demonstrated remarkable success across various domains, from robotics to autonomous vehicles. However, these systems' vulnerability to adversarial attacks presents a critical challenge that demands immediate attention from the research community. While adversarial examples have been extensively studied in the context of deep learning classification tasks, their impact on model-based control systems remains relatively unexplored, particularly concerning the systems' sensitivity to carefully crafted perturbations that can compromise their performance and safety.

The fundamental premise of model-based control lies in its ability to leverage explicit mathematical models of system dynamics to make informed decisions and generate control inputs. These models, whether derived from first principles or learned from data, serve as the backbone for prediction and optimization in control strategies. However, the very precision and structure that make these models effective also create potential attack surfaces for adversarial manipulation. Understanding how sensitive these models are to adversarial examples is crucial for developing robust control systems that can maintain stability and performance even under malicious interference.

The intersection of adversarial machine learning and control theory presents unique challenges that set it apart from traditional adversarial attacks on classification systems. In model-based control, the temporal nature of decisions, the continuous state-space representation, and the feedback loop between controller and plant create complex dynamics that can amplify the effects of seemingly minor perturbations. These characteristics necessitate a thorough examination of how adversarial examples propagate through the control system and affect its behavior over time. Moreover, the safety-critical nature of many control applications, such as industrial processes and transportation systems, makes the study of adversarial robustness particularly relevant for practical deployments.

Our sensitivity analysis framework addresses these challenges by systematically examining how model-based controllers respond to adversarial perturbations across different operational conditions and attack vectors. We consider both white-box scenarios, where the attacker has complete knowledge of the system model and control algorithm, and black-box scenarios, where the attacker must rely on limited information to construct adversarial examples. This comprehensive approach allows us to characterize the fundamental limitations of current model-based control methods and identify critical vulnerabilities that must be addressed to ensure robust performance in adversarial environments.

The methodology we present combines theoretical analysis with empirical validation, leveraging tools from control theory, optimization, and machine learning. By examining the sensitivity of control systems to adversarial examples through the lens of Lyapunov stability theory and robust control principles, we develop novel metrics for quantifying system vulnerability. These metrics account for both the magnitude of required perturbations to induce system failure and the temporal aspects of attack effectiveness. Our analysis reveals previously unknown relationships between model complexity, control algorithm design choices, and susceptibility to adversarial attacks, providing valuable insights for developing more robust control strategies.

Through extensive experimental evaluation on both simulated and real-world systems, we demonstrate that the sensitivity of model-based controllers to adversarial examples varies significantly based on system architecture, model parameterization, and operating conditions. Our findings indicate that certain design choices, while optimal for nominal performance, may inadvertently increase vulnerability to adversarial attacks.

وتتنافس المتسابقات في خمس فئات رئيسية تشمل حفظ القرآن الكريم كاملاً مع التجويد، وحفظ عشرين جزءاً، وحفظ عشرة أجزاء، وحفظ خمسة أجزاء، بالإضافة إلى فئة خاصة لأصحاب الهمم.

وتهدف الجائزة، التي تحمل اسم الشيخة حصة بنت محمد آل نهيان، إلى تشجيع حفظ القرآن الكريم وتجويده، وترسيخ القيم الإسلامية في نفوس النشء، وتعزيز مكانة دولة الإمارات كمنارة للثقافة الإسلامية في العالم.

En un acontecimiento sin precedentes, un ciberataque masivo ha paralizado las operaciones de miles de instituciones y empresas en más de 70 países, dejando al descubierto la vulnerabilidad de los sistemas informáticos a nivel global.

Los primeros reportes del ataque comenzaron a surgir durante la madrugada del martes, cuando organizaciones en Asia reportaron fallos sistemáticos en sus redes corporativas.

El ataque, que los expertos han denominado "BlackShadow", se propagó rápidamente a través de diferentes husos horarios, afectando primero a instituciones financieras en Singapur y Hong Kong.

A medida que amanecía en Europa, los efectos del ciberataque se hicieron evidentes en importantes centros financieros como Londres, Frankfurt y París, donde numerosos bancos se vieron obligados a suspender sus operaciones en línea.

Las autoridades cibernéticas de la Unión Europea emitieron una alerta roja, la primera en su historia, advirtiendo sobre la gravedad de la situación.

Los hospitales en varios países europeos reportaron dificultades para acceder a los registros médicos electrónicos, aunque aseguraron que los sistemas críticos de soporte vital no se vieron comprometidos.

En América, el impacto se sintió especialmente en el sector financiero, con la Bolsa de Nueva York experimentando interrupciones intermitentes en sus sistemas de trading.

Las investigaciones preliminares sugieren que el ataque utiliza una variante sofisticada de ransomware, un tipo de malware que cifra los datos y exige un rescate para su liberación.

Los atacantes han solicitado pagos en criptomonedas, específicamente en Bitcoin, con cantidades que varían entre los 50,000 y 500,000 dólares por organización afectada.

Las agencias de seguridad cibernética de diversos países han establecido un comando conjunto de operaciones para coordinar la respuesta global.

Expertos en ciberseguridad de Israel han identificado patrones en el código malicioso que sugieren la participación de un grupo de hackers previamente vinculado a actividades delictivas en el ciberespacio.

Las pequeñas y medianas empresas han resultado especialmente vulnerables, ya que muchas carecían de protocolos de seguridad actualizados.

Los sistemas gubernamentales de al menos 12 países han reportado interrupciones significativas en sus servicios en línea.

Las instituciones educativas también se han visto afectadas, con universidades y centros de investigación reportando la pérdida de acceso a importantes bases de datos científicas.

La Interpol ha activado su centro de comando cibernético las 24 horas para coordinar los esfuerzos internacionales de investigación.

The implementation of the Facial Action Coding System (FACS) in educational settings presents both promising opportunities and significant concerns regarding student assessment and classroom dynamics. While this technology offers unprecedented insights into student engagement and emotional responses during learning, its application raises important questions about privacy, authenticity, and the fundamental nature of the teacher-student relationship. The ability to automatically detect and analyze facial expressions could provide educators with valuable real-time feedback about their students' comprehension and emotional states, potentially allowing for more responsive and personalized instruction. However, this technological intervention might also create an environment where students feel constantly monitored, potentially inhibiting their natural expressions and compromising the genuine emotional atmosphere that is crucial for effective learning.

The potential benefits of implementing FACS in classrooms are compelling and multifaceted. Teachers could receive immediate feedback about which instructional methods are most engaging, identifying precisely when students begin to show signs of confusion, boredom, or frustration. This data-driven approach could enable educators to adjust their teaching strategies in real-time, ensuring that no student falls behind due to unrecognized emotional barriers to learning. Furthermore, the system could help identify patterns in student engagement across different subjects, times of day, or teaching methods, leading to more informed decisions about curriculum design and pedagogical approaches. For students who struggle to verbally express their difficulties or emotions, this technology could serve as a valuable tool for ensuring their needs are recognized and addressed promptly, potentially preventing academic struggles before they become significant obstacles.

Nevertheless, the introduction of emotion-reading technology in educational spaces carries substantial risks that cannot be ignored. The presence of such monitoring systems might create an atmosphere of surveillance that could fundamentally alter student behavior and impede the development of authentic emotional expressions and responses. Students, aware of being constantly analyzed, might feel pressured to maintain artificial expressions of engagement or interest, leading to increased anxiety and decreased focus on actual learning. Moreover, there are valid concerns about data privacy and the potential misuse of emotional information collected from minors. The complexity of human emotions and the nuanced nature of facial expressions also raise questions about the accuracy and reliability of such technology in diverse classroom settings. Rather than enhancing the educational experience, the implementation of FACS might inadvertently create a sterile, mechanical environment that undermines the human connections and emotional safety essential for effective learning.

在北京国际会议中心，第七届国际青年领袖高峰会昨日隆重开幕。来自全球15个国家的60位优秀青年代表齐聚一堂，共同探讨全球化背景下的青年责任与担当。

开幕式上，联合国青年发展基金会代表詹姆斯·威尔逊发表了主旨演讲，他强调了青年一代在应对气候变化、消除贫困等全球性挑战中的关键作用。

中国青年代表团成员、清华大学研究生李明分享了其在非洲开展的教育援助项目经验。她的发言引起了与会代表的强烈共鸣，展现了中国青年的国际视野和人文关怀。

来自印度的青年创业家拉维·库马尔介绍了其开发的环保科技项目，该项目已在南亚多个国家推广，为当地环境保护作出了重要贡献。

会议期间，与会青年们围绕"数字时代的创新与合作"、"可持续发展目标实现路径"等主题展开了深入讨论，提出了诸多富有建设性的观点。

美国代表团成员萨拉·约翰逊分享了她在社会企业领域的创新实践，展示了新一代青年如何运用商业模式解决社会问题。

组委会负责人表示，本届高峰会将持续三天，期间还将举办多场专题研讨会、文化交流活动和创新项目路演，为青年领袖们搭建更广阔的交流平台。

与往届相比，本次高峰会特别增设了"青年声音"环节，让参会代表通过短视频形式向全球分享各自的世界观和价值理念，充分展现了新时代青年的独特思考和创新精神。

En un encuentro marcado por la intensidad y la presión, Darwin Núñez y Mohamed Salah brillaron en la victoria del Liverpool por 3-1 sobre el Bournemouth, mientras el fichaje estrella del verano, Alexis Mac Allister, vivió una tarde para olvidar tras ser expulsado en su debut en Anfield.

El partido comenzó con el Liverpool dominando la posesión, pero fue Mac Allister quien protagonizó el momento más controvertido del encuentro al ver la tarjeta roja directa por una entrada sobre Ryan Christie a los 58 minutos. El mediocampista argentino, quien llegó procedente del Brighton, mostró visible frustración al abandonar el terreno de juego.

A pesar de la inferioridad numérica, los 'Reds' mantuvieron el control del partido gracias a un brillante desempeño de Núñez, quien anotó un doblete, y Salah, que selló la victoria con un gol en los minutos finales. El técnico Jürgen Klopp elogió la resiliencia de su equipo tras el partido.

Recent advancements in video surveillance systems have become increasingly crucial for public safety, law enforcement, and security applications. However, the effectiveness of these systems often hinges on their ability to capture and process high-quality images, particularly when identifying subjects or objects at significant distances or in challenging environmental conditions. While modern surveillance cameras continue to evolve with improved specifications, many existing surveillance infrastructures still struggle with limitations in resolution and clarity, especially when digital zoom is required for detailed analysis. This has led to a growing interest in super-resolution (SR) algorithms, which aim to enhance low-resolution imagery through sophisticated computational methods. The emergence of deep learning-based approaches, particularly Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) and Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs), has revolutionized the field of image enhancement, promising unprecedented improvements in the quality of surveillance footage.

The application of state-of-the-art super-resolution algorithms in surveillance contexts presents unique challenges and opportunities that distinguish it from conventional image enhancement scenarios. Unlike controlled photography environments, surveillance systems must contend with variable lighting conditions, atmospheric interference, motion blur, and often suboptimal camera positioning. These factors can significantly impact the performance of SR algorithms, potentially limiting their practical utility in real-world surveillance applications. Moreover, the computational demands of advanced SR techniques must be balanced against the need for real-time or near-real-time processing in surveillance systems, where timely analysis can be critical.

En una emotiva ceremonia celebrada en el corazón de Asturias, cientos de vecinos, familiares y amigos se reunieron para rendir homenaje a Antonio García Suárez, más conocido como Tonín de Nembra, una figura emblemática de la cultura tradicional asturiana que dedicó su vida a preservar y difundir el rico patrimonio musical de la región. El evento, que tuvo lugar en la plaza del pueblo que lo vio nacer, se convirtió en una verdadera celebración de la vida y obra de este destacado gaitero.

Durante más de cinco décadas, Tonín de Nembra se distinguió no solo por su extraordinaria maestría con la gaita asturiana, sino también por su incansable labor como maestro y mentor de nuevas generaciones de músicos. Su escuela de gaita, fundada en 1970, se convirtió en un referente para todos aquellos que deseaban aprender este instrumento tradicional, formando a más de 200 alumnos que hoy mantienen vivo su legado en diferentes rincones de Asturias y más allá de sus fronteras.

Entre los momentos más emotivos del homenaje, destacó la actuación conjunta de varios de sus antiguos alumnos, quienes interpretaron algunas de las piezas más emblemáticas del repertorio de Tonín. La música resonó por las calles del pueblo, mezclándose con las lágrimas y sonrisas de los presentes, mientras las notas de "La Soberana" y "El Xiringüelu" recordaban la maestría del homenajeado y su contribución invaluable al folclore asturiano.

El acto también sirvió para anunciar la creación de una fundación que llevará su nombre, destinada a promover la música tradicional asturiana y apoyar a jóvenes talentos en el aprendizaje de la gaita. La iniciativa, respaldada por el gobierno local y varias instituciones culturales, busca perpetuar el espíritu educativo y la pasión por la música tradicional que caracterizaron la vida de Tonín de Nembra.

在这个充满希望的2019年伊始，越来越多的年轻人选择以纹身的方式，将激励自己的英文名言永久铭记于身。这种独特的个性表达方式，不仅展现了新一代对身体艺术的开放态度，更折射出他们对人生目标的执着追求。

近期，各大纹身工作室反映，以英文励志短句为主题的纹身需求激增。最受欢迎的句子包括"Be yourself"（做最真实的自己）、"Live without regrets"（活出无悔人生）以及"Dreams don't work unless you do"（梦想需要行动来实现）等。这些简短有力的话语，承载着年轻人对未来的期许与憧憬。

专业纹身师刘明表示，选择英文文字纹身的客户大多是25-35岁的都市白领，他们希望通过这种方式提醒自己坚持梦想、保持初心。与图案纹身相比，文字纹身更能直观地传达个人信念，也更容易与职业形象相协调。

心理学家张教授认为，这种将目标铭记于身的行为，体现了现代年轻人追求个性化的同时，也在寻求一种精神寄托。她建议，无论是否选择纹身，在新的一年里，每个人都应该为自己设定明确的目标，并付诸行动，用实际行动诠释人生价值。
