Dans une avancée significative pour les droits des femmes en Guinée, le nouveau Code civil adopté par le gouvernement de transition introduit un article majeur concernant la monogamie. Cette réforme historique marque un tournant décisif dans la législation familiale du pays, où la polygamie était jusqu'alors largement pratiquée et légalement reconnue.

Le texte, qui a été validé en conseil des ministres, stipule désormais que "le mariage est l'union légale d'un homme et d'une femme fondée sur leur consentement mutuel". Cette définition exclut explicitement la possibilité de contracter plusieurs mariages simultanément, établissant ainsi la monogamie comme norme légale dans le pays.

Cette décision s'inscrit dans une volonté plus large de modernisation de la société guinéenne et de protection des droits des femmes. Les associations féministes, qui militent depuis des années pour cette réforme, saluent cette avancée comme une victoire historique pour l'égalité des genres en Guinée.

Cependant, l'application de cette nouvelle disposition suscite des débats au sein de la société. Les leaders religieux et traditionnels, notamment dans les régions rurales où la polygamie est profondément ancrée dans les mœurs, expriment leurs inquiétudes quant à ce changement radical des pratiques matrimoniales.

Le gouvernement de transition, dirigé par le colonel Mamadi Doumbouya, a souligné que cette réforme s'accompagnera de mesures d'accompagnement pour faciliter la transition. Des campagnes de sensibilisation seront menées à travers le pays pour expliquer les implications de cette nouvelle législation et promouvoir son acceptation sociale.

Les mariages polygames contractés avant l'entrée en vigueur de ce nouveau Code civil resteront valides, mais aucune nouvelle union polygame ne sera légalement reconnue. Cette disposition transitoire vise à éviter les perturbations sociales tout en garantissant l'application progressive de la nouvelle loi.

Les organisations internationales de défense des droits humains ont salué cette initiative, considérant qu'elle représente une étape cruciale vers l'égalité des sexes et la modernisation du droit familial en Guinée. Cette réforme pourrait également inspirer d'autres pays de la région à entreprendre des changements similaires dans leur législation.

In the depths of night, I stir from my slumber, wrapped in my cat-print blanket, surrounded by the familiar warmth of my seventeen feline companions.

The soft glow of moonlight filters through lace curtains, casting ethereal shadows across my bedroom walls, where countless framed photos of my precious cats hang in meticulous arrangements.

Something feels different tonight – the usual purrs and gentle sleeping sounds have been replaced by what seems like... whispering?

"Did you see what she did today?" comes a refined voice that sounds suspiciously like Mr. Whiskertons, my distinguished Persian. "She spent thirty minutes arranging our food bowls by color gradient."

A snicker follows – unmistakably from Mittens, the sassy calico who always gives me attitude. "That's nothing. Yesterday she showed the mailman our family photo album. All twelve volumes of it."

I lie perfectly still, hardly daring to breathe, as my beloved cats continue their late-night gossip session, unaware that their human is eavesdropping.

"Remember when she bought us all matching bow ties for Christmas?" That's definitely Princess Pawdrey Hepburn, my elegant Siamese. "I've never felt so mortified in all my nine lives."

The sound of paws padding across my dresser is followed by Luna's distinctive meow. "At least you didn't get the pink tutu. Do you know how hard it is to maintain street cred with the neighborhood strays after that?"

"Speaking of embarrassing," chimes in Sir Floof, my massive Maine Coon, "she's started calling me her 'little baby man' in public. I'm seven years old, for crying out loud!"

A chorus of feline laughter echoes through the room, and I feel my cheeks burning with each new revelation.

"And don't get me started on the Instagram account," groans Captain Whiskers.

أعلنت الهيئة العامة للأرصاد وحماية البيئة عن توقعاتها لحالة الطقس ليوم الثلاثاء في مختلف مناطق المملكة العربية السعودية. حيث يتوقع أن تشهد المنطقة الوسطى درجات حرارة معتدلة مع رياح خفيفة إلى معتدلة السرعة.

وفي المنطقة الشرقية، من المتوقع هطول أمطار متفرقة مصحوبة برياح نشطة قد تؤدي إلى تدني مستوى الرؤية الأفقية. أما المنطقة الغربية، فستشهد طقساً مستقراً مع ارتفاع نسبي في درجات الحرارة خلال ساعات النهار.

وتنبه الهيئة المواطنين والمقيمين في المناطق الشمالية من موجة برد معتدلة مع احتمال تشكل الضباب في ساعات الصباح الباكر. كما تدعو قائدي المركبات إلى توخي الحذر وخاصة على الطرق السريعة.

في تطور دراماتيكي جديد على الساحة اليمنية، تلقت مليشيا الحوثي ضربة موجعة في معقل زعيمها عبد الملك الحوثي بمحافظة صعدة، حيث أفادت مصادر محلية موثوقة بانهيار معنويات عناصر المليشيا بشكل غير مسبوق بعد تكبدها خسائر فادحة في الأرواح والعتاد.

وكشفت المصادر عن مقتل العشرات من قيادات الصف الأول في المليشيا خلال الضربات الجوية الأخيرة التي استهدفت مواقع استراتيجية في صعدة، مما أدى إلى إرباك كبير في صفوف المليشيا وتصدع في هيكلها القيادي. كما تم تدمير مخازن أسلحة ومنصات إطلاق صواريخ كانت تستخدمها المليشيا في عملياتها العدائية.

وأشارت التقارير الواردة من داخل معاقل الحوثيين إلى حالة من التذمر والغضب بين السكان المحليين، الذين باتوا يحملون المليشيا مسؤولية تدهور الأوضاع المعيشية وانهيار الخدمات الأساسية. وقد شهدت المنطقة موجة نزوح غير مسبوقة للمدنيين الفارين من مناطق المواجهات.

وفي السياق ذاته، أكدت مصادر عسكرية أن القوات المشتركة تمكنت من إحكام السيطرة على مواقع استراتيجية كانت تحت سيطرة المليشيا، مما يمثل تحولاً كبيراً في مسار المعركة. وتشير التوقعات إلى احتمال انهيار وشيك للمليشيا في معقلها الرئيسي، خاصة مع تزايد الضغوط العسكرية والشعبية عليها.

The implementation of Facial Action Coding System (FACS) technology in classrooms presents both promising opportunities and significant concerns for modern education. By analyzing students' facial expressions in real-time, teachers could potentially gauge comprehension levels, identify emotional distress, and adjust their teaching methods accordingly. This data-driven approach to understanding student engagement could revolutionize how educators respond to their students' needs, particularly in larger classroom settings where individual attention is often limited.

However, the constant surveillance and emotional monitoring of students raises serious ethical questions about privacy and psychological well-being. Students might feel pressured to maintain "appropriate" expressions, leading to artificial behaviors and increased anxiety. Moreover, emotional expressions vary significantly across cultures and individuals, making standardized interpretation potentially misleading or discriminatory. While FACS technology offers innovative possibilities for educational assessment, its implementation must be carefully weighed against the fundamental right of students to learn in an environment free from constant emotional scrutiny.

The gleaming spire of Neo-Tower pierced the clouds like a silver needle, its thousand stories stretching far beyond what the human eye could comprehend from below. We, the sky dwellers, made our home in the upper reaches, never venturing below the 900th floor unless absolutely necessary. Our world was a self-contained ecosystem of hydroponic gardens, atmospheric water collectors, and solar arrays that powered our daily lives. The lower levels were foreign to us, shrouded in mystery and perpetual twilight from the dense urban sprawl that surrounded the base of our vertical city.

Sometimes, late at night, I would press my palm against the smart-glass windows of my apartment on the 987th floor and peer down at the distant ground, barely visible through layers of sky bridges and floating platforms. The stories we heard about the surface dwellers were like folklore to us – tales of people who still walked on actual soil and breathed unfiltered air. My great-grandmother was the last in our family to have lived below, and she spoke of parks and horizontal streets with a nostalgia that seemed almost absurd to those of us born in the stratosphere. Yet occasionally, when the sunset painted the clouds in impossible colors, I wondered what it would feel like to stand on solid earth and look up at our towering home.

In the depths of an abandoned mine shaft, where even hope seemed to have forsaken its post, I discovered something extraordinary. The beam from my failing flashlight caught a cluster of bioluminescent fungi, their ethereal blue glow painting the rough walls like a cosmic masterpiece.

As I stood there, mesmerized by nature's light show, I realized that darkness isn't the absence of light—it's the canvas upon which light creates its most stunning works. The mushrooms pulsed softly, as if sharing ancient secrets in a language of luminescence, reminding me that even in our darkest moments, beauty finds a way to illuminate our path forward.

The increasing integration of technology in educational settings has sparked debates about its role in understanding student engagement and emotional responses. The Facial Action Coding System (FACS), as described in "Making Mona Lisa Smile," represents a groundbreaking advancement in computer-based emotion recognition. While this technology offers promising possibilities for educators to better understand their students' emotional states and learning experiences, its implementation in classrooms raises significant concerns about privacy, authenticity, and the fundamental nature of human interaction in education.

The potential benefits of using FACS in educational settings are compelling. Teachers, often responsible for managing large classrooms, could receive real-time feedback about their students' emotional engagement with the material. When a significant portion of the class displays confusion or frustration, educators could immediately adjust their teaching approach or pace. This technology could be particularly valuable for identifying students who might be struggling but are hesitant to speak up, allowing for more timely and targeted interventions. Additionally, the system could help teachers develop more effective teaching strategies by providing objective data about which teaching methods elicit positive emotional responses and enhanced engagement from their students.

However, the implementation of emotion-reading technology in classrooms presents serious ethical and practical challenges that cannot be ignored. Students, knowing they are being monitored, might feel pressured to maintain artificial expressions of interest or understanding, potentially creating an environment of emotional performance rather than genuine learning. This constant surveillance could increase anxiety and self-consciousness, potentially hindering rather than helping the learning process. Moreover, the technology's accuracy in interpreting complex human emotions across diverse cultural backgrounds and individual differences remains questionable. What might appear as disengagement to an algorithm could simply be a student's natural processing expression or cultural manner of showing attention.

While FACS technology offers intriguing possibilities for enhancing educational experiences, its current limitations and potential negative impacts outweigh its benefits in the classroom setting. The classroom should remain a space where students feel free to express themselves naturally and develop authentic relationships with their teachers and peers. Instead of relying on automated emotion recognition systems, educators should focus on developing their interpersonal skills and creating environments where students feel comfortable expressing their needs and concerns directly. Technology can certainly support education, but it should not replace the human ability to recognize and respond to emotional cues through genuine interaction and communication. The goal of education extends beyond mere information transfer to include the development of emotional intelligence and social skills – capabilities that are best nurtured through authentic human connections rather than algorithmic analysis.

The rapid advancement of deep learning technologies has revolutionized numerous domains, from computer vision to natural language processing. However, the increasing concern over data privacy has created a pressing need for secure computation methods that can process sensitive information while maintaining confidentiality. Homomorphic Encryption (HE) has emerged as a promising solution, enabling computations on encrypted data without requiring decryption. Yet, the implementation of Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) using HE presents significant challenges, particularly in terms of computational efficiency and practical applicability.

Traditional approaches to HE-based CNNs often rely on the im2col transformation, a technique that reorganizes image matrices to enable efficient convolution operations. While im2col has been widely adopted, it introduces substantial memory overhead and computational complexity, limiting the scalability of HE-based neural networks. These limitations become particularly pronounced when processing large-scale datasets or implementing deep network architectures, where the computational resources required can quickly become prohibitive.

The fundamental challenge lies in bridging the gap between the mathematical properties of HE schemes and the computational requirements of modern CNN architectures. Current solutions either compromise on model accuracy to accommodate HE constraints or sacrifice performance to maintain precision. This trade-off has hindered the widespread adoption of privacy-preserving deep learning solutions in real-world applications, where both accuracy and efficiency are crucial.

In this paper, we introduce UniHENN (Unified Homomorphic Encryption Neural Network), a novel approach that reimagines the implementation of CNN operations in the encrypted domain without relying on the im2col transformation. Our method leverages innovative mathematical formulations that directly operate on encrypted tensors, eliminating the need for intermediate matrix reorganization while maintaining the security guarantees provided by homomorphic encryption. This approach not only reduces memory requirements but also significantly improves computational efficiency.

UniHENN's architecture incorporates several key innovations that set it apart from existing solutions. First, we propose a new tensor manipulation scheme that preserves the spatial relationships in convolutional operations while minimizing the number of homomorphic operations required. Second, we introduce an optimized scheduling algorithm that maximizes the utilization of parallel processing capabilities while managing the depth of the circuit. Third, we develop a flexible framework that adapts to different HE schemes, making our solution more versatile and applicable across various privacy-preserving scenarios.

Our experimental results demonstrate that UniHENN achieves substantial improvements in both computational efficiency and memory utilization compared to state-of-the-art approaches. When evaluated on standard benchmark datasets, our method reduces memory overhead by up to 60% while maintaining comparable accuracy to traditional CNN implementations. Furthermore, the elimination of the im2col transformation results in a 40% reduction in encryption-related computational costs, making privacy-preserving deep learning more practical for resource-constrained environments.

The implications of this work extend beyond mere technical improvements.

Here's a 791-word introduction split into 4 paragraphs for the academic paper:

The emergence of large language models (LLMs) has revolutionized natural language processing, with few-shot prompt tuning emerging as a particularly efficient fine-tuning paradigm. This approach allows models to adapt to new tasks with minimal training data and computational resources, making it increasingly popular in real-world applications. However, as these systems become more prevalent in critical domains such as healthcare, finance, and security, their vulnerability to malicious attacks becomes a pressing concern. While considerable attention has been paid to traditional security threats in deep learning systems, the specific security implications of few-shot prompt tuning remain largely unexplored, creating a potentially dangerous blind spot in our understanding of LLM security.

Recent research has demonstrated that neural networks are susceptible to Trojan attacks, where malicious actors can embed hidden behaviors that are triggered by specific inputs while maintaining normal performance on clean data. These attacks are particularly insidious because they are difficult to detect through conventional testing methods and can lie dormant until activated by the attacker. In the context of few-shot prompt tuning, where models learn from a limited number of examples, the potential for Trojan insertion becomes even more concerning. The reduced training data and the subtle nature of prompt-based learning may create unique vulnerabilities that differ fundamentally from those in traditional fine-tuning approaches. This paper introduces TrojFSP (Trojan in Few-Shot Prompting), a novel attack framework that exploits these vulnerabilities to inject malicious behaviors into prompt-tuned language models.

Our research demonstrates that TrojFSP can successfully embed Trojans during the prompt tuning process while maintaining the model's performance on legitimate tasks. Through extensive experimentation across multiple domains and model architectures, we show that these attacks can be executed with remarkable efficiency, requiring minimal modifications to the prompt tuning procedure. The attack's success relies on carefully crafted trigger patterns that exploit the semantic relationships learned during prompt tuning, allowing the attacker to maintain control over the model's behavior while avoiding detection. We present a comprehensive analysis of various trigger designs and their effectiveness, considering factors such as trigger complexity, semantic relevance, and naturalness of the modified inputs. Our findings reveal that TrojFSP can achieve attack success rates exceeding 95% while maintaining performance degradation on clean inputs to less than 1%, making it a particularly dangerous threat to real-world applications.

The implications of our work extend beyond the immediate security concerns, highlighting fundamental questions about the robustness and trustworthiness of few-shot learning approaches in language models. By analyzing the mechanisms through which TrojFSP operates, we provide insights into the vulnerabilities inherent in prompt tuning and propose potential defensive strategies. These include novel detection methods based on prompt consistency analysis and architectural modifications that increase resistance to Trojan insertion. Furthermore, our research emphasizes the need for a more comprehensive security evaluation framework for few-shot learning systems, particularly in scenarios where models are deployed in security-critical applications.

The rapid advancement of autonomous vehicle technology represents one of the most significant transformations in transportation since the invention of the automobile itself. While some view this development with trepidation, the numerous benefits of driverless cars – including enhanced safety, increased mobility for the elderly and disabled, and reduced traffic congestion – make a compelling case for their continued development and implementation.

The most persuasive argument in favor of autonomous vehicles is their potential to dramatically reduce traffic accidents and fatalities. As noted in "Driverless Cars are Coming," human error accounts for over 90% of road accidents, with distracted driving, fatigue, and impaired judgment being major contributing factors. Autonomous vehicles, equipped with sophisticated sensors and algorithms, never get tired, distracted, or intoxicated. They can process information from multiple sources simultaneously and react faster than any human driver. Furthermore, these vehicles offer unprecedented independence to elderly individuals and people with disabilities who are currently unable to drive. The article highlights how this technology could restore mobility and freedom to millions of people, allowing them to maintain their independence and quality of life without relying on others for transportation.

While critics raise valid concerns about potential technical glitches and cybersecurity risks, these challenges are not insurmountable. The article acknowledges these concerns but also demonstrates how rigorous testing protocols and advanced security measures are being developed to address these issues. Additionally, the environmental benefits cannot be overlooked – driverless cars can optimize route planning and driving patterns to reduce fuel consumption and emissions. When considering the transformative potential of this technology to save lives, enhance mobility, and contribute to a more sustainable future, it becomes clear that the development of driverless cars should not only continue but be accelerated. The benefits far outweigh the risks, and with proper regulation and continued technological advancement, autonomous vehicles will revolutionize transportation for the better.

In a profound loss to the Santa Barbara community, Laurie Nelson, a beloved local artist and philanthropist, passed away peacefully in her sleep on March 15, 2024, at the age of 78. Her family announced that she died at her cherished Spanish Colonial Revival home in the foothills of Santa Barbara, where she had lived and worked for over four decades, creating vibrant paintings that captured the essence of California's Central Coast.

Nelson, born in 1945 in Minneapolis, Minnesota, moved to Santa Barbara in 1980 after establishing herself as an emerging talent in the Midwest's art scene. Her journey to becoming one of Santa Barbara's most celebrated artists began when she fell in love with the region's dramatic landscapes and distinctive light during a vacation. What was intended to be a brief stay turned into a lifelong dedication to portraying the area's natural beauty through her distinctive impressionistic style, which earned her numerous accolades and a devoted following among art collectors nationwide.

Beyond her artistic achievements, Nelson was a tireless advocate for arts education and environmental conservation. She founded the Nelson Arts Foundation in 1995, which has provided art supplies and educational programs to underprivileged schools throughout Santa Barbara County. Her commitment to environmental causes was equally notable, as she dedicated a significant portion of her proceeds to local conservation efforts and served on the board of several environmental organizations, including the Santa Barbara Land Trust and the Channel Islands Marine Sanctuary Foundation.

Throughout her life, Nelson remained deeply connected to the Santa Barbara community, regularly opening her studio to aspiring artists and hosting annual fundraising events that brought together art enthusiasts and environmental activists. Her impact extended far beyond her paintings, as she mentored countless young artists and worked tirelessly to preserve the natural landscapes that inspired her work.

Environmental benefits present another compelling argument for driverless cars. The transition to autonomous vehicles represents a crucial step toward safer, more sustainable transportation.

In the depths of an ancient mountain, through winding passages carved by time itself, I stumbled upon a sight that made my heart skip several beats.

Golden light spilled from crystalline formations in the ceiling, illuminating row upon row of pedestals bearing the most famous weapons in history.

There, suspended in a shaft of light, hung Mjolnir, its surface crackling with barely contained lightning, waiting for another worthy of Thor's legacy.

Excalibur stood proudly in its stone, still gleaming as if it had been polished yesterday, its presence commanding respect from all who gazed upon it.

The Spear of Destiny leaned against a marble column, its tip stained with the blood of gods, while nearby, Durandal's edge still sparked with holy fire.

I recognized Gae Bulg, Cu Chulainn's deadly spear, and Kusanagi-no-Tsurugi, the grass-cutting sword of Japanese legend, each radiating their own particular brand of power.

The air hummed with ancient magic, and I could feel the weight of countless generations of warriors who had come before, each choosing their destined weapon or being rejected by powers beyond their understanding.

As I walked between the pedestals, my footsteps echoing in the vast chamber, I noticed how some weapons seemed to shy away from my presence while others remained indifferent.

That's when I heard it – a whisper so faint it might have been my imagination, coming from a shadowed corner of the hall that seemed to have been forgotten by the crystalline light above.

In a cobweb-draped alcove stood a simple wooden pedestal, and upon it lay a weapon unlike any other I had seen in the hall.

It was not grand like Excalibur, nor did it crackle with power like Mjolnir. Instead, it seemed to absorb the very shadows around it, as if drinking in the darkness itself.

The whisper came again, stronger this time, speaking words in a language I had never heard but somehow understood perfectly, calling to something deep within my soul.

As I approached, years of dust swirled away from the weapon of their own accord, revealing a blade that seemed to be made of starless night, its surface somehow both solid and void.

My hand moved of its own accord, drawn to the grip that seemed to have been crafted specifically for my grasp, though it must have been forged eons before my birth.

The moment my fingers closed around the hilt, the weapon's true nature revealed itself to me – this was Umbra, the Shadow Blade, forged from a fallen star and tempered in the void between worlds.

It had waited here, passed over by countless warriors who sought more famous weapons, waiting for someone who could understand that true power often lies in the spaces between light and glory.

As I lifted Umbra from its resting place, the blade seemed to sing, its edge cutting through reality itself, showing me glimpses of shadows that lived and breathed and fought.

And in that moment, I understood why I had been drawn to this forgotten corner of the legendary hall – sometimes the greatest weapons are not the ones that shine the brightest, but the ones that wait patiently in darkness for the right wielder to step out of the light.

The fluorescent lights hummed overhead as Dr. Martinez led the third patient into the observation room, completing her unorthodox experiment. She had carefully selected these three men, each absolutely convinced of their divine identity, for what she hoped would be a breakthrough in their treatment.

The first man, a former carpenter with weathered hands and gentle eyes, sat quietly in the corner, tracing invisible patterns on the table with his finger. He had been admitted three months ago, speaking in parables and offering to wash the feet of other patients.

The second, a young professor of religious studies, stood by the window, his academic background bleeding into his delusions as he quoted scripture with perfect accuracy. His hands bore self-inflicted stigmata, carefully maintained with paper clips and pins.

The third, a homeless man with a tangled beard and bare feet, immediately raised his arms upon entering, blessing the other two with a beatific smile. "My children," he whispered, "why do you pretend to be me?"

The professor turned sharply, his eyes narrowing. "I believe you are confused, brother. I am the one who was crucified for mankind's sins." His voice carried the weight of scholarly authority, even in his madness.

The carpenter looked up from his patterns, speaking softly, "You are both lost sheep. Come, let me show you the way." He stood, arms outstretched in welcome, his hospital gown flowing like robes.

Behind the one-way mirror, Dr. Martinez watched as the three men circled each other, each convinced of their authenticity, each trying to prove their divinity to the others. She had expected conflict, perhaps even hostility, but what unfolded surprised her.

The homeless man began to weep, not in anger but in compassion. "Your suffering is my suffering," he said, embracing the professor, who had begun to tremble with doubt.

The carpenter joined them, placing his hands on their shoulders. "We are all one in pain," he whispered, and for a moment, their shared delusion seemed to crack, revealing the broken men beneath.

Hours passed, and Dr. Martinez watched as they talked, prayed, and eventually sat together in silence. Their individual certainties had given way to something else – a shared understanding of their common humanity.

By evening, none of them claimed to be Jesus anymore. Instead, they spoke of their real names, their real lives, their real pain. The divine delusion had shattered against the mirror of itself.

Dr. Martinez made her final notes, understanding that sometimes the path to healing lies not in confronting delusions with reality, but in letting them confront each other. Sometimes, the truth emerges not from professional intervention, but from the simple act of seeing oneself in others.

In the end, three men who thought they were Jesus found something more valuable – they found themselves.

The Implications of Quantum Computing on Modern Cryptography: A Comprehensive Analysis of Post-Quantum Security Measures

The advent of quantum computing represents one of the most significant technological paradigm shifts in modern history, promising computational capabilities that far exceed those of classical computers. As we stand on the precipice of this quantum revolution, the cybersecurity landscape faces unprecedented challenges, particularly in the realm of cryptographic systems that form the backbone of our digital infrastructure. While current cryptographic protocols, such as RSA and ECC (Elliptic Curve Cryptography), have successfully safeguarded digital communications for decades, they fundamentally rely on mathematical problems that quantum computers could potentially solve in polynomial time, thereby rendering these traditional security measures obsolete. This impending vulnerability has catalyzed an urgent global initiative to develop and implement quantum-resistant cryptographic solutions before large-scale quantum computers become a reality.

The race to achieve quantum supremacy has intensified in recent years, with major technology companies and research institutions reporting significant breakthroughs in quantum computing capabilities. These developments, while promising for various fields including drug discovery, climate modeling, and optimization problems, cast a long shadow over the future of current cryptographic systems. Shor's algorithm, when implemented on a sufficiently powerful quantum computer, could efficiently factorize large numbers and compute discrete logarithms, effectively breaking the mathematical foundations of widely deployed public-key cryptography. This theoretical threat has evolved into a pressing practical concern, as experts estimate that quantum computers capable of breaking current cryptographic systems could become available within the next decade, creating what is known as the "store now, decrypt later" vulnerability where adversaries can collect encrypted data today for future decryption.

In response to these challenges, the cryptographic community has mobilized to develop post-quantum cryptography (PQC) solutions that can withstand attacks from both classical and quantum computers. The National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) initiated a standardization process in 2016 to evaluate and select quantum-resistant cryptographic algorithms, marking a crucial step toward securing our digital future. The selected algorithms, based on mathematical problems believed to be intractable even for quantum computers, include lattice-based cryptography, hash-based signatures, multivariate cryptography, and code-based systems. These novel approaches offer varying degrees of security assurance and performance characteristics, necessitating careful analysis of their practical implementations across diverse computing environments and use cases.

The transition to quantum-resistant cryptography presents numerous technical, operational, and economic challenges that organizations must address to maintain robust security postures. This comprehensive analysis examines the current state of quantum computing threats, evaluates the effectiveness of proposed post-quantum cryptographic solutions, and provides a framework for organizations to assess and implement appropriate security measures. Our research synthesizes findings from recent academic literature, industry reports, and experimental implementations to offer insights into the practical aspects of transitioning to quantum-resistant cryptography. We explore the performance implications of various PQC algorithms, analyze their integration challenges with existing systems, and propose strategies for managing the cryptographic agility required to adapt to evolving quantum threats. Furthermore, we consider the broader implications for global cybersecurity standards, regulatory compliance, and international cooperation in establishing a quantum-resistant digital infrastructure.

El Ayuntamiento de Vila-real ha anunciado que mantendrá durante el año 2022 la ampliación de los espacios destinados a terrazas para los establecimientos hosteleros, una medida que se implementó inicialmente como respuesta a las restricciones sanitarias durante la pandemia. Esta decisión, respaldada por el equipo de gobierno municipal, busca continuar apoyando al sector de la hostelería local sin aplicar ningún incremento en las tasas municipales por ocupación de la vía pública.

La medida beneficiará a más de un centenar de establecimientos hosteleros en toda la ciudad que, desde el inicio de la pandemia, han podido expandir sus terrazas para compensar las limitaciones de aforo en interiores. Según fuentes municipales, esta ampliación ha permitido a muchos negocios mantener su viabilidad económica durante los momentos más difíciles de la crisis sanitaria, y ahora se consolida como una herramienta para impulsar la recuperación del sector.

El alcalde de Vila-real ha destacado que esta decisión responde a un compromiso firme con el tejido empresarial local, especialmente con un sector tan castigado como el de la hostelería. La iniciativa se enmarca dentro de un paquete más amplio de medidas de apoyo económico y fiscal que el consistorio ha venido implementando desde el inicio de la pandemia, con el objetivo de preservar el empleo y la actividad económica en la ciudad.

Los establecimientos beneficiarios podrán mantener las ampliaciones de espacio autorizado para sus terrazas sin costes adicionales, siempre que cumplan con la normativa vigente en materia de seguridad y accesibilidad.

In a remarkable journey of resilience and determination, 26-year-old Bhavani Devi from Chennai has transformed the taunts about her body into medals for the nation, emerging as one of India's most promising weightlifters in the 71kg category.

Growing up in a modest household in Tamil Nadu's Thiruvallur district, Bhavani faced constant ridicule from peers and relatives who mocked her stocky build and unconventional physique. The harsh words could have broken her spirit, but instead, they fueled her determination to channel her natural strength into something extraordinary.

Under the guidance of coach Ramesh Kumar at the Sports Authority of India center in Chennai, Bhavani discovered weightlifting at the age of 15. What began as a way to prove her critics wrong soon blossomed into a passionate pursuit of excellence, with early morning training sessions becoming her daily ritual.

Her breakthrough came at the 2022 Commonwealth Games in Birmingham, where she clinched a bronze medal, marking India's first medal in her weight category. The victory was particularly sweet for Bhavani, who dedicated it to her late father, a daily wage worker who had always encouraged her to pursue her dreams despite financial constraints.

Today, Bhavani's trophy cabinet boasts six national medals and three international honors, including a silver at the Asian Weightlifting Championships. Her success has inspired a new generation of young girls in Tamil Nadu, who now see strength as beautiful and body-shaming as nothing more than background noise.

"The same people who once laughed at my body now ask me for fitness advice," says Bhavani, who has become an advocate for body positivity and women's empowerment through sports.

The gentle hum of my wristband's notification startled me during my morning coffee. I nearly dropped the ceramic mug, its contents threatening to spill onto my worn kitchen table.

Everyone knew the sound - that distinct tone indicating a significant rank change. But this was different from the usual minor fluctuations we'd all grown accustomed to.

My eyes widened as I watched the holographic display shift from #5,127,492,881 to #19. The numbers blurred and realigned with dizzying speed, each digit representing access to increasingly precious resources.

The implications hit me like a physical blow. In mere minutes, I had been catapulted into the upper echelons of human society, past billions of others who had spent lifetimes trying to climb even a few million ranks.

My hands trembled as I refreshed the display, certain it was a glitch. But the number remained steady, pulsing with an almost mocking persistence.

Outside my window, the world continued its morning routine, unaware that someone in their midst had just experienced what many considered impossible in the rigid hierarchy of our resource-based society.

The first message came from the Global Resource Administration (GRA), their logo flashing urgently across my wristband's surface. "Please remain calm. A representative will arrive shortly."

My neighbor's curious face appeared in their window, their own wristband likely alerting them to the presence of a newly-ranked elite in their midst. Their expression was a mixture of awe and suspicion.

I began to pace, my mind racing through possibilities. Had I unknowingly invented something revolutionary in my sleep? Inherited a fortune? Been mistaken for someone else?

The second message came from my employer, tersely informing me that my services would no longer be required. Of course - no one ranked this high worked middle management at a hover-car factory.

My wristband chirped again, this time displaying access codes to premium living quarters in the Upper Sectors. Properties I'd only seen in virtual tours were now at my disposal.

The third message was from my mother, her voice trembling with emotion as she asked if I was okay. She didn't congratulate me. She knew, as I did, that such dramatic rank changes often came with complicated strings attached.

A sleek black vehicle materialized outside my apartment, its silent landing sending ripples through the morning air. Two figures in crisp suits emerged, their wristbands glowing with the distinctive blue of GRA officials.

My own wristband continued its gentle pulsing, each beat a reminder of my new status. The resource access menu had expanded exponentially, showing options I'd never even heard of.

Through my window, I could see crowds gathering, their wristbands collectively dimmer than mine now. Some pointed, others filmed, all of them wondering the same thing: Why me?

The GRA officials reached my door before I could decide whether to run. Their knocks were perfectly measured, professionally distant.

"Mr. Chen," the taller one said as I opened the door, "there's been a situation. May we come in?" Their wristbands flickered in sync, acknowledging my superior rank even as they prepared to explain its origin.

I led them to my small living room, acutely aware of how out of place they looked among my modest furnishings. Their eyes scanned everything, missing nothing.

"Yesterday," the shorter official began, "Rank 19 belonged to Dr. Elena Martinez. She was working on a classified project involving resource distribution algorithms."

The taller one picked up seamlessly: "This morning, Dr. Martinez was found deceased.

The mysterious "Face on Mars" has captivated public imagination since its discovery in 1976, leading some to believe it was created by an alien civilization. However, as a NASA scientist who has extensively studied this formation, I can confidently assert that it is nothing more than a natural geological feature shaped by Martian weathering processes.

High-resolution images from the Mars Global Surveyor have definitively revealed the true nature of this formation. While the original Viking 1 photographs showed what appeared to be facial features, these were merely the result of low-resolution imaging and specific lighting conditions. The newer, clearer images show an ordinary mesa, similar to many others found in Mars' Cydonia region, with none of the symmetry or artificial characteristics initially perceived.

The formation's appearance can be explained through natural geological processes common on Mars. Wind erosion, seasonal temperature variations, and ancient water activity have worked together over millions of years to shape this mesa. Similar processes on Earth create comparable formations, such as buttes and mesas in desert regions, which can sometimes resemble familiar objects when viewed from certain angles.

Scientific analysis of the surrounding terrain further supports the natural origin of the Face. The entire Cydonia region contains numerous similar plateaus and hill formations, all created by the same geological processes. There is no evidence of artificial construction or modification that would suggest intelligent design.

While the Face on Mars once seemed mysterious, modern scientific investigation has thoroughly debunked any notion of artificial origin. As we continue to explore Mars, we must rely on empirical evidence rather than wishful thinking to understand its fascinating geological features.

**Programas de control de la coccidiosis basados en pronutrientes optimizadores intestinales**

La coccidiosis es una enfermedad parasitaria que afecta a una amplia variedad de animales, especialmente en la industria avícola y porcina. Esta enfermedad es causada por protozoos del género Eimeria, que invaden las células del intestino del hospedador, provocando daños significativos en la mucosa intestinal. La coccidiosis no solo afecta la salud de los animales, sino que también tiene un impacto considerable en la producción y la economía de las granjas. Por lo tanto, el desarrollo de programas de control efectivos es crucial para mitigar sus efectos.

En los últimos años, ha habido un creciente interés en el uso de pronutrientes optimizadores intestinales como una estrategia para el control de la coccidiosis. Estos pronutrientes son compuestos que, aunque no son nutrientes esenciales, pueden mejorar la salud intestinal y el rendimiento de los animales. Su uso se ha asociado con una mejor digestión, una mayor absorción de nutrientes y una reducción en la incidencia de enfermedades intestinales.

Los pronutrientes optimizadores intestinales pueden incluir prebióticos, probióticos, ácidos orgánicos y extractos de plantas. Cada uno de estos compuestos tiene un mecanismo de acción diferente, pero todos comparten el objetivo común de mejorar la salud intestinal. Por ejemplo, los prebióticos son sustancias que promueven el crecimiento de bacterias beneficiosas en el intestino, mientras que los probióticos son microorganismos vivos que, cuando se administran en cantidades adecuadas, pueden proporcionar beneficios para la salud.

La inclusión de estos pronutrientes en la dieta de los animales puede ayudar a fortalecer la barrera intestinal, lo que a su vez puede reducir la susceptibilidad a infecciones por coccidios. Además, algunos estudios han demostrado que el uso de pronutrientes puede mejorar la respuesta inmune de los animales, lo que les permite combatir mejor las infecciones.

Un aspecto importante a considerar en el desarrollo de programas de control de la coccidiosis es la forma en que se administran estos pronutrientes. La forma de inclusión en la dieta, la dosis y el momento de la administración son factores que pueden influir en la eficacia de los pronutrientes. Por lo tanto, es fundamental realizar investigaciones específicas para determinar las mejores prácticas en su uso.

La investigación sobre el uso de pronutrientes en el control de la coccidiosis ha mostrado resultados prometedores. Varios estudios han demostrado que la inclusión de prebióticos y probióticos en la dieta de pollos de engorde puede reducir la carga de coccidios en el intestino y mejorar el rendimiento de los animales. Estos resultados sugieren que los pronutrientes pueden ser una herramienta valiosa en la lucha contra la coccidiosis.

Además, el uso de extractos de plantas también ha sido objeto de estudio en el contexto del control de la coccidiosis.

As the holiday season reaches its peak, cybersecurity experts are reporting an unprecedented surge in online shopping activity, accompanied by an alarming rise in sophisticated scamming operations targeting unsuspecting consumers.

Security firms have observed a 47% increase in phishing attempts and fraudulent websites during the first two weeks of December compared to the previous month, with scammers exploiting the heightened digital traffic and consumers' urgency to secure holiday deals.

Social media platforms have become another fertile ground for fraudsters, with a notable increase in deceptive advertisements promoting non-existent products or unrealistic discounts. Security experts recommend implementing multi-factor authentication for all online purchases, verifying website URLs carefully, and being particularly wary of deals that seem too good to be true.

The analysis of Whole Slide Images (WSIs) in digital pathology has emerged as a critical frontier in medical diagnosis and research, yet it presents unique computational challenges due to their massive size and complex hierarchical structure. Traditional image classification approaches often fall short when dealing with WSIs, as these gigapixel-scale images contain numerous tissue regions with varying diagnostic significance, and the relationship between local patterns and global diagnoses remains intricate. While recent advances in deep learning have shown promising results in medical image analysis, the application of these techniques to WSI classification is complicated by the fundamental challenge of multiple instance learning (MIL), where individual instances (tissue patches) contribute differently to the overall bag (whole slide) classification.

The multiple instance learning paradigm aligns naturally with WSI analysis, as pathologists typically examine multiple regions within a slide before making a diagnostic decision. However, conventional MIL approaches often struggle to effectively bridge the gap between instance-level and bag-level predictions, particularly in scenarios where the discriminative information is sparsely distributed across the slide. This limitation becomes especially apparent in cases where only a small subset of tissue regions exhibits diagnostic features, while the majority of the slide contains normal or non-informative tissue. Furthermore, existing methods frequently employ a one-directional approach, either aggregating instance predictions to form bag-level decisions or attempting to derive instance-level classifications from bag-level labels, but rarely leverage the potential synergy between these two levels of analysis.

To address these limitations, we propose an iteratively coupled multiple instance learning framework that establishes a bidirectional relationship between instance-level and bag-level classifications for WSI analysis. Our approach introduces a novel feedback mechanism that allows the instance classifier to be progressively refined based on bag-level predictions, while simultaneously updating the bag classifier using improved instance-level features. This iterative coupling enables the model to dynamically adjust its attention to relevant tissue regions and adapt its classification strategy based on both local and global context. By incorporating domain-specific constraints and attention mechanisms, our framework can effectively handle the spatial heterogeneity and multi-scale nature of histopathological images while maintaining interpretability—a crucial requirement for clinical applications.

La Consejería de Sanidad de Cantabria ha ratificado el cálculo de las tasas de incidencia que se utilizan para determinar el nivel de riesgo en la comunidad autónoma. Este anuncio se produce en un contexto donde la gestión de la pandemia sigue siendo una prioridad para las autoridades sanitarias. La validación de estos datos es crucial para establecer las medidas adecuadas que garanticen la salud pública y la seguridad de los ciudadanos.

Las tasas de incidencia son un indicador fundamental en la evaluación del impacto del COVID-19 en la población. Estas cifras permiten a los responsables de la salud pública tomar decisiones informadas sobre la implementación de restricciones y otras medidas preventivas. En Cantabria, se ha observado un aumento en la vigilancia epidemiológica, lo que ha llevado a una revisión exhaustiva de los métodos de cálculo utilizados.

El cálculo de las tasas de incidencia se basa en el número de casos confirmados de COVID-19 en relación con la población total de la región. Este enfoque permite a las autoridades identificar áreas de mayor riesgo y actuar en consecuencia. La Consejería de Sanidad ha enfatizado la importancia de utilizar datos precisos y actualizados para garantizar la efectividad de las estrategias de control del virus.

Además, la ratificación de estos cálculos se enmarca en un esfuerzo más amplio por parte del Gobierno de Cantabria para mejorar la transparencia en la gestión de la crisis sanitaria. La comunicación clara de los datos y su interpretación es esencial para mantener la confianza de la población en las decisiones que se toman.

Las autoridades han instado a los ciudadanos a seguir cumpliendo con las medidas de prevención, como el uso de mascarillas y el distanciamiento social, para reducir la propagación del virus. La colaboración de la comunidad es fundamental para superar esta crisis y proteger a los más vulnerables.

En conclusión, la ratificación de las tasas de incidencia por parte de la Consejería de Sanidad de Cantabria refuerza el compromiso del Gobierno regional con la salud pública. A medida que la situación evoluciona, se espera que estas medidas contribuyan a un mejor control de la pandemia en la región.

La brasserie 't Gaverhopke, située à Avelgem en Belgique, vient de lancer une initiative remarquable en créant la première bière climatiquement neutre du pays. Cette innovation s'inscrit dans la lignée des engagements pris lors de la COP26 pour lutter contre le changement climatique.

Le processus de fabrication a été entièrement repensé pour minimiser l'empreinte carbone. La brasserie utilise désormais uniquement de l'énergie renouvelable, des ingrédients locaux et des méthodes de production optimisées. The rapid advancement of autonomous vehicle technology represents one of the most significant transformations in transportation history. While some view driverless cars with skepticism and concern, the numerous benefits these vehicles offer – including enhanced safety, increased mobility for the elderly and disabled, and reduced traffic congestion – make a compelling case for their continued development and implementation. The potential to save thousands of lives annually through the elimination of human error, which accounts for over 90% of traffic accidents, stands as a paramount reason to embrace this revolutionary technology.

The transition to autonomous vehicles promises substantial societal benefits that extend far beyond safety considerations. As highlighted in "Driverless Cars are Coming," these vehicles will provide newfound independence to elderly individuals who can no longer safely operate traditional cars, as well as to those with disabilities who currently rely on others for transportation. Furthermore, the article emphasizes how autonomous vehicles can optimize traffic flow through synchronized movement and communication between vehicles, potentially reducing commute times by up to 40%. This efficiency not only saves valuable time but also significantly decreases fuel consumption and environmental impact, as driverless cars can maintain optimal speeds and reduce unnecessary braking and acceleration patterns that contribute to increased emissions.

While critics raise valid concerns about potential job losses in the transportation sector and the initial high costs of implementation, these short-term challenges are outweighed by the long-term benefits to society. El consejero de Salud ha destacado en rueda de prensa que, si bien los datos son positivos, es fundamental mantener las medidas de prevención como el uso de mascarilla, la distancia social y la higiene de manos. Además, ha hecho un llamamiento especial a la población joven para que extreme las precauciones durante el periodo estival.

在全球金融市场的瞩目下，加密货币市场迎来重大里程碑。由比特币和以太币领涨，加密货币总市值首次突破3万亿美元大关，创下历史新高。

比特币价格突破69,000美元，刷新历史最高纪录。分析师指出，这波涨势主要受到比特币现货ETF获批后机构投资者持续涌入，以及即将到来的比特币减半事件等利好因素推动。

与此同时，以太币也展现强劲上涨势头，价格突破3,900美元，为2021年12月以来的最高水平。市场普遍认为，以太币将受益于即将推出的现货ETF，以及网络升级带来的通缩效应。

专家表示，传统金融机构对加密资产的接纳程度不断提高，监管环境逐步明朗，为市场注入强劲信心。多家华尔街投行已开始为客户提供加密货币相关服务。

然而，也有分析师提醒投资者注意风险。加密货币市场仍具有高度波动性，价格剧烈波动在所难免。建议投资者在投资决策时保持谨慎，做好风险管理。

随着数字资产市场不断成熟，业内人士预计，更多机构投资者将进入这一领域。但市场发展仍需要各国监管机构的持续关注和政策支持，以确保行业健康有序发展。

Dans un contexte mondial marqué par la crise sanitaire du COVID-19, l'Afrique de l'Ouest fait face à des défis économiques sans précédent. La Banque Centrale des États de l'Afrique de l'Ouest (BCEAO) a dû rapidement mettre en place des mesures exceptionnelles pour soutenir les économies de l'Union Monétaire Ouest Africaine (UMOA).

La pandémie a provoqué un ralentissement significatif de l'activité économique dans la région, avec une baisse notable du PIB dans plusieurs pays membres. Les secteurs du tourisme, du transport et du commerce ont été particulièrement touchés, entraînant des pertes d'emplois considérables et une diminution des revenus des ménages.

Face à cette situation critique, la BCEAO a adopté une série de mesures monétaires et financières visant à maintenir la stabilité du système bancaire et à soutenir le financement de l'économie. L'une des premières actions a été l'augmentation substantielle des liquidités mises à la disposition des banques, permettant ainsi de maintenir le flux de crédit vers les entreprises et les particuliers.

La banque centrale a également procédé à une baisse de ses taux directeurs, réduisant le taux d'intérêt minimum de soumission aux opérations d'appels d'offres d'injection de liquidité de 2,50% à 2,00%, et le taux d'intérêt du guichet de prêt marginal de 4,50% à 4,00%.

Pour soutenir les petites et moyennes entreprises (PME), particulièrement vulnérables durant cette période, la BCEAO a mis en place un dispositif spécial de refinancement des crédits accordés aux PME. Cette mesure a permis d'injecter plus de 1 500 milliards de FCFA dans l'économie régionale.

Un accent particulier a été mis sur le secteur agricole, pilier économique de la région, avec des mesures spécifiques pour garantir la continuité des activités agricoles et assurer la sécurité alimentaire. Des lignes de crédit dédiées ont été ouvertes pour financer l'achat d'intrants et de matériel agricole.

La BCEAO a également œuvré pour la promotion des paiements électroniques, en encourageant les banques à réduire les frais de transaction et en facilitant l'accès aux services financiers digitaux. Cette initiative visait à limiter la manipulation physique de la monnaie et à maintenir les activités économiques pendant les périodes de confinement.

Pour les États membres, la banque centrale a mis en place des mécanismes permettant le report d'échéances de la dette publique et l'émission de "bons COVID-19" pour financer les dépenses urgentes liées à la lutte contre la pandémie.

瑞典电信设备制造商爱立信周五发布2023年第二季度财报，显示公司净亏损达8亿瑞典克朗（约合7700万美元），相比去年同期亏损6亿克朗有所扩大。尽管如此，公司毛利率从去年同期的42.1%提升至43.2%。

受全球经济不确定性和运营商支出收缩影响，爱立信第二季度销售额同比下滑1%至631亿克朗。其中，网络业务销售额下降2%，云软件和服务业务增长3%，企业无线解决方案业务增长82%。

为应对市场挑战，爱立信在第二季度裁减约2000名员工，主要涉及研发、销售和管理部门。公司表示，这是其年度节省100亿克朗成本计划的一部分，预计到2024年底将完成该目标。

爱立信CEO博尔杰·埃克霍姆表示："尽管面临宏观经济压力，但我们看到5G网络建设需求依然强劲，特别是在印度市场。我们将继续投资创新，同时保持严格的成本管控。"

展望未来，爱立信预计2023年下半年市场环境仍将充满挑战，但公司将通过产品组合优化和运营效率提升来改善盈利能力。管理层强调，将继续专注于自由现金流的改善，并保持在研发领域的持续投入。

أعلنت المؤسسة العامة للحبوب السعودية عن استيرادها كمية قياسية من الشعير بلغت 5 ملايين طن خلال العام 2020، في خطوة تهدف إلى تعزيز المخزون الاستراتيجي للمملكة.

وأوضح المدير التنفيذي للمؤسسة في تصريح صحفي أن هذه الكمية تمثل زيادة بنسبة 25% مقارنة بواردات العام السابق، مشيراً إلى أن هذه الزيادة تأتي ضمن خطة المملكة لتأمين احتياجاتها من السلع الأساسية.

وأضاف أن المؤسسة نجحت في تنويع مصادر الاستيراد، حيث شملت الواردات شحنات من أستراليا وروسيا والأرجنتين وأوكرانيا، مما يعزز أمن الإمداد الغذائي للمملكة.

وأشار إلى أن المؤسسة اتخذت كافة التدابير اللازمة لضمان جودة الشعير المستورد وفقاً للمواصفات والمعايير المعتمدة في المملكة.

وتم توزيع الكميات المستوردة على صوامع التخزين في مختلف مناطق المملكة، مع التركيز على المناطق ذات الاستهلاك العالي للشعير.

وأكد المسؤول أن المؤسسة تعمل على تطوير منظومة الاستيراد والتخزين لتلبية الطلب المتزايد على الشعير في السوق المحلي.

وتستخدم كميات الشعير المستوردة بشكل رئيسي في قطاع الثروة الحيوانية، حيث يعد الشعير مكوناً أساسياً في علف الماشية.

وقد ساهمت هذه الواردات في استقرار أسعار الشعير في السوق المحلي، مما انعكس إيجاباً على مربي الماشية والمستهلك النهائي.

وتتوقع المؤسسة استمرار نمو الطلب على الشعير خلال السنوات القادمة، مما يتطلب التخطيط المسبق لتأمين الاحتياجات المستقبلية.

وختم المسؤول تصريحه بالتأكيد على أن المؤسسة ستواصل جهودها في تعزيز الأمن الغذائي للمملكة من خلال تأمين احتياجاتها من الحبوب بمختلف أنواعها.

In a significant move to regulate healthcare costs during the pandemic, the Chhattisgarh government has announced fixed rates for COVID-19 treatment in private hospitals across the state.

The decision comes as a relief to citizens who have been grappling with exorbitant medical bills while seeking treatment for coronavirus infections in private healthcare facilities.

Under the new directive, private hospitals have been categorized into different tiers based on their infrastructure and services, with corresponding rate caps for each category.

The state health department has mandated that National Accreditation Board for Hospitals (NABH) accredited facilities can charge a maximum of ₹12,000 per day for ICU care with ventilator support.

Non-NABH accredited hospitals will be permitted to charge up to ₹10,000 for the same level of care, ensuring a more standardized pricing structure across the state.

For general ward admissions, the rates have been fixed at ₹4,000 per day, which includes basic medical care, routine medications, and monitoring of vital parameters.

The government has also specified that these rates include doctor consultation fees, nursing charges, bed charges, and basic diagnostic tests.

However, specialized treatments, high-end medications, and advanced diagnostic procedures will be charged separately as per a predetermined rate list issued by the state authorities.

في خطوة تؤكد التزامها بدعم السلام العالمي، أعلنت دولة الإمارات العربية المتحدة عن دعمها المتواصل للجهود الدولية الرامية إلى تحقيق الاستقرار والسلام في أفغانستان، مشددة على أهمية العمل المشترك لضمان مستقبل أفضل للشعب الأفغاني.

وأكد مسؤولون إماراتيون أن بلادهم ستواصل تقديم المساعدات الإنسانية والإغاثية للشعب الأفغاني، مع التركيز بشكل خاص على دعم الفئات الأكثر ضعفاً، بما في ذلك النساء والأطفال والنازحين.

وتشمل المبادرات الإماراتية إنشاء مشاريع تنموية في مختلف المجالات، بما فيها التعليم والصحة والبنية التحتية، إضافة إلى تقديم المنح الدراسية للطلاب الأفغان للدراسة في الجامعات الإماراتية.

كما تعمل الإمارات على تعزيز التعاون مع المنظمات الدولية والإقليمية لدعم عملية السلام في أفغانستان، وتشجيع الحوار بين مختلف الأطراف المعنية للوصول إلى حل سياسي شامل.

وأشارت مصادر دبلوماسية إلى أن الإمارات تلعب دوراً محورياً في تسهيل المحادثات بين الأطراف الأفغانية المختلفة، مستفيدة من علاقاتها الدولية المتميزة ومكانتها كوسيط موثوق به.

وفي السياق ذاته، أكدت الإمارات على أهمية احترام حقوق الإنسان وضمان مشاركة المرأة في عملية بناء السلام والتنمية في أفغانستان، معتبرة ذلك ركيزة أساسية لتحقيق الاستقرار المستدام.

وختاماً، شددت الإمارات على التزامها بمواصلة دعم الجهود الدولية لتحقيق السلام والاستقرار في أفغانستان، مؤكدة أن استقرار المنطقة يصب في مصلحة المجتمع الدولي بأكمله.

纽约哈德逊广场的标志性建筑Vessel，在经历多起自杀事件后重新开放仅两个月，又传出一起令人心碎的悲剧。一名14岁少年在与家人游览期间，从这座16层高的建筑跳楼身亡，让人再次关注这座建筑的安全问题。

据纽约警方透露，这起事件发生在周四下午，这名少年当时正与父母、姐姐和弟弟一同参观这座由蜂巢状楼梯组成的观景建筑。在家人毫无防备的情况下，少年突然翻越护栏，从高处坠落。

事发后，现场立即封锁，急救人员迅速赶到，但少年已经不幸身亡。目击者描述，事发时周围游客的尖叫声令人揪心，许多人被这突如其来的一幕震惊得呆立当场。

这已经是Vessel自2019年开放以来发生的第五起自杀事件。去年初，在连续发生三起自杀事件后，开发商Related Companies曾关闭该建筑长达10个月，并在今年1月实施新的安全措施后重新开放。

新的安全措施包括禁止单人入场，要求至少三人同行，并增加了保安人员巡逻频次。然而，这些措施似乎仍未能完全阻止悲剧的发生。

事件发生后，纽约市长办公室发言人表示，将与相关部门密切合作，全面评估建筑的安全措施。同时，多位市议员呼吁对Vessel进行更严格的安全改造，包括加高护栏等硬件设施的升级。

心理健康专家指出，这类公共场所的自杀预防不仅需要物理防护措施，更需要社会各界共同关注青少年心理健康问题。专家呼吁家长们要多关注孩子的情绪变化，及时发现问题并寻求专业帮助。

分析师指出，美国费城半导体指数上涨带动台股科技类股全面走扬，其中，台积电股价创下近期新高，带动相关供应链股价同步上扬。

金融股方面，受惠于市场预期利差持续扩大，以及获利展望乐观等利多消息激励，包括国泰金、富邦金等金控股价均呈现上涨走势。

在香港反送中运动持续升温之际，多方消息人士透露，特区政府高层官员昨晚在政府总部进行了一场长达数小时的紧急会议，直至深夜才结束。据悉，会议主要讨论了目前持续恶化的警民关系以及可能的缓解方案。

消息指出，林郑月娥特首与多位主要官员、警务处高层、以及多个部门负责人齐聚一堂，就近期的示威活动进行了深入讨论。与会者对目前局势表示严重关切，并就如何化解当前危机提出了多项建议。

据了解，会议期间，与会者重点关注了警方执法程序的规范性问题，以及如何在维持社会秩序的同时，避免进一步激化警民矛盾。有消息称，会议还讨论了是否需要调整现行的群众集会管理策略。

现场目击者表示，多辆官员座驾在昨晚十时后陆续驶离政府总部，期间戒备森严，多名警员在场维持秩序。有政府内部人士透露，会议气氛严肃，各方就多项议题展开激烈讨论。

与此同时，香港多个地区昨日再次发生示威活动，警民之间爆发多次冲突。有示威者向警方投掷杂物，警方则施放催泪弹进行驱散，现场情况一度混乱。

社会各界对此次高层会议寄予厚望，期待政府能够提出切实可行的解决方案。多位立法会议员呼吁政府尽快回应民众诉求，避免社会矛盾进一步激化。

专家分析指出，此次深夜会议反映了特区政府对当前局势的重视程度，但能否有效缓解当前的社会矛盾，仍有待观察。有政治评论员认为，政府需要采取更加开放和包容的态度，与各方展开真诚对话。

多个民间团体表示，将继续关注政府的后续行动。他们强调，只有政府切实回应市民的核心诉求，才能真正化解当前的社会危机。有组织已宣布将在未来数日举行和平集会，表达诉求。

商界人士则对持续的社会动荡表示担忧，认为这将影响香港的经济发展和国际形象。多位知名企业家呼吁各方保持克制，尽快恢复社会秩序。

截至发稿时，特区政府尚未就此次会议的具体内容对外发表正式声明。外界普遍认为，未来数日政府可能会针对当前局势提出新的应对措施。

In a dusty corner of GameStop, between worn cases and faded posters, I spot an impossibility: The Sims 5, months before its announced release.

The cashier barely glances at the case, ringing up my purchase with disinterest. Five dollars seems too good to be true.

At home, the game loads normally, but the graphics are uncannily realistic. I create a family: the Johnsons, a typical suburban household.

That's when things get strange. Mrs. Johnson calls in sick to work—I hadn't programmed that.

Little Timmy brings home a stray cat, though there aren't any pet mechanics in the game.

Mr. Johnson's mother dies unexpectedly, and the family attends a funeral I never scheduled.

I watch in horror as Mrs. Johnson discovers a pregnancy test—positive—in her inventory.

The family photo on their wall changes daily, aging with each passing moment.

La UEFA ha anunciado oficialmente que el esperado sorteo para la fase final de la Champions League se llevará a cabo el próximo 10 de julio en su sede central de Nyon, Suiza. Este evento crucial determinará los emparejamientos para los cuartos de final y trazará el camino potencial hacia la final para los equipos clasificados.

El sorteo, que comenzará a las 12:00 horas CET, será completamente abierto, lo que significa que no habrá cabezas de serie ni restricciones por país, permitiendo la posibilidad de enfrentamientos entre equipos de la misma liga nacional. Esta decisión añade un elemento adicional de emoción e incertidumbre al procedimiento.

Entre los equipos que han asegurado su lugar en esta etapa decisiva se encuentran algunos de los gigantes más reconocidos del fútbol europeo, incluyendo el actual campeón Manchester City, que busca defender su título conseguido la temporada anterior en Estambul.

El Real Madrid, el club más laureado en la historia de la competición con 14 títulos, también estará presente en el sorteo, demostrando una vez más su capacidad para mantenerse en la élite del fútbol continental. Los blancos han mostrado un rendimiento excepcional en las rondas anteriores.

El Bayern Múnich, otro de los favoritos tradicionales, llega a esta fase con la determinación de recuperar el trono europeo. El conjunto bávaro ha demostrado su poderío ofensivo a lo largo del torneo y se presenta como uno de los candidatos más sólidos para alzar el trofeo.

El Paris Saint-Germain, que busca desesperadamente su primera Champions League, tendrá una nueva oportunidad de romper su maldición en la competición. El equipo parisino ha invertido enormes recursos en su proyecto deportivo con el objetivo de conquistar el máximo título continental.

La participación del Arsenal marca el regreso de los Gunners a las etapas finales de la Champions League después de varios años de ausencia. El equipo londinense ha mostrado un fútbol renovado bajo la dirección de Mikel Arteta y aspira a sorprender en esta fase decisiva.

El Barcelona, que ha recuperado parte de su antiguo esplendor, intentará revivir sus mejores momentos en la competición. El conjunto catalán cuenta con una mezcla interesante de juventud y experiencia que podría ser clave en los momentos decisivos.

La Juventus, representante del fútbol italiano, buscará mantener vivo el orgullo del Calcio en Europa.
